author: oluwatobiloba
title: INTRODUCING MYSELF TO STEEMIT
body:
Hello everyone, this is my introduction post.
I am new on steemit an i hope to enjoy everything that goes on here. My name is oluwatobiloba, i am an African. knowing steemit is one of the  best event of my life.
i'm a biochemist  and I love singing, writing, dancing and readng.
![DSC_0654.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPvBd8Z37LZ3gj8dNY7pLaSGq3NTHrDZDVhmxZXDwnQBE/DSC_0654.JPG)

I  am so excited that finally i have the opportunity to share ideas, stories and articles. since writing is the catalyst of life

![DSC_0655.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmahVogkHpGXcRovwW8uESfFXsno7vdC2Qit5soL1R6WTN/DSC_0655.JPG)

I LOVE STEEMIT
root_title: INTRODUCING MYSELF TO STEEMIT

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Attitude ( how people react to situations)
body:
**Our attitude is what depicts us, (what people see that makes them describe us as who  they think we are).
http://cherrypositive.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/attitude.jpg
---------------
**Some people really do go through some terrible experiences that it becomes difficult for them to even explain. 
Some of us that really complain about the situations that we find ourselves in do so because we have not heard or listened to what the next person is going through as well. Some people have come to the conclusion that may be God has written them off or maybe he has even forgotten that he created people like them, but then the good book says that ''God will not tempt us more than we can bear''. This things are really easy to preach or talk about if one is not going through the same thing, it is easier to tell people to trust God when things are going smooth for us,  but the real test of faith comes to show when we have to go through a trial and we can still hide our tears and then smile in order to remind others o
root_title: Attitude ( how people react to situations)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Saluting the king
body:
It is very necessary to learn to give proper salutation to the one who deserves it. He knows the end of a matter from its very beginning. He is the ruler and overseer of the universe.
He can describe everyone and everything in details but he is indescribable. Nigerians call him several names; some of us call him arugbo ojo, chineke, eze, alagbada ina erujeje, yesu and so on.
http://www.beachcitiesmedia.org/img/onetruegod_wide.jpg
He is a miracle working and way making God. A father to the fatherless, the husband to the widows. The God that listens to the cries of thousands that call to him and answers them all at the same time.
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_sj3uhjSgnW0/STuwzj56NnI/AAAAAAAAAgc/snukEryruPI/s400/14.JPG
A king that crowns king and a king that can dethrone kings.
I salute you my maker, my father, my love, my friend and my king.
Let us all learn to give honor and salutation to the one who deserves it.
Thanks for reading, you can upvote, comment, resteem @ oluwatobiloba.
root_title: Saluting the king

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Stop Trying to be Who You Are not
body:
Being real might be a difficult task especially if you are a type of person who wants to be accepted by everyone or who wants everyone to like him or her.

The society has not helped either,they make us feel we have to act like someone else if we really want to be successful.They make us feel that we cannot be relevant if we do not pretend to be who we are not because they seem not to be interested in what so ever new thing we have to offer. 

# Reasons Why You Need to be Yourself.

  (1) You were created to become you, that is the reason why every of your features and characteristics is specifically associated with just you and that means that you cannot just live or act like every other person .

http://www.theacornstash.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/good-things-when-believe-in-yourself.jpg
[Source](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTDtwcAjBx8QdjQSFj2EBHZE6zC_cAUQ99RIJ3OF7_riRBPEQ78)

(2)  The best way to live a fulfilled life  is to live an unmasked life because it gives you inner pea
root_title: Stop Trying to be Who You Are not

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Your Mindset...How it Affects Your Life
body:
The way you think in your heart is the way you are, this are the  words of a great man which implies that we might have a power within us but it doesn't come into actualization until it is realized and activated.

We need to start acting on the activation of the power from within instead of feeling like a failure all the time.

https://hrexach.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/m9.jpg

Sometimes, victors usually live like victims because they have refused to harness the power of greatness from within.

There comes the power of self believe because what you believe in will determine to a great extent how you will behave.

If you believe today that you are poor, you ultimately become a poor person and if you think everyday that you are a wealthy person, greatness and wealth automatically comes your way.

The basic thing that triggers change in a man's life is not the presence of money but the change of mindset.
Some people like to live as victims of their past because they wouldn't just let go.

http://www.mindtraini
root_title: Your Mindset...How it Affects Your Life

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating A Friend With A Good Heart ---Happy Birthday
body:
I was at a meeting one faithful day in a very serious mood trying to get down all that the person in front was saying, when someone whispered into my ears in that quiet hall, he said" I like the way you write''. I replied back with a smile.

At the end of the meeting, I stepped out of the hall and behold I saw him standing outside and he quickly introduced me to a lady as his new friend, I smiled and said nice to meet you the lady said; she has a nice set of teeth. I quickly said thanks.

From that moment, any where he sees me he will shout my friend and I will wave back at him, I even forget what his name is on several occasions as I simply call him my friend, he eventually graduated into calling me his best friend without having each others mobile number.

After some time I realized that the lady he introduced me to, the day we meet was his girl friend and the lady left him for his friend who was richer than him and I wondered why someone will leave a guy who has a really good heart, a nice attitude and lo
root_title: Celebrating A Friend With A Good Heart ---Happy Birthday

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Tale Of An African Virgin
body:
It was the end of another festival and it was a terrifying experience as always, she felt really weak and the pain she experienced was one she could not describe she was just tired of this annoying culture. Is it a crime to be a virgin?

It was usually a yearly festival where a female chosen by the gods will have to walk around the whole town with a calabash on her head and a white piece of material tied around her chest, during those periods when the calabash is on her head she usually gets unconscious whatever she does at that point are things she would not do on a normal day.

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/93/68/6c/93686cfe96823fc9abd70f16fbfcc073--beautiful-black-women-beautiful-people.jpg
[Image source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjlvsHcwK_WAhXCvxQKHYLECWgQjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2FhesperiaV%2Fpeople-culture%2F&psig=AFQjCNFnaR9ZQX2_9tvlaSJhyCAedlR_lw&ust=1505850586694208)

She moves from one position to the other in different
root_title: The Tale Of An African Virgin

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Importance of The Tooth and Tooth Decay
body:
The tooth is a very important part of the human body, the functions, and importance of a tooth cannot be overrated. Have you ever imagined yourself without a complete set of the tooth or with half of your teeth, or with the upper part of your teeth gone, it can be really frustrating especially for those of us who happened to be lovers of beef or who like to show our beautiful set of teeth when taking pictures.

http://www.advanceddentalconcept.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/prevent-tooth-decay-hammond-LA-Advanced-Dental-Concepts.jpg

The teeth are very vital and relevant and as it stands, it should be treated as such. With so much care and attention paid to the teeth, we will enjoy a healthy and satisfying lifestyle.

# The Importance of Your Teeth.

https://ak5.picdn.net/shutterstock/videos/15558355/thumb/1.jpg

So many people might feel they know all the functions of their teeth but I must say there is something you do not know that if you had known you would have placed a better priority on your teeth.

*
root_title: The Importance of The Tooth and Tooth Decay

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Do You Think Love Or Marriage Has The Power To Make People Change Their Bad Habits? Let's Talk About it.
body:
I was reading a post from a lady that I admire her writing skills so much on this platform, that I take my time to read through every line because it is worth giving my time too @mimy, and while I read a post that she wrote some time ago, I felt the urge to write this down as well.

I am going to ask a question today and that question is, do people ever change for the sake of love?
I don't know if you get me right, but the thing is most people want to fall in love often, they want to get settled, they want to get married and all that.

The basic truth remains that no one is perfect and everyone has got their flaws, but sometimes I think we have to think twice before taking some major life decisions.

I will be citing examples of some things that I have seen in some marriages and relationships to you and those things are things that could scare one's thought off marriage forever.

The first instance is a Lady who is married to a man she has three kids for, the story has it that she got pregnant for him during
root_title: Do You Think Love Or Marriage Has The Power To Make People Change Their Bad Habits? Let's Talk About it.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Inner Beauty, Beauty with Brain
body:
The issue with us is that we are easily carried away by what we see, that is the outward appearance and we forget that life is basically more than what we can see.
The beauty that is present in the physical is really a strong and attractive one, one that has the power to make people run to you, but beyond that is the inner beauty.

https://s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/images.deccanchronicle.com/dc-Cover-vm9dq6d6va44diuhorev31i9t4-20171106002725.Medi.jpeg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjWh_nDsIjYAhWJrxoKHaHgBC4QjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.deccanchronicle.com%2Flifestyle%2Fhealth-and-wellbeing%2F061117%2Fpositional-vertigo-relates-to-inner-ear-not-brain.html&psig=AOvVaw2FTcHqmpXLIvnauQ2zwdNo&ust=1513302303429730)

The physical beauty of a man or lady can get so much into her head that she begins to feel on top of the world and eventually proud and arrogant.
It is very good that one gets a combination of both beauties as this will he
root_title: Inner Beauty, Beauty with Brain

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Strong Feeling of Love
body:
The feeling of love is a strong and passionate one, it is so strong that it covers all flaws and mistakes, it hides the deep truth about individuals.

True love has no shame, no regret, no pain, no flaws and no sadness at all. Love can, however, be confused with lust, the difference between the two should be clearly stated and differentiated.

https://c1.staticflickr.com/3/2777/4069805106_cb58217ba4_z.jpg?zz=1
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjE77isu57YAhXDWhQKHdGBAMoQjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.flickr.com%2Fphotos%2Fpure_heart-8%2F4069805106&psig=AOvVaw1nl4sGQZwOKIIfHMDI3w6i&ust=1514061119942803)

When you love people sincerely, you begin to see them has been special, you begin to take them as your major priority, you begin to see them has been special.

When you really love people, you will not be able to stand and watch them go astray, you will want to do every possible thing to correct them, you will defend them with all that you
root_title: A Strong Feeling of Love

author: oluwatobiloba
title: On My Way To The Great Ibadan Steemit Meetup.
body:
Travelling all around the place to add value to life in the little way that I can. Steemit is beautiful, it has transformed my life and if there is anything I can do to change other people's lives too, then I will gladly do it. Ibadan is a beautiful city and the individuals in attendance for the meetup are as well great. I will give you updates about the meetup, so please stay informed

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Why Do We Still Stay Even When It Hurts So Much? A True Life Story About A Draining Relationship
body:
The reason why we like to stick to the things that hurt us as humans is something I cannot explain, so many times we stick to the relationships that hurt us and has cost us a lot of things just because we feel that our heart belongs to that person.

http://s1.bwallpapers.com/wallpapers/2014/01/23/sad-love_11004471.jpg

Today I meet an old time friend and I remember that we were supposed to leave school at the same time but she could not graduate with us because of the choice she made back in school.
When we got into the university, I remember she was one of the first friends I made back then and she was a good person with a wonderful personality, while I stayed in the hostel, she stayed off campus but we were so close that I could sleep at her house and she could also sleep in my room in the hostel.

After the first semester, she told me she had seen a guy she liked, he was not a student of our school, he attended a neighbouring school and he was in his final year, she told me he was a very good guy and she
root_title: Why Do We Still Stay Even When It Hurts So Much? A True Life Story About A Draining Relationship

author: oluwatobiloba
title: An Interesting Story You Must Read, A Black Mermaid Tells Me About Herself.
body:
We are in the early hours of the morning right now and I am so excited to see another promising day and I am sure you are too, so I am wishing you a beautiful morning and a great day ahead.
I welcome you once again to my blog and just like you know, I always try to give you information about the happenings around me and every other interesting thing I hear or come across.

Today is not going to be an exemption and the story I have for you today, is really thrilling and somehow scary to an extent, I was screaming when I was being told the story, but I was really glad to hear about it though, so just sit back, relax and enjoy while I dish it out to you in a hot manner.

A lady came to stay with my neighbour for some time, I guess that was because she had nowhere to stay, there was no light and I had to put on the generator to get my gadget charged and the Lady came into my room as well to charge her mobile phone. Some other people came around, and we got talking;
We were discussing powers that exist around Afr
root_title: An Interesting Story You Must Read, A Black Mermaid Tells Me About Herself.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Having Fun With @gee1, My Woman Crush For Today Is An Amazing Woman. Happy Birthday @ogoowinner.
body:
Today is another Wednesday and that means that I have the opportunity to tell my friends about my woman crush, I must say that I am excited about it.
So, my woman crush for today is a rare gem, one with a good heart and a great personality and she is no other person than @ogoowinner.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1521621177/tawhio3dkuvlif2ybhdp.jpg

This is one person I have helplessly fallen in love with and I must say that I am really amazed at her personality.
The first thing that attracted me to @ogoowinner was the fact that she is a strong lady who is ready in any way to promote herself to the achievement of greatness irrespective of either she has anyone to support her or not.

Steemit brought her my way and although we have not gone past the walls of having a normal chat, I must say that she is someone I have fallen greatly in love with and I must confess that when I see someone like this, it is usually a drive for me to improve on myself and make my
root_title: Having Fun With @gee1, My Woman Crush For Today Is An Amazing Woman. Happy Birthday @ogoowinner.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Am Grateful To The Beautiful Souls In This Awesome Community
body:
What more could I have asked for,
It was great, it was amazing and splendid,
I never expected such reaction,
now, I know that there is so much love that exist in this community.

https://cryptofyb.files.wordpress.com/2018/02/steemit-workings-e1517441443338.png?w=656&h=300&crop=1

I am just a little girl, with so many ideas and plans
I have some of them written down,
and others I just bear at the back of my mind,
I wanted to get started immediately,
but there was nothing to start with.

I was introduced to a great platform,
I meet wonderful people,
with beautiful souls,
they showed me love and encouraged me all through.

I became bold, strong and fearless,
I picked up myself again,
I knew it was time to pick back the plans I had thrown away,
and work on them again.

I introduced one yesterday and that even encouraged me the more.
I am saying a very big thank you,
to the steemit community,
for the love and care shown to this little, broken and strange lady.
I really appreciate your love.

Now, I know that all
root_title: I Am Grateful To The Beautiful Souls In This Awesome Community

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating A Year On Steemit, It Has Not Been Rosy But It Has Been Worth It.(Greater And Better Days Are Ahead )
body:
I was notified somedays ago about my one- year celebration on steemit and the only thing I managed to say was, really is the way time flies?
I remember those times when @gbenga opened an account for me on the platform and I was indeed reluctant to even start blogging because he was very devoted to steemit and he was not making anything tangible back then, so I did not see any reason why I should join.

https://steemitimages.com/70x70/http://steemitboard.com/@oluwatobiloba/birthday1.png

But, if you have had an encounter with him, you will know that he is strong-willed and his level of strength and faith is out of this world, so he kept on doing what he was doing and he was persistent with it.
He persuaded me to start blogging and eventually I did, they were times when I totally wanted to forget about the account, because after days of brainstorming and doing research, whenever I come up with a post, it usually looks as if no one is interested in the post, because it always has 1 or 2 cents.

I complained and
root_title: Celebrating A Year On Steemit, It Has Not Been Rosy But It Has Been Worth It.(Greater And Better Days Are Ahead )

body:
Some days back, we had to celebrate a pretty lady because it was her birthday and the least we could do was to honour her with our presence. The beautiful steemian was no other person than @zanny.
I will not claim to know much about you, but your smile is captivating and you are good looking, so I am wishing you joy, happiness and every moment filled with love all the days of your life.

I will like to feed friends here with nice pictures sent from the birthday party. Please enjoy!!

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Am Grateful For The Things I Have And To Everyone For The Amazing Support.
body:
It is a beautiful to feel loved, 
It is beautiful to feel appreciated, 
It is beautiful to feel special,
Oh how beautiful it is to feel celebrated. 

The periods of frustration are usually not nice, 
The periods of frustation will make you cry, 
The periods of frustration will make you weep, 
The periods of frustration will make you feel like dying. 

![images (20).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmc5PVb5TmP26jG2yn5NH6Hsj9z4j7zH6EDVRZP4KPDTrm/images%20(20).jpeg)
But,  the real deal comes when you are able to apply strength in your areas of weakness, 
When you are able to hold strong to the things that you believe, 
When you are able to say that you will never give up and you will not give up. 

I want to say thank you to everyone for showing me so much love on the programme : let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba. 
Thank you very much. 
Please feel free to share your relationship issues with me and also send something to someone,  you can reach me through :
Mail: adekunlemercy95@gmail.com
root_title: I Am Grateful For The Things I Have And To Everyone For The Amazing Support.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm...... Tenth Episode
body:
[continued from here](https://steemit.com/fiction/@oluwatobiloba/my-life-in-the-other-realm-ninth-episode)

I was really worried and I paced around,  I was sure that I might not be given an opportunity to come with my father to the market again so I had to make proper use of every opportunity that I had at this moment to unravel this great misery. 

![download (2).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeeMZcynWryr6JM8L1oiQTj2HSSKXXqDDWPPLYmWtCpUv/download%20(2).jpeg)
I decided to step into the crowd immediately my father looked away, I tried all that I could to monitor his every move. 
But,  almost immediately, a pretty tall fair lady walked into the store, I was attracted to her beauty even as a lady and she wore an expensive wrapper. 

I immediately forgot about what I was thinking and I fixed my gaze on the pretty woman, and so many questions ran through my mind. 
Will I ever be able to afford expensive things like this? 
Will I ever become this pretty? 
When the woman walked,  she attracted so much attention
root_title: My Life In The Other Realm...... Tenth Episode

author: oluwatobiloba
title: You Are Special The Way You Are Dear Friend.
body:
Oh how special you are my friend,
You were specially made in the way you are, 
You might be slim or fat, 
You might as well be a tall or short person,
It does not in any way reduce the value that your personality gives to you. 

![images (28).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmadzf87u8sFrJxChkvf4fVnDSmNgRCrzBPXF3nXF7i1qb/images%20(28).jpeg)

My friend are you short and you wish you were tall? 
Are you fat and you just wish you were slim? 
Or is reverse the case over here? 
Just keep calm because there is someone who loves you the way you are. 

I was communicating with a cute friend some days back,
 and she complained so much about her height, she said she was 5ft tall and she was not in any way happy about it.
I told her about how much some people wish that they had her stature,
  I am happy she smiled at the end of the day.

But what about you dear friend, how often will you complain? 
How often will you hate your shape and your face? 
How long will you continue to say wrong things to yourself? 
When will
root_title: You Are Special The Way You Are Dear Friend.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: You Can Always Become A Better Person By Improving On Your Personality.
body:
Personality has a long way to go in an individual's life, I have heard stories of people who have lost opportunities because they have a bad personality .

![images (29).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXn8wq7uLnmEYaXXSjeSp53J3ssYaT1ZNxYntByM8TvaS/images%20(29).jpeg)

Personality means the way you carry yourself, the way you move around, the way you speak, and most especially the way you handle issues. 

I understand the fact that no one is perfect and we all have our flaws but one great mistake any human can make is to refuse to give room for improvement, grow daily,  improve on your weakness and make yourself a better person everyday .

Personality differs and people can never be the same,  but one thing is certain and that is, if you can give room for improvement, you will always become the best you can be. 

[Image Source](https://www.google.com.ng/search?q=improvement+on+personalty+make+you+a+better+person&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=inv&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjNmvKS0fTaAhWPe8AKHYmRCswQ
root_title: You Can Always Become A Better Person By Improving On Your Personality.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gold Is Valuable But If You Do Not Understand It's Value,  You Will Loose It Easily.
body:
There are precious materials, there are precious properties, there are precious individuals that are usually taken for granted. 

Some of us observe from a distance and we quietly watch the way some individuals play with the heart of those who love them, they treat those individuals like a piece of trash because they don't know the value of what they have. 

![unnamed (5).jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmanRi2FELWUChdGPmB8qUESX5PrqaGUKYrikGr5Uneqjo/unnamed%20(5).jpg)

I use to argue initially that taking people for granted was gender based,  I felt the male gender was the cruel one that treated ladies like a piece of trash, but my opinion changed when I meet some ladies who treated guys who love them like a piece of trash as well. 

Value the precious individuals with a beautiful heart of gold that you have around you,  please do not take them for granted in any way in order to avoid a life of misery. 

[Image Credit](https://www.google.com.ng/search?q=value+the+precious+individuals+in+your+life&client=ms-a
root_title: Gold Is Valuable But If You Do Not Understand It's Value,  You Will Loose It Easily.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day Six: I Am Grateful For Reasons To Smile.
body:
Smiling is one thing I love to do,  little and I mean very little things make me smile and it will take an extra effort to make me frown. 
A young man walked up to me one day and asked me for the reason why I smiled all the time,  I was so surprised at the question because I never expected that anyone will ask such a question. 

![IMG_20180514_190710_184.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaGcRcY7fshy8Evh9qJhZk1aA7nkL6T5GTHhs9n4evApX/IMG_20180514_190710_184.JPG)

I didn't even have any good reason for smiling but I cannot still do without smiling. 
I realized one day that smiling occurs as a result of the joy that comes from within. I now understand the difference between happiness and joy. 

![IMG_20180311_141925_474.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdexarz1srawqHmxvjLDPRSKbtBx6FoEPnF68AKnFz6cx/IMG_20180311_141925_474.JPG)

Joy is more of an inbuilt thing and sometimes when you have nothing to excite you,  you just have everything reason to reflect an happy mood. 

I have noticed that there are people who do
root_title: Gratitude Day Six: I Am Grateful For Reasons To Smile.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 8: I Am Grateful For Strength.
body:
It is another day to be grateful for something and today I am grateful for life.
I woke up this morning with pains,
It was as if I should stay in bed all day,
 I turned from one edge of the bed to another,
as I wished that the night could come back,
at least, that would have been a silly excuse for me to remain in bed,
but the time will never get reversed, so I knew that I had to get up.
https://thoughtcatalog.files.wordpress.com/2017/04/tamara-bellis-1562531.jpg?w=786
Getting out of bed became something I could not do,
I felt totally weak and the pain became intense,
I could sacrifice some minutes to lie down and regain my strength,
so I decided to lie down for some time as my mind ran through the things I had to do for the day,
I looked at the time and I wondered if I will be able to accomplish all that I had to accomplish,
I said a word of prayer to my creator and I forced myself up,
I started doing the things I had to do and it looked as if I will not be able to accomplish it,
but at the end of the day,
root_title: Gratitude Day 8: I Am Grateful For Strength.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's Talk About It With @oluwatobiloba.  It Is All About Love,  Life and Relationships.
body:
Oh my goodness, it is a beautiful Saturday again and I am so excited for the gift of life and protection. I am happy to see that my friends and that is you and you are alive to see another episode of let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba. 
It has been a blessed week and I am grateful to the giver of good things for everything that is to come.
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/wix26iedu7.jpg)

Friends, we do not have any guest or even question for today but I want to share some of the things I have learnt over time. 
Some of this things I have learnt are through personal experience while some are things I have learnt through books and  from others as well,  so enjoy dear friends. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/csggmwclwx.jpg)
* You should never tie your happiness to anyone because you may remain unhappy all through your life. 

* Learn to be grateful for the little you have,  through it,  bigger things become achievable. 

* When you help humans,  never expect them to repay you with good because it never h
root_title: Let's Talk About It With @oluwatobiloba.  It Is All About Love,  Life and Relationships.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Letter To My Lovely Mother.
body:
I was carrying out a duty that I considered normal around last week,  
and someone who has been watching said to me,
 you are very strong,
I smiled as I replied I took after my Mum. 
Those words sounded normal, 
But then I began to think about it and then I realized,
That my Mum has indeed been a strong and lovely person. 
I remember when Dad will upset her so much that she will be moved to tears,
She will look at me and say, 
I am enduring all these for the sake of my kids, 
I don't want them to suffer, 
My mama will sell all that she has because she wants her children to look good, 
She is quick to forgive and highly emotional, 
When I was a teenager,  I misbehaved, 
Dad will hit me so hard, but my Mum will hug me, 
And she will say I know you are not a bad child, 
I know you are going to make me laugh and smile, 
I know you are my future. 

She never spoilt me, 
She taught me how to cook,  wash and make a home, 
I have the attributes of a loving mother even as a young girl because mama raised me well.
root_title: A Letter To My Lovely Mother.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Love of a Mother.
body:
I was standing by the road side today waiting for the arrival of a vehicle that will take me to my destination.
Right beside me,  I noticed a woman who wanted to purchase school things for her son,  she was obviously tired and stressed but her son just resumed school so she had to get him ready for school. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/py7v52bn6p.jpg)
I noticed the pain in her eyes when she wanted to get something for her son but she had to purchase a smaller one since she didn't have enough fund to get the one she wanted .  I could tell through her countenance that she wanted to get the best quality for her son but she didn't have the means. 

This little incident almost brought tears to my eyes because it also made me remember some of the things my Mum did when I gained admissions, but that is a story for another day. 
Thanks a lot for coming around, I am @tobi.
root_title: The Love of a Mother.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience in the Village (First Episode)
body:
It was a beautiful morning, we all woke up anticipating  where we will be sent to serve our nation for a year. 
Some of us were scared,  some were anxious, some were worried, while others were carefree. 
At last,  the time to collect our letters came and we were given our letters, the reaction the letters brought was different, while some screamed for joy,  others cried and some were just indifferent as expected. 

I received my letter with a mixed feeling because the location was strange to me, I accepted fate and moved with other people who were also going towards that direction. 
When we arrived at the city, I realized I had a partner she was also a young lady,  so we went to check out our location together. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/f2xnudfvwh.jpg)
On getting to the place,  I realized it was really bushy,  it was the definition of a typical village,  the houses were made with mud .
I was shocked at what I saw because I didn't know there was a place like that,  I felt like running away, but on a s
root_title: My Experience in the Village (First Episode)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Lovely couple in the village.
body:
There is this couple in the village that I love and respect so much,  they really have a special place in my heart .
For a couple in the village to call themselves special and beautiful names (it is really a big deal), most people in the village call their spouses by their children's name, and they even quarell most of the time. 
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/i9xafuuvb8.jpg)
[Image Credit](https://www.nairaland.com/3364541/pre-wedding-photos-see-beautiful)

This beautiful couple love each other so much that they barely leave each other, a young couple with two lovely kids admire and appreciates each other publicly. 
To other villagers,  they feel this young couples are just being too dramatic but what I see in their eyes is pure love. 

One other interesting fact about their story is that it is an inter-tribal marriage, a lot of inter-tribal marriages result in abuse and insults from friends and families, but this amazing couple do not inteferrance into their love or family affairs. 

Love is a beautiful t
root_title: Lovely couple in the village.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience in the Village (Eleventh Episode).
body:
I was smiling yesterday, as I discussed with one of my student about the success of the carol programme,  we laughed as we talked about a lot of things. 
Suddenly we heard someone screaming, the voice sounded very familiar, we knew it was Faith's mother, she kept on screaming for help as so many people ran to the scene. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/kar640iuyy.jpg)
I watched from a distance and I heard that this young woman with seven (7) kids had just lost her husband. 
Her first daughter faith,  who is a student of our school started rolling on the floor as she kept on screaming to see her father.

The most crazy part about this event is the fact that this young couple are just trying to build their lives and that of their kids,  I also learnt that the husbands family plan to take over everything the husband left behind. 
I just hope I will be able to help in my own little way.
root_title: My Experience in the Village (Eleventh Episode).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: There is Always Room for Different Opinions.
body:
Our lives should not be lived to please anyone, the truth remains that no matter how hard we try to please people,  a lot of individuals will always have different views or opinions about us. 


https://cdn-themeaningfullif.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/women_and_men_Different_but_equal-835x415.jpg

[Credit](https://cdn-themeaningfullif.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/women_and_men_Different_but_equal-835x415.jpg)

About two days ago,  I boarded a motorcycle to a specific location, when I arrived at the destination, the driver did not have change so I had to leave my money with him,  he actually collected it without even saying thank you,  I ignored and walked away. 
However,  today a different thing happened, when I arrived at my destination, the driver did not have change to give me as well,  but this time around I pleaded with him to help me search for change,  so he had to leave the change with me. 
I thanked him but it was obvious that he was not very happy about the money he dropp
root_title: There is Always Room for Different Opinions.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Kids in Orphanage are Indeed Happy.
body:
I use to think that the kids in orphanage will be very sad,  depressed and all that,  I use to think they will feel they will feel unnoticed and not important. 
But,  I was proved wrong when I visited those kids,  the love around was just too much,  I was moved to tears when I saw how the deaf,  crippled  and other kids in the orphanage, jumped and played around us. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/v45y5rne4c.jpg)

However, I was happy that I could spend time with those kids and we really had fun. 
I then realized how ungrateful some of us have been, some of us who are complete without any disability are usually moody and sad while those who have issues are these lively. 
I learnt the importance of being grateful for being complete.  

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/i6y08vskxa.jpg)
Christmas is really a beautiful season, it is a time to love and share and I love the fact that I am a Christian. 
Thanks a lot for coming around, I am @tobi,  stay blessed and loved.
root_title: The Kids in Orphanage are Indeed Happy.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Grateful for Safety.
body:
Today, I feel really grateful for safety. Arriving safely at your destination is really a big deal these days, the level of accidents on the road is very scary, but since the good book has told us that those of us who trust in God are save from every evil, I don't think I have any reason to get worried and scared.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/kar640iuyy.jpg)
I am feeling very grateful today because just as I set out this evening on a very short journey,  I entered a bus from the garage and just as it moved,  a long vehicle which appeared to have lost it's break ran from the back,  it would have just cleared the bus I was inside from the road but nothing of such happened. 

Just about five (5)kilometeres ahead,  we saw two cars that just had accident, it was a very sad and scary scene and I felt bad for those it happened to, then I realized it is very important to be grateful for everything we have which includes the ability to move around safely. 
Rather than  thinking about your problems dear friends, I
root_title: Grateful for Safety.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Christmas Season is always a Beautiful One.
body:
The Christmas and new year season is usually a time filled with so much joy, merriment and celebration.
It is also a time when family members come together to spend time with each other,  it is usually a time where family members have reunion. 

https://speckyboy.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/christmaswallpapers9.jpg

However,  this season is usually filled with a lot of spending and some people spend all they have been trying to save since January during this period. 
But,  one thing that remains special to me during this season is the fact that,  it is a season of love and giving, it is a season of memorable events. 

A lot of people work all through this lives and they usually do not have time to spend with family and friends,  but this amazing season will take a lot of people's attention away from work and get it focused a little bit on their loved ones. 
In a lot shell,  I love Christmas, have a wonderful Christmas celebration friends,  and you also have to bear in mind that it is all about the risen C
root_title: Christmas Season is always a Beautiful One.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: There is a Reason to Love Again.
body:
Hello beautiful hearts, I want to share something very special that I have learnt, I hope you will learn from it as well,  I also anticipate to learn through the comment section. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/hdtvu20dss.jpg)
In life,  it is not possible for everyone to love you the same way you love them,  there will be a difference definitely, sometimes the attitude of those we love can make us stop loving. 
Yes,  sometimes we give our all to some people, only for us to get jilted and betrayed.  During such periods, we feel like all hope is lost and we even promise ourselves never to love again. 

But,  I have to come to realize that nobody's attitude is good enough to make you stop loving,  it is essential to guard your heart jealously but you also need to love completely. 
Sometimes, you need to learn to forget all that happened in the past and then surrender you heart to love totally,  you only need to watch out to avoid falling into the same trap again. 
Our little act of love can change the hearts
root_title: There is a Reason to Love Again.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Good Reputation is a Beautiful Thing.
body:
It is so sad that the value of respect and good reputation has become a case of the past for the people of this generation, we seem to easily forget that we have names to build and keep. 
Everything should not just be abut the money we make,  it should also be about what someone who lives close to you has to say about you. 

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/60/b7/a5/60b7a5854a7d4fe5728ccf752a98fc77.jpg
[Image Source](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/60/b7/a5/60b7a5854a7d4fe5728ccf752a98fc77.jpg)

The society is gradually loosing it's value,  because only  those with money are celebrated, either the money was obtained through a good or dubious means, while people of integrity and value are left aside.
I wanted to contact someone and the person I wanted to get the contact from was already telling me that  I should be careful with him because he is a womanizer, you can imagine that some people do not have any reputation to sustain at all. 

However,  I felt it was necessary to remind my friends this evening, about
root_title: A Good Reputation is a Beautiful Thing.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Spirit of Appreciation Attracts Blessing.
body:
It is very necessary and important to learn how to say thank you for all things we receieve and for things that are to come. 
It is essential to most especially say a big thank you to everyone and everything that has being of help to you in one way or the other. 

https://www.cityguideny.com/columnpic2/in-the-spirit.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.cityguideny.com/columnpic2/in-the-spirit.jpg)

Appreciation uplifts an individual, appreciation makes a person embib the spirit of humility, appreciation strengthens the mind and the soul. 

There are people who do not know how to appreciate others, and this has caused a lot of issue for them because this wrong attitude could stop blessings from flowing into a person' life. 
So today friends, I want you to appreciate your parents, family, your spouse, your kids. The spirit of appreciation is a great one.
root_title: The Spirit of Appreciation Attracts Blessing.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's Talk About It With @oluwatobiloba.
body:
Hello lovers,  I hope you had time to relax and play with your friends and family members this lovely weekend, did I just hear you say only kids play?No dear friend, adults should play as well, it should not be about work all the time. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/csggmwclwx.jpg)
It is with great joy that I welcome you to this great episode of let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba, our guest today is a young man who is obviously in love and in trouble at the same time. 
Actually. He meet this pretty young lady that he was attracted to,  they started their love game, even if they were both students one could see the portray of emotions through all they do. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/580wf1bjng.jpg)
However, this young man in love found out that his girlfriend has been sending her nude pictures to other guys to obtain money from him,  he was crazy when he first got to know but when she pleaded with him that it was a thing of the past,  he decided to let it go for the sake of love. 

As a student,
root_title: Let's Talk About It With @oluwatobiloba.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience in the Village (Tenth Episode).
body:
Today was a good day for me in the village because I really had fun,  staying with kids gets me really excited.
Today was indeed special because we had our carol party in the school where I teach,  we have been rehashing for some time and the presentation was indeed marvellous,  I loved it so much,  it turned out that my students even performed more than I expected, and their parents were proud of them. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/hqmse3mk1t.jpg)
We started the day by going round the village with the father Christmas to inform them of the party,  we danced around and we went back to prepare for the party. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/o9thhnm69k.jpg)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/6eblzn9efk.jpg)
The party started late but the presentation was indeed outstanding and beautiful, I wish you were there to see your girl,  @tobi.

Stay blessed and beautiful, have a wonderful Christmas celebration ahead.
root_title: My Experience in the Village (Tenth Episode).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience in the Village (Episode Nine).
body:
Hello friends, you are welcome to another episode of my experience in the village, my stay in the village has been worth it because I know that at the end of every day,  I have amazing friends to share my story with. 

Today's experience is a little bit different and that is because I saw something strange, I know you know what earthworms look like, I have also seen earthworms as well but this particular one caught my attention. 
I noticed this earthworm was longer than anyone I had ever seen,  I moved close to it and I took a picture because it looked strange,  the students over here however told me that it had the ability to stretch even longer than it appears in this picture. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/rubxg2v9fo.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/zpnttwre0l.jpg)

I was also informed that,  it is called the earthworm of wealth,  which is the earthworm known to bring good fortune, this made made me even more surprised but I learnt something new in the village which I must also  share with my good
root_title: My Experience in the Village (Episode Nine).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience in the Village (Episode Eight).
body:
While construction process was on going in school today, the vice principal asked me to help with wearing of nails. 
When I heard the words,  "wearing nails" I wondered what it meant and I asked for explanation.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/vnhrh292ik.jpg)
I was told that  the nails to be used for the roofing will definitely be exposed to rain drops, so in order to prevent the nails from getting rusted on time,  it had to be covered.
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/u55ys1wnxy.jpg)
I took the nails one after the other,  the way I was taught and at the end of the day I felt very proud of myself. 
I am glad I learnt something new about construction today,  all thanks to the village. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/d8e66rsu9k.jpg)
Stay blessed and loved dear friends, thanks for coming around,I am @tobi.
root_title: My Experience in the Village (Episode Eight).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Consistency is required for success.
body:
Consistency is the key to greatness and definite life achievement.  Consistency keeps you on top of your game and plans. 
When you are consistent with doing the right thing, growth becomes the reward. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/w4no4luj08.jpg)
There is no greater gain than becoming the best at what you do or love to do.
One mistake some people make is in following the crowd,  they simply do things because they want to please others or because they want to get accepted, which is a very wrong motive. 

The right drive to work should be love and passion towards whatever we choose to do,  this will help us remain strong no matter what happens, it will help us to remain consistent and as such achieve the best from whatsoever we do. 
Ensure you do what you love,  take a day at a time,  do not choke yourself with worry,  love completely and give within your power. 
Stay blessed and loved.  Tobi cares
root_title: Consistency is required for success.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience in the Village (Episode Seven).
body:
My stay in the village has been awesome and annoying on some occasions, the village is sometimes a peaceful place to be and on other occasions, it could be an annoying place to be. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/09g7usmtj3.jpg)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/b5546tgfgi.jpg)

One thing I have found amusing about this village is that the students could be called out of class at anytime to carry out the bidding of the school owners,  such as fetching water,  cutting grasses and other things.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/gdmw1fnf07.jpg)
The one that surprised me that happened recently was when the children were sent out of class to go and get plank for the construction of a building, I wanted to know where they will get it, so I decided to follow them.  The distance to get to the place was really far that I started to feel bad for the students. 
I wondered why children who have been sent to school will be turned into labourers,  I guess that is one of the things that happen to people who get education in
root_title: My Experience in the Village (Episode Seven).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's Talk About It With @oluwatobiloba (Love,  Life and relationships).
body:
Beautiful friends, I welcome you to this amazing episode of let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba. 
I must confess that I have missed you as much as I have missed the show,  it has really been a while. 
I almost missed the show today as a result of my health,  but I thank God I am strong enough to write this afternoon, so grab a seat and enjoy dearies. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/csggmwclwx.jpg)
Today's show is going to be an interesting and interactive one because I will be throwing out questions from our lovely guests and I am sure you will have beautiful answers. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/7lsa97tm6i.jpg)
Guest1: Hi Tobi,  what will you do if you find your man on bed with another woman? 

Guest2: Can you have sex with a man or woman on your first date? 

Guest 3: Hi Tobi, what do you say to a guy who is madly crushing on you and he is asking you to tell him about your relationship? 

Guest 4: What do you have to say about people who  have best friends of opposite partners apart from their s
root_title: Let's Talk About It With @oluwatobiloba (Love,  Life and relationships).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Beautiful Art Works of an Amazing Entrepreneur.
body:
Hello friends, I am going to share the work of someone who means a lot to me, my kid brother is a graphic designer who has learnt from home without having any boss to tutor him on how to go about it. 
He stays awake almost every night trying to practice how to become a better designer with a system that is as good as dead. 

I am so proud of him because he is becoming better daily at the things he does, I am going to share some of his works here and you can get yours done as well at a very cheap price. 
Contact Mail: adekunlemercy95@gmail.com

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/7361h34sn2.jpg)
