author: oluwatobiloba
title: Patience Is  an esential ingredient in Life.
body:
Hello friends, I welcome you once again to my blog today and I must say thank you for always coming around. 

I learnt something new today which I would love to share with you and it is something about patience.  I have heard about being patient, read about being patient and even talk about being patient. 
The habit of patience is easy to discuss but it is difficult to practice. 

I was supposed to get something today and while I patiently waited for it to get to my turn,  I saw people struggling to get it and some of them were given without stress,  so I got up and then began to struggle for it as well,  during that process,  I had my button removed and I was pushed around only for me to be called upon at the same time when my friend who has been sitting comfortably was called. I thought about all I had to go through which was a very stressful experience.
root_title: Patience Is  an esential ingredient in Life.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Say Thank You For The Little Things People Do For You.
body:
Most times we complain so much about our circumstances and the things around us that we fail to realize that there are things we should atleast say a thank you for, we should be thankful for the things we have and for the things people do for us. 
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/1x0t935842.jpg)

Sometimes people go out of their way to do things for us and when we end up not appreciating the things they do,  we break their heart as well as their willingness to ever do anything to please us .

Most times the things that look really minute to us are those things people have gone out of their way to do for us, so no matter how irrelevant it seems to you,  just say thank you. 

It is important that I also mention that the thank you that you will say to someone will not remove anything from you, which means there is no big deal in saying thank you after all. 

Thanks for reading, I remain your very own Nigerian Lady @oluwatobiloba. 
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)

Thanks to @gbenga for getting thi
root_title: Say Thank You For The Little Things People Do For You.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: What is Stopping Your Happiness?
body:
I have realized that a lot of people who are unhappy in life usually have a reason for not being happy,  their state of unhappiness or sadness is usually attached to something.
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/8174e5anx8.jpg)

The truth be told, 
Some of the reasons why some individuals are usually not happy is a serious one and when we hear them we cannot but feel sad for them and wish that life was a little bit more fair to them. 


Some set of individuals tell themselves that they will become happy when they get married, or when they have children, some will even say they will become happy after they have graduated from school. 

But wait for a moment and think,  
What if the graduation, marriage or the much anticipated job never comes through, does that mean you will stay unhappy forever? 

I know that sometimes life can be really unfair to us,  but our decision to attach our happiness to the things we are expecting could make us remain unhappy forever. 
So,  dear friend let your happiness come from withi
root_title: What is Stopping Your Happiness?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I am Grateful for Shelter, What about you?
body:
Hello beautiful reader, I welcome you once again to my blog this morning and I hope you enjoy reading. 

The constant and heavy rainfall had made me realize that I should be grateful for the things I have and the things that seem irrelevant. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/1wkng1e4j6.jpg)

I laid on my bed last night as I heard the sound of a heavy downpour on my roof. I wrapped myself with a thick blanket to save myself from the excessive cold. 
I tried to close my eyes to get a good rest because I know the cold will make me have a comfortable sleep. 

I then thought of the fact that some people are under the rain who do not have a shelter over their head or even a thick blanket like mine to cover themselves. 
I wish I could find people like that and then bring them to my home to stay with me or even provide any help in any way I can.

The thought of some of those abandoned kids who live under the bridge the thought of that almost brought tears to my eyes.
I am really grateful that I have a roof over my h
root_title: I am Grateful for Shelter, What about you?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Nineteenth Episode of Let's Talk About it With @oluwatobiloba.
body:
Hello dear friends and viewers,  I welcome you to another great episode of let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba. 
I hope you had a great week? Mine was amazing but really stressful (I wake up with pains all over my body virtually everyday) but I believe this week will be different by his grace. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/csggmwclwx.jpg)

We do not have a guest for this week but I will be sharing some of the things I have learnt over time with you. 
Please feel free to support or criticize any of the ideas I will be sharing here because no one is an island of knowledge and I stand corrected any day and at anytime. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/0cgou8e05h.jpg)

### Relationship Lessons Learnt.

* Do not ever say you are in a serious relationship until it leads to marriage because even marriages fail. 

* Make sure that you pay proper attention to yourself, take care of yourself, always look good and presentable. 

* It is very easy for some people to fall in and out of love anytime, so don't be d
root_title: The Nineteenth Episode of Let's Talk About it With @oluwatobiloba.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Look Strong and Stay Beautiful Dear Friend.
body:
I have realized that the best way to appear is strong and beautiful. 
Circumstances of life will want to make us look weak,  helpless and as well hopeless.
Circumstances of life will make everything appear useless and unworthy. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ezjw7ukcps.jpg)
But,  one thing is definite and sure, 
We can be strong against all storms of life, 
We can fight and conquer any form of life problems if only we realize that we have the strength to conquer within us. 

No matter what you feel or what you are going through, you should have the mindset of overcoming because you can always overcome any challenge no matter how difficult it seem. 
Stay strong and beautiful dear friend and enjoy the good things of life. 

Thanks for reading, I remain your very own Nigerian Lady @oluwatobiloba. 
I host a relationship show here every Saturday, I hope to see you around tomorrow, stay loved. 

You can always contact me with any relationship issue through this means :
Mail:adekunlemercy95@gmail.com

 ![image](
root_title: Look Strong and Stay Beautiful Dear Friend.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Danger and Benefits of Being a Workaholic.
body:
Have you seen or lived with a workaholic before? 
I choose to call these set of people workaholics because they do not mind forfeiting every other thing for work. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/id5j55vdmr.jpg)

These set of humans are those who see everything including their families as secondary while their work remains the main priority. 

At some point in my life,  I guess I became a workaholic as well,  my decision to make it good for myself and to be able to take care of my family was my drive. 
I became stressed out,  I became very pale and at the end of the day, I realized that I spent the money I made on taking care of my health. 
It was since that time I decided to make my health an important factor, I decided never to take work above my health and family especially if you work under someone. 

The most annoying part about working under someone and being a workaholic is that you can be replaced at any time. 
The fact that you work with all you have for someone,  does not mean they cannot get rid
root_title: The Danger and Benefits of Being a Workaholic.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Life is Beautiful If Only You Believe It Is.
body:
Life is beautiful if only we can see it that way, 
There are different ways people view life, 
Some people see life as being unfair to them, 
Some people see life as being cruel,
Some people see life as an opportunity to enjoy, 
While others see life as a place to suffer before they pass on. 

I once heard a woman say she does not mind suffering all through the time she has to spend on earth,  because she knows she will go to heaven to rest after the suffering on earth.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/uphwi9lptd.jpg)

On another hand,  I heard a woman say she will do anything including stealing to make sure she has enough money to enjoy herself while on earth,  because she does not know how long she has to live before she dies. 

This illustration is to show that people view things differently and people's understand to situations as well differ. 

But,  no matter what we feel or believe we should know that life is supposed to be beautiful for us all but that is only if we understand that we are meant to li
root_title: Life is Beautiful If Only You Believe It Is.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Cannot Imagine What Life Would Look Like If I Had Lost My Family Members.
body:
Some things happen in life that could make one stay speechless for a long period of time. 
I woke up this morning with a strange feeling but I just had to commit everything to God's hands since he is the only one who knows the future .

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/rcc913mp1x.jpg)

While I was at work during the day, 
I felt the urge to call my baby sister and then I called her immediately, 
Only for me to find out that my entire family members were involved in a terrible car accident. 
Every member of my immediate family were going on that journey,  I was the only one left aside. 
But,  miraculously the car that was moving on a high speed without tyre came to a stop and the tyre that rolled out on the expressway did not hit anyone. 

I was confused,  I wondered what my life would have been like without my family members. 
They mean so much to me and they have been the only shoulder I have been able to cry on.  I am happy I didn't loose them. 

Thanks for reading dear friends. 
 ![image](https://img.estee
root_title: I Cannot Imagine What Life Would Look Like If I Had Lost My Family Members.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Time has the power to determine a lot of things.
body:
I have learnt through the lessons that life teaches that time determines a lot of things. The things we face in life, the actions we take the decisions we fear, could turn out better if only we allow time to determine a lot of things in our lives.
Time really does determine so many things in life, time has a lot of ways to save us from doubts and worries?
Are you worried about something, do you have fear  about what the future holds for you?
Do you have doubts about if your friend is a good person or not?

https://media.allure.com/photos/5b4ce00ebfef050b4631c647/16:9/w_1280,c_limit/Numerology%2520occultism%2520numbers%2520resized%25202000px.jpg
[Image credit](https://www.allure.com/story/numerology-how-to-calculate-life-path-destiny-number)

Then just give it time, time will definitely tell, time will determine a lot of things, time will tell if your friends are good enough for you.
Time will determine if your friends are real, time will determine if the people around you are trustworthy individuals.
Time wi
root_title: Time has the power to determine a lot of things.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How Often Do You Listen to the Peaceful Voice That Speaks From Within.
body:
I have come to realize that as humans we love to fight, 
And sometimes we end up fighting the things we should love.
We struggle for the things we are to get with ease, 
All because we fail to listen to little facts, 
There are simple life fact we should pay attention to, 
These fact that will help us avoid problems in life, 
But because we are not observant, 
We ignore the still gentle voice that tells us what to do. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/dabhu1l7ls.jpg)

This voice is calm,  still and peaceful, 
It guides and directs us, 
It tells us what to do, 
It helps us to avoid issues in life. 

But the issue is, how often do you listen to this still voice that will help you avoid issues? 
It is time to begin to listen to that still and calm voice that will help us avoid life troubles. 
It's in you dear friend. 

Thanks a lot for coming around, I remain your own Nigerian Lady @oluwatobiloba. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)
Thanks to @gbenga for getting this badge for every Nigerian on St
root_title: How Often Do You Listen to the Peaceful Voice That Speaks From Within.

The rainfall in this area has just been so serious that one will wonder if there is nothing else attached to it, it rains virtually every day in this area and it just makes one want to sleep and sleep all day but in order to avoid hunger and poverty, we know very well that we need to work and even work well at that.
Let's get straight to the relationship talks for today, you know I can always count on you.......

## RELATIONSHIP QUESTION FOR THE WEEK.
There was a trending argument on social media this week about allowing your partner have a "bestie" of the opposite sex, while some were of the opinion that t
root_title: Presenting The Eighteenth Episode of Let's Talk About it With @oluwatobiloba.  She wants me to remain a best friend while she has a lover.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Through All That We Go Through, There is Usually Chance to say Halleluyah.
body:
Personally,  I feel halleluyah is a song of victory,
Halleluyah, is a song of breakthrough,
Halleluyah is a song of possibilities. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/oewpijlx7u.jpg)
I have discovered that we go through a lot of hardship,
We go through a lot of pain and stress,
We go through lots of hard times as humans. 
But,  through it all a sound of halleluyah comes through. 

All that is required is patience and absolute patience, 
A type of patience that breaks protocols,
A type of patience that has faith mixed with it. 

The sound of halleluyah is assured if only you can have faith,  trust and allow patience be your watch word. 

Thank you for reading, I remain your very own @oluwatobiloba. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)
Thanks to @gbenga for getting this badge for every steemian on Steemit.
root_title: Through All That We Go Through, There is Usually Chance to say Halleluyah.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Another Tail of a Village Teacher
body:
Just as I have promised to keep you updated about my experience as a village teacher,  I am going to tell you something new about this environment today. 


The total population of the individuals here to be around 200 if I am not mistaken, and everyone only has one water source. 

There is a community borehole where everyone in the village fetch water from as they have to wait for each other to fetch,  there is also a limited time to the number of times an individual can fetch water from the borehole. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/82czmb7l9i.jpg)

Here is the image of some children fetching water for their family consumption .

Thanks for reading,  stay tuned to my blog to enjoy more stories..... 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)
Thanks to @gbenga for getting this badge for every Nigerian on Steemit.
root_title: Another Tail of a Village Teacher

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Grateful For Rainfall.
body:
I have no idea if the gratitude contest is still on but I am grateful for raindrops. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/x5jgia6fdk.jpg)
Rainy season are usually periods most people wish for, 
The farmers pray for it to come, 
Others who are not farmers as well wish for it because this is a period where everywhere becomes calm. 
When rain falls, heat disappears and everywhere becomes cool and calm. 

Lovers as well, love this period because it is a period of intimacy for them. 
To have rain fall is a beautiful thing because it makes the environment cool and convenient. 
To have good things come to us naturally is something to be grateful for,  so I am grateful for the opportunity of rainfall. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)

I am grateful to @gbenga for getting this badge for every Nigerian on Steemit.
root_title: Grateful For Rainfall.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Seventeenth Episode of Let's Talk About it with @oluwatobiloba.  What will make a woman proud to say her husband beats her?
body:
Hello, amazing readers, it is with great pleasure that I welcome you to another thrilling and mind-blowing episode of let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba.
I am so honoured to have you around gain this Saturday, I must confess that the love shown to me by amazing friends who have continued to support this programme have been the reason behind its constant success and I want to really appreciate your constant love and support, may God bless your good heart for me.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/t8uj83i91r.jpg)

## RELATIONSHIP QUESTION FOR THE WEEK.

This week's episode is going to come in a different phase and I am excited about it, but before we go there, I have this question to ask.
At what point in a woman's life do you think she will get used to the fact that her husband beats her, is it a crazy idea or something that is normal?

The reason why I am asking this question is that, I found myself in the midst of some women last week and one of them was telling her clique of friends about a man who has
root_title: The Seventeenth Episode of Let's Talk About it with @oluwatobiloba.  What will make a woman proud to say her husband beats her?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Life of a Village Teacher [Episode 3]. Meet My New Friend.
body:
The kids in the village are very lovely kids I must confess, especially when they know that you are quite different from their parents. 

I meet this young damsel some days back and she just kept staring at me,  I opened my arms to receive her and she came running to me. 

It is so unfortunate that most kids here are not properly taken care of and that is because their parents have too many kids,  so the kids grow up to become local farmers as well. 
Very few become educated amongst them. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ftzny2zvuw.jpg)

Here is blessing my pretty young friend ,  I thought she was a boy at first before her mother told me she was a baby girl. 
She keeps running to my house to check if I am around or not and then she follows me wherever I go. 

Stay tuned as I give you more gust about my experience in the village. 
I am @oluwatobiloba and I am saying thank you for reading. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)

Thanks to @gbenga for getting this badge for every Nigerian on Steemit
root_title: The Life of a Village Teacher [Episode 3]. Meet My New Friend.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Life of a Village Teacher [Episode 2].A Beautiful Village Scene.
body:
I promised my readers about keeping them informed about the new things I learn in the village. 
I decided to capture this when I found it today.  

![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ad8kmgmo4w.jpg)
This place serves as a kitchen to a woman in the village, here is the stool she sits on to cook,  and a grinding stone which is used in place of an electric blender.
Thanks for reading, I will keep you informed.
root_title: The Life of a Village Teacher [Episode 2].A Beautiful Village Scene.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating My Baby Sister.
body:
Today I will be celebrating my little pumpkin and baby.
I am proud of the woman she is becoming, the way she carries herself in a high esteem is indeed amazing.

![Screenshot_20190322-131730.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPz9VnBd6sD29LHNAKKpiy8zNiDgxgCwtRVbU1HSQhhQm/Screenshot_20190322-131730.png)

This young pretty lady happens to be my kid sister, one who is really strong willed and will not give up irrespective of what others say about her.
She is also very smart and intelligent, I remember our parents use to compare her great level of intelligence with mine back then, which use to make me feel bad.
But right now, I am matured and I encourage her to even study hard.

![Screenshot_20190315-121248.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR8whQpNZj5ZTk9bMdnszZYNmidoNz9SvytjPT68L9Ti/Screenshot_20190315-121248.png)

Don't worry baby girl, you know big sister always has your back irrespective of what happens.
You are going to become successful and your generation and generations to come will surely feel yo
root_title: Celebrating My Baby Sister.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Live of a Village Teacher... (1st Episode)
body:
Hello readers, I am glad to have you visit my blog today and I hope you enjoy reading these new series I am going to begin today. 
This is no way a fiction as it is based in true life story and experience .

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/573ynjlorb.jpg)

There is usually a national call for youth corpers to serve their father land after graduation from school.  The service period will last for one year and then after this period the young man or lady begin his or her search to get employed. 

I received this call some weeks back and then I was posted to this village. 
I must confess that I have never seen a place like this before,  as a matter of fact I use to think I was very local until I found this place and the individuals who live therein. 

99 percent of the people who live here are farmers, I mean local farmers who only make use of hoes and cutlass and this makes the work a very stressful one to do. 

My duty in the village is to teach the only private secondary school that exists in the village.
root_title: The Live of a Village Teacher... (1st Episode)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Morning Filled with Beautiful Wishes.
body:
I woke up this morning with a mind filled with worries and fear, I decided to stay in bed some more because I was scared of what I was going to wake up to or what the day was going to look like.
I said some quick words of prayer with the hope that things get better, I closed my eyes and I slept back.

After some time, I knew I had to get up, I had acted lazy enough and it was time to get some things done, I didn't feel like sleeping any more so I wrapped myself and stayed on the bed as my mined flashed through a lot of things.
If only wishes were horses, if only my imaginations will come to pass, if only I will have the things my heart wish for, I know I will surely get them, but I wish they could be as fast as I want them.

As I laid on my bed wrapped in a soft blanket, I wished for a lot of things and I will share some of them with you my friends:

https://www.mantelligence.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Good-Night-Text-For-Her-post.jpg

I wish everything will just turn out well and fine.
I wish there will
root_title: A Morning Filled with Beautiful Wishes.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Love: Beautiful and Deadly.
body:
True love is beautiful,
True love is amazing,
True love has a deep understanding,
True love is priceless,
True love is dependable,
True love does not hurt,
True love does not lie,
True love produces absolute happiness.

https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/summer-flowering-perennial-modern-pink-high-res-stock-photography-126025934-1548366565.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&resize=480:*

[Image Credit](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/home/gardening/g2503/surprising-flower-meanings/)

Love could be the most beautiful thing in the world and it could also be the most bitter thing in the world, these conditions depends on the content of the situation and the hearts involved.
Some people fall in love and their lives become beautiful and meaningful, while others fall in love and they remain in mystery for life.


There is a clear difference between putting your entire heart into something true and good and putting your heart into something horrible.
Go for gold dear friends, take a good look be
root_title: Love: Beautiful and Deadly.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How Can You Live In Peace With A Talkative As An Introvert.
body:
I use to think that the best person to live with as an introvert is someone who likes to talk,  so that the house will not get too boring.  
But now,  I have realized that is only good if the individual involved will know when it is time to stay quiet or if the person just knows that you do not want to talk at that moment. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/5ofsegkawm.jpg)

There are people who never get tired of talking, they keep talking even if you are not reacting. 
You will think that after that topic they will stay quiet but that will not happen because they just keep bringing up topics over and over again. 

I believe that introverts like to think a lot,  they spend so much time thinking about what their next line of action should be and so on but staying with this person who likes to talk will not give space for that,  because that moment when you wanto relax,  it becomes a duty for a person like that to start talking again. 

Now,  I can say it is very difficult to live at peace with people who talk
root_title: How Can You Live In Peace With A Talkative As An Introvert.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: When Relationships Are Good,  The Society Becomes Beautiful.
body:
Relationships is the bedrock of the society,  it is what we see and hear about everyday, 
It is what basically rules the world, looking at things from the view of the family:
* relationship exists between parents. 
* relationship exist between the children. 
*relationship between individuals in the society either male or female. 
Everywhere and anywhere, relationships exist and issues associated with relationships exists as well. 

That is the reason behind the relationship show that comes up here every Saturday: let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba.  You can be a part of the show as well,  let us join hands to build lives by tackling relationship issues.


I'll be expecting you here tomorrow, it will be a great pleasure to have you all around. 
You can always send a message through. 
Mail: adekunlemercy95@gmail.com.
root_title: When Relationships Are Good,  The Society Becomes Beautiful.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Simple Reality of the Life we Live In.
body:
Sometimes, life looks unfair to us, 
Sometimes, people look wicked to us, 
Sometimes, circumstances seems unfavorable,
Sometimes, we seem not to find opportunities,
Sometimes, everything looks blank and empty. 

But..... 
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/2umbult29r.jpg)

All the time we should be strong, 
All the time we should try to be happy,
All the time we should hope for something better, 
All the time we should love, 
All the time we should give, 
And all the time we should smile. 

Thanks for reading, I remain your very own Nigerian Lady @oluwatobiloba. 
I run a relationship show every Saturday, I hope to see you around this weekend. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)
Thanks to @gbenga for getting this badge for every Nigerian on Steemit.
root_title: The Simple Reality of the Life we Live In.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How Strong Do You Think You Can Be When A Big Storm Hits You?
body:
Sometimes we think we are strong,
Sometimes we think we are bold, 
We say we can face anything,
We think we are the strongest type of human that exist, 
We think we are fearless, 
But we know there is one thing,
One very thing that we pray for,
Never to happen. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/vge6nsv1ed.jpg)

However, when our greatest fear finally happens, 
We feel helpless and hopeless,
We feel we have lost all that we have, 
And there is no hope for us anymore. 

There is a point in every man's life, 
When we just feel helpless, 
When our greatest fear eventually occurs,
People react in different ways. 

Some people give up totally,
Some people have to courage to fight, 
Some people have the strength to hope for something better. 

But through it all, 
You have to know that bad times do not last forever, 
Be strong,  be bold,
Be sure that you will overcome,
And success is assured. 
Personally, I love to praise through though times.
root_title: How Strong Do You Think You Can Be When A Big Storm Hits You?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: There Is A Reward For Every Action We Take.
body:
There is nothing in life without it's own consequence, either we do good or bad, there is always something from anything we do.
The activity of evil and wickedness has the reward of wickedness, while the reward of being good on the other hand brings about beautiful reward.

https://i0.wp.com/improvingteaching.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/Reward.jpg?fit=816%2C544&ssl=1
[Image Credit](https://improvingteaching.co.uk/2019/05/19/rewarding-students-should-we-if-so-how/)

There is nothing as beautiful as having a good reward for the good things we do, it might not be easy because we have humans who might just want to frustrate your effort whenever you want to do something good.
But, the truth is that, the good things we do with a sincere heart will always come back to us in beautiful ways.

https://mplusonline.blog/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/cover-image-01.jpg
[Image Credit](https://mplusonline.blog/2017/12/20/risk-reward-ratio/)

Do not be discouraged when it comes to being a good person, keep being good, kee
root_title: There Is A Reward For Every Action We Take.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: It Is Important That We Verify Information's Before Broadcasting It.
body:
This particular meessage making rounds about not travelling in and out Lagos in Nigeria with some specific transport companies is baffling to say the least.... 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/2gemas1n94.jpg)

How can rational individuals even adhere to such malicious utterances ...
For me it's a negative marketing strategy that would definitely result in a decline in the patronage of these companies on the said dates,i think it's hard time we check what we post online as youths
root_title: It Is Important That We Verify Information's Before Broadcasting It.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Meet These Twins of Totally Different Face and Characters.
body:
I just meet this kids and in less than two months we have been able to connect like sisters, they can be pretty frustrating sometimes anyways. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/krch6q2z5g.jpg)

There are periods when one wants to rest and these kids will come in and say Aunty you don't have to sleep. 
I love to have them around as they are pretty funny and I must confess that I love the disturbing attitude a little bit. 
They are twins but they have very different characters and they enjoy fighting as well.
root_title: Meet These Twins of Totally Different Face and Characters.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Fifteenth Episode of Let's Talk About It With @oluwatobiloba.  I thought I had Found Love but I Never Knew he was just another Liar and a Cheat.
body:
Wow, it is another cold and rainy Saturday morning at this end, you know that type of weather that wants to keep you in bed all through the day, the type that majorly wants to keep you indoor all through the day, thank goodness it is a weekend, so most people can have time to relax as they do not have to rush to work under the rain.
The only thing is that after the rain, everywhere becomes very muddy and then you have your shoes and even clothes stained most times, that is because of the bad road at this end.
Enough of the gist about the weather please, let's go straight to the business of the day. I cannot express how excited I am to have you here with me this morning, it has been your love that has kept the show going and I am so grateful that I have people I could always lean on. Thank you so much for being faithful to the show.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/csggmwclwx.jpg)

### REPORT FROM LAST WEEK'S EPISODE.
Kemi told me that the case is still quite serious has her husband's friend has refused to se

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Talking About Effort and Profits.
body:
So many times we get angry at the way things unfold or maybe results obtained from some of the things that we do. 
But,  for a second have we thought about the type of effort we put into the production of those things that we complain so much about? 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/hbxxm71v43.jpg)

This place I just moved into which happens to be a local place,  it is time for the harvest of some crops and some of the farmers have little or nothing to harvest. 
There are people who are very much angry about the fact that they have no produce on their farm, but some of them have forgotten that those periods they slept, some other farmers were busy working. 

This is not usually the case,  but most times, we reap what we sow, this means that we obtain our input of effort as a reward. 

P.S: Tomorrow is going to be another day for another mind blowing relationship gist,  you will not want to miss it for anything, ensure to be there. 
You can also send in Shout-outs and messages to your loved ones. See you arou
root_title: Talking About Effort and Profits.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Live Well, Have Less Worry
body:
I just got to know that it is very wrong to always think that everyone hates you. 
We all know that we live in a world with individuals who have very wicked hearts but the issue is that some people have become too consious of that fact,  that they become robbed off of their peace and rest of mind.
 
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/uphwi9lptd.jpg)

I know of people who do not have a minute of rest because they are always trying to eavesdrop people's conversation, just to be sure that they are not talking about them. 

There are some people who feel very uncomfortable if they see any gathering of family and friends where they are not invited and the next thing that comes to their mind is,  "maybe they are talking about me".

This attitude is very disturbing because when you keep thinking that everyone is against you, you get robbed off of the peace,  satisfaction and the joy that you desire. 

The best way I think we should live is to find happiness within ourselves. 
No matter how good you are,  not everyone
root_title: Live Well, Have Less Worry

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Little Children in the Village,  Killed This Animal, These Kids are Really Brave.
body:
I remember clearly that some weeks ago,  I informed my lovely readers about my relocation to this rural area which is however temporary. 

When I got to the place for the first time,  I complained and complained about the bad network, which has made me stop being active on the platform. 
There is a total absence of electricity as well,  as we have to depend totally on the availability of a generator to get power supply. 

There are things that are also extremely strange and sometimes exciting about this new environment and one of those things is what I will like to share with you. 

After school closed last week,  my students started running towards a particular direction and when I tried to find out what the problem was,  they told me they had found meat. 
They all moved towards the direction and they started digging until they finally found this bush meat. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/63a9bnxk0f.jpg)

This is what children in the advanced world will see and run away but this little children killed it
root_title: Little Children in the Village,  Killed This Animal, These Kids are Really Brave.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: This is the way Youths in Rural Areas Relax.
body:
Here is the way the youths in rural areas catch fun. 
This is an environment that there is absence of good network and electricity, so they go to farm and when they get home in the evening, they relax by playing football on the field. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ufgsufhx6x.jpg)

It is usually a combination of very young ones and the matured ones as well,  they shout and argue, but it is usually very obvious that they are catching fun. 

Even under the rain,  they keep playing the football with so much passion and zeal which describes their love for the game and the little period they have to catch fun and take their mind totally off work. 

Picture was taken with my mobile phone. 
I remain your very own humble Nigerian Lady @oluwatobiloba. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)
Thanks to @gbenga for distributing this badge to every Nigerian on Steemit.
root_title: This is the way Youths in Rural Areas Relax.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Call For Responsibility To Upcoming Parents
body:
At this age and time,  there is an increase in the number of youths who want to get married and have kids,  as a matter of fact, in Africa, if a married woman does not have a child of her own,  it is considered a major problem. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/arcwgbgtey.jpg)

The issue however is not in childbirth rather it is in the upbringing of the child.  
So many parents give birth and keep their children with people who will help take care of them either because they are too busy looking for a way to survive or because of financial hindrance. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/zxmjpuhb87.jpg)

Just last night,  I eavesdropped on a conversation between two little children and their grandma.
These kids are twins who have 6 other siblings distributed to people because their parents could not take care of them. 
Their grandma who happens to be from the maternal side, constantly rains abuses on their father, calling him an irresponsible man. 

The girls however told their grandma that she had the right to
root_title: A Call For Responsibility To Upcoming Parents

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Wrapped In His Loving Arms
body:
Oh what a wonderful lover, 
Such an amazing and complete lover, 
He is one who will always give you,
Reasons to love and keep loving. 

Even when I am confused, 
And I don't know what to do,
When I feel helpless and hopeless, 
And it just seem as if there will be no way out,

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/owq5uurpqm.jpg)

Those times when I cry silently,
Times when I groan in pain,
Those times when I feel lonely and scared, 
And I have no one to talk to. 

I hear a voice cool and calm, 
He speaks to me like a friend and a father, 
He reminds me of his love, 
And then I am assured,
That my lover is always by my side,
And he will not leave me for any reason. 


This friend and lover of mine, 
His name his Yahweh, 
Jehovah,  my rock, 
My peace and my defense,
He is all I got everyday and everytime. 
Thank you ever faithful redeemer.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)
Thanks to @gbenga for distributing this badge for every Nigerian on Steemit.
root_title: Wrapped In His Loving Arms

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Fourteenth Episode of Let's Talk About it With @oluwatobiloba.  I Did It For Love and now I am Filled With Regrets.
body:
Hello friends, it is with great pride that I welcome you to another amazing episode of let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba. Time runs very fast this days that sometimes one will just get amazed as to where we are running to, what more can we say than thank you to our creator for the gift of life and for sustenance.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/0cgou8e05h.jpg)

### Report From Last Week's Story.
Last week's episode was a very interesting one and a personal one as well, because it had to do with my very dear friend. I want to say a big thank you to everyone for assisting my friend, your words mean so much to me and I cannot thank you enough.

### RELATIONSHIP QUESTION FOR THE WEEK.
Do you think there is any big deal in having a pet name for your lover?
I know of this lovers who have been together for two (2) years and they still call each other by their individual names and even saved each other's contact with their regular names, I also know of this other lovers who have a special name for each other.
root_title: The Fourteenth Episode of Let's Talk About it With @oluwatobiloba.  I Did It For Love and now I am Filled With Regrets.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Somethings Are Indeed Surprising.
body:
Sometimes I wonder why some people have money and to spend it becomes a very big issue to them.  
I have learnt that there are some individuals who have little and they like to make themselves happy with what they have and they are other categories of people who have so much and they act as if they do not have at all. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/vge6nsv1ed.jpg)

Maybe these set of people do not like to show that they have to avoid pride, but personally I feel you should live comfortably when you have the means to do so. 

I have seen some people who have enough money,  and they will not just get a good thing for themselves.
root_title: Somethings Are Indeed Surprising.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Feeling of True Love is Beautiful.
body:
The life love gives is a beautiful one, 
The feeling of love is usually an amazing one, 
Love makes you try again and again, 
Love makes you beautiful,
Love makes you an amazing person,
It makes you give all that you have. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/tisv6ndyug.jpg)

The most amazing thing however,
Is when the person you love,
Loves you just the same way, 
The presence of equal love,
 Even makes things more real and beautiful. 

The feeling of true love brings happiness,
One that is usually indescribable,
Love is beautiful,
It is amazing, give your heart to complete love. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)
Thanks to @gbenga for distributing this badge for every Nigerian on Steemit.
root_title: The Feeling of True Love is Beautiful.

(Hugs) I do not want to bore you with my story, so I will just get straight to business of the day.

There is this young man I just meet, but I feel very comfortable round him, I feel safe around him, the day I relocated, it was as if a part of me has been taken away and I felt totally broken and down.
He is someone I can tell anything, and right now th
root_title: The Thirteenth Episode of Let's Talk About it with @oluwatobiloba.  I Don't Know If What I Feel Is Love,  Can You Help?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: When Was The Last Time You Were Grateful For The Things You Had?
body:
I realized that for sometime now I have become really ungrateful,  I developed a bad habit of getting angry at God because I felt he was not been fair enough. 

The moment I realized that some people were worse,  the day I realized that there are people who will sleep and never wake up,  I realized I had every reason to be grateful. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/uphwi9lptd.jpg)

The moment I realized that the hardship I complained about was extreme abundance to another family, I knew that I had to be grateful and I have to be happy for all that I have. 

I am publicly saying thank you to the highest God for everything I have and all that he has given me. 

P. S: Anticipate let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba tomorrow, a blockchain relationship based program that provides an opportunity to promote love and relationships. 

You can reach me through Mail: adekunlemercy95@gmail.com

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/y92timyerw.jpg)

I am @oluwatobiloba, thanks for coming around.
root_title: When Was The Last Time You Were Grateful For The Things You Had?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Letter To A Friend Who Is Going Through Hardship.
body:
You are stronger than you think you are friend, 
I know there are times you feel like giving up, 
I know sometimes you feel the world is against you, 
You are just angry and frustrated,
You even feel like committing suicide sometimes,
Because you feel very worthless.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/zxmjpuhb87.jpg)

I really do not have anything much to say to you, 
But I just want you to look around you, 
Look very closely because you will find one thing,
I tell you friend, you will certainly find something,
That will make you smile, 
One thing that will make you happy, 
One thing that will be the reason for your existence. 

I really want you to know dear friend, 
That you would have long been dead and forgotten,
You would have become history by now, 
But you are still alive,  you are still strong,
You are still existing, 
That means you still have a reason to be alive.

It is also good to know that,  
Wealth does not give happiness, 
Friendship does not bring happiness, 
It is only when you make up your m
root_title: A Letter To A Friend Who Is Going Through Hardship.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Am Going To Miss My New Friends.
body:
Have you ever been in a situation where you just meet people and it feels as if you have known them your whole life? 
That is exactly what I feel right now,  because I just meet two new friends who will be leaving tomorrow. 

I meet them three weeks ago and they did not treat me like a stranger at all,  they showed me so much love and attention. 
They were good enough to show me around. 

I was I'll due to the change of environment and and there was this one who took care of me like his sister,  he would come to cook for me,  fetch my water for me and do every other necessary thing. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/vtp8ltp7q7.jpg)
This one in particular is simply amazing. 

I love them and I am going to miss them so much,  I even have no idea about how I am going to survive here alone without them. 
But,  I wish them all that their hear desires and I ask for God's blessings upon them. 
Trust me when I say it is really painful.
root_title: I Am Going To Miss My New Friends.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: It's My Birthday And I Am Grateful For Life.
body:
I am excited because today is a very special day for me. 
I am very grateful to my creator for adding another beautiful year to my years,  there are so many reasons to be grateful, I cannot even explain how excited I am. 

I am grateful for the lessons I have learnt, I have learnt so many things which serve as an evidence of growth and I am really grateful for that. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/zw8pyk6uyq.jpg)

The individuals that God has placed around me are simply the best,  words are not enough to show how grateful I am for the gift of life. 

To all those who have made this year an amazing one for me,  I say a big thank you.  May God bless and honour you.
root_title: It's My Birthday And I Am Grateful For Life.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Pain Behind The Smile.
body:
The face that smiles, 
Even in pains, 
Everyone thinks that everything is fine, 
Everyone thinks she has a perfect life, 
Everyone thinks she is alright,
Just because she has a constant smile .

![download (2).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTkEmcmWKcsWFWo5kRBKmbXqAzoA52Xm94q1XRGXMTJuV/download%20(2).jpeg)

The day she decided, 
To unveil the pains in her heart, 
To disclose the fear and the hurt, 
To disclose the dissapointment she feels.

Everyone was shocked,
Because her smile has been a great deception,
We all thought she was doing fine,
But now we know better, 
We know that not everyone that smiles is better, 
We know that she is indeed a strong young lady.
root_title: The Pain Behind The Smile.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Power Behind Positive Interaction.
body:
Positive interactions can save a lot of  situations and rescue an individual  from ugly situations and that is the reason why it is important to get surrounded with the right association. 

![images (29).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaeeR8r93wL6GNSdC2EXpy1MrDZyff6EF2MfM6CyGzYs3/images%20(29).jpeg)

### Always Get Around The Right People. 

When you stay around the right individuals, it protects you from making wrong decisions. 

The right people are individuals with the mind set of moving forward,  people with the mindset of possibilities,  people with the mindset of greatness and a good future. 

When you get associated with the right people, you realize that life itself starts becoming meaningful to you.
root_title: The Power Behind Positive Interaction.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: THE TWELVTH EPISODE OF LET’S TALK ABOUT IT WITH @OLUWATOBILOBA……..PLEASE HELP, I AM 23 YEARS OLD AND MY MOTHER MUST NOT SEE ME WITH A MAN.
body:
I am really excited this morning and I think the reason is because I will be a year older next week that will be the beginning of a better year for me. I must say that it has been a very wonderful year filled with so many lessons and I want to say a big thank you to God for the lessons I have learnt this year.

Thank you for coming around this week, there is nothing that gladdens my heart more than being the reason behind someone’s smile and I am so happy that you have decided to be a part of what makes me happy. Thank you.

## REPORT FROM LAST WEEK.
Since the friend from last week’s episode was not a steemian, I had to show him people’s reaction and contribution and he was surprised at the level of interest shown to his story.
We had a very long chat and I am glad that he opened up to me, so we were able to reach a reasonable conclusion at the end of the day.
I am sending a big hug to everyone that participated, please keep shinning.

## RELATIONSHIP QUESTION FOR THE WEEK.
FROM THE SECRET: Please I need to
root_title: THE TWELVTH EPISODE OF LET’S TALK ABOUT IT WITH @OLUWATOBILOBA……..PLEASE HELP, I AM 23 YEARS OLD AND MY MOTHER MUST NOT SEE ME WITH A MAN.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Unanswered Questions To Your Troubled Heart.
body:
Have you ever been confused?
Have you ever felt you have no one to run to?
Have you ever had unanswered questions?
Have you ever been in a ugly situation with no one to help you out?
Have you felt cheated before?
Have you ever been broken before? 
Have you ever had to cry all night and day before? 
Have you ever felt as if there is no reason to live? 
Have you ever felt abandoned? 
Do you have unanswered questions? 

Most importantly,  have you ever felt the need to put a smile on someone's face? 
Then the best place to be will be here tomorrow on the show let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba. 

Did you escape that terrible situation, did you find love and happiness again despite everything that you went through, then please make someone smile again. 

![oluwatobiloba.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQd38bWJ19w96V61Dey47P6yW1fwy3yZKNrYNGcpaCJwM/oluwatobiloba.jpg)

### You can send in private messages through: adekunlemercy95@gmail.com
I will be expecting you here tomorrow, let us together be the reas
root_title: Unanswered Questions To Your Troubled Heart.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Some Little Things Really Matter.
body:
Little things that we feel it is useless are things that really means a lot of things in life. 
Little things like saying welldone to someone who is working, like saying thank you to a person for helping you do something and saying welcome politely to a visitor with a very big smile which shows that you are accommodating. 
![download (4).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTDntA1mTYrbF1ePBYSHKbnfXUJ5jSH66SPX5AYX5Nigt/download%20(4).jpeg)
Some individuals act as if they have no feelings whatsoever, they disregard people and treat others as though they do not matter at all. 

I have seen deep African homes where it is believed that the son must get married to a lady who will show respect to all his siblings, such homes believe that the new wife must strictly follow every instruction given by her husband's family and she has no right at all to speak when they speak. 
They turn her into a slave in the house,  as they send her on errands around, she also becomes the one who will wash the dishes and clothes.
root_title: Some Little Things Really Matter.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Lost Two School Mates Just Within A Week.
body:
This is really a sad news,  I got to know that an old friend lost his life this week to a very brief illness and it is very disappointing to know that a promising young man just left like that. 

![IMG_20180605_105316_837.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPhm5EoSd4yrZZY7eRQvDUohoeCxqjWycjUmsju1DpSSs/IMG_20180605_105316_837.JPG)

Just yesterday, another sad news came that we lost another lady from our school as well. 

![IMG_20180605_105523_458.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb3R9sa4d6PRj6QLHvjR2WFiaBcw1e7twqmpwbYzTpyDL/IMG_20180605_105523_458.JPG)

No one can tell what is really happening, but we pray for our friends that they find rest wherever they are. 

This young man was a friend and colleague, even if we lost contact after school,  the memories we shared are still very fresh. 
Rest on brother.
root_title: I Lost Two School Mates Just Within A Week.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 26: How I Escaped Another Scam.
body:
On so many occasions, in a bid to get more and more money, we fall into some very ugly situations all the time. 
It is no news that there are so many types of ponzi schemes existing now, but because we are looking for ways to make ends meet and get money for daily survival, we fall into different ugly and terrible situations. 

![images (32).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVf9gd1jcEoUZxY9zidYTBUd6HZeSVz89Qn2Hg2TSnZuH/images%20(32).jpeg)
I belong to this group chat and some people have consistently been advertising this particular platform,  where you can trade and make double profit. 
I was not interested at first,  but during the course of the week,  I really needed money to meet up some needs and there was no where I could raise the money,  then I decided to privately message one of the individuals who has been doing the advert. 

I tried all I could to convince her to tell me the truth,  and she told me she had made withdrawals from the platform twice and she even sent a screenshot of one of her fr
root_title: Gratitude Day 26: How I Escaped Another Scam.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I AM SO HAPPY TO BRING TO YOU THE ELEVENTH EPISODE OF LET'S TALK ABOUT IT WITH @OLUWATOBILOBA. IT IS JUST ALL ABOUT LOVE.....
body:
It is a cold rainy morning over here and it is a very tempting reason to stay in bed all day, but since we have so many things to do, we just have to get up on time and look for ways to make a living for ourselves.
Dear friends, I must confess that I am really excited to have you around again today and your presence always put a smile on my face, thanks a lot for the love and the consistency, I cannot thank you enough for the support you have shown to me even when it looks as if I have absolutely nothing to offer. I really appreciate your love. Thanks a lot.

![IMG-20180407-WA0002.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUvWG5oQtuyPk4KgHErDr6J1vuMVD4BaL2a71acLEzEYZ/IMG-20180407-WA0002.jpg)

Last week's topic was rather confusing and I must confess that my little mind could not give a reasonable response, but when I read the comments, I was so relaxed and I was able to talk to my new friend who in turn was glad that he was able to get a solution to his troubled mind.

title: Is There Any Reason Why One Will Wake Up Feeling More Tired Than He or She Slept.
body:
Is there any medical associated reason why someone will wake up and feel more tired than he or she slept?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 23: I Am Grateful For The Ability To Do Something New.
body:
Today was just one type of a super stressful day, but I am really glad that I had the opportunity to try something I have never done before. 
Football is something I have never tried,  as a matter of fact,  I believe it is a very rough and stressful game,  so I try all I can to run away from it. 

![IMG_20180531_174926_097.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmabBkhHHFuSqDWomCim8QcogsD7chHqEq8yRrMcYS68pu/IMG_20180531_174926_097.jpg)

In the school where I teach,  I was informed that there is a regular practice of students playing against the teachers once in a while, this is to take our mind off classroom work a little bit and have fun. 

So,  I had no option than to join the game as well,  I was just laughing at myself all through the game. 
Anytime the ball was heading towards my direction,  I will just run away because I don't want to get hurt and I know my students had a very good laugh because I could hear them scream,  see aunty and we all had a pretty good time on the field and I did not sustain any i
root_title: Gratitude Day 23: I Am Grateful For The Ability To Do Something New.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 21: I Am Grateful For Happy Faces
body:
I am so glad to see excited faces around here which is different from the desperate and strong faces you see on a normal day. 
Everyone around here looks contended and happy,  they feel satisfied with what they have. 


They go to farm at the early hours of the morning and they come back late at night with a smile on their face,  feeling satisfied with the things they have acquired. 


You see the children as well always playing around with no fear of what the future will looks like and the natural faces around here is so beautiful. 

![IMG_20180529_172839.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWKNnZacw47adF9c25xSwsswSb47reM2MdfkNUoMXfh19/IMG_20180529_172839.jpg)

The friendship is pure and everyone is happy,  the faces around here are really attractive and pleasing,  I am grateful for beautiful and calm faces around here. 

.............It's your Nigerian Lady @Oluwatobiloba.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://img.esteem.ws/k38amzzr6w.jpg

Thanks to @jodipamungkas for this beautiful badge and @gbenga for

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Your Soul Desires Peace,  Why Not Give It To It.
body:
The peace the soul desires, 
The amount of love desired by the soul, 
No one can quantify, 
The soul yearns for more,
More of peace, 
More of a satisfied life. 

But as much as the soul yearns for more, 
The more greedy we become, 
We deny the soul of the peace it desires, 
Because we are not just satisfied with what we have, 
And we constantly want more and more, 
Even if we don't get it naturally, 
We will want to do immoral things to get it. 

![hqdefault.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSUKEPp9JfcdtwwAPCdFipmEo9afPJnZxB9KDUU2qbp13/hqdefault.jpg)

How much do you think you have denied the soul of the peace and joy that it desires, 
Give to your soul sanity and peace, 
Live a fulfilled life.  Thanks.

.............It's your Nigerian Lady @Oluwatobiloba.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://img.esteem.ws/k38amzzr6w.jpg

Thanks to @jodipamungkas for this beautiful badge and @gbenga for getting the badge for every Nigerian on Steemit.

https://steemitimages.com/DQmcGTgE9ztQ7QmWESyE7uVqLrUqfbAa1fsTCod6d
root_title: Your Soul Desires Peace,  Why Not Give It To It.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How Do You Describe This Situation,  Will You Call It Greed or Wisdom?
body:
I heard a certain story and I do not even know how to judge the situation at hand, I don't know if this should be described as greed or a high level of wisdom. 

I heard a story of a village owned by a particular family,  the village is indeed very big and owned by just one family but instead of them to sell off their lands as other people will do,  they refused to sell out any of the landed property. 

![IMG_20180527_163456.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbuM5hf8V1WQT2mWXCcw3q1svMz9zTDvUwt5GjgGNA2Q2/IMG_20180527_163456.jpg)

What they do every year is that they give out a particular portion of the land every year for rent,  so people come there to farm and pay them for the land used after a period of one year. 

Natural products obtained from the land are sold out in order to make profit by the family and this has caused the village to remain underdeveloped as no one comes there to build any thing good because they know they cannot purchase lands there. 

Machines used for the production of anything i
root_title: How Do You Describe This Situation,  Will You Call It Greed or Wisdom?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Cold Lazy Morning.
body:
At the early hours of the morning, 
When all I should do was to get dressed and prepare for work, 
I woke up as usual and almost immediately, 
I heard this strong and loud sound, 
What could that be,  I asked myself? It was the sound of a heavy downpour. 

![images (1).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmR5D3FHZGL7dLkeBsTfCaip686Zik8DDRrP6DQDFe2uXz/images%20(1).jpeg)

Oh my,  I can't go out under this rain, 
I still had sometime to stay at home, 
So I decided to relax on bed for sometime, 
And off I was to the dreamland. 

My colleague was ready and he came to knock on my window,
Don't tell me you are still sleeping by this time?
He asked surprised,
And I was obviously still on bed until he came to knock. 
I hurried out of bed very fast, 
And I started getting dressed, 
At the end of the day,  I was ten minutes late, 
It is such a cold freezing morning over here. 

..............It's your Nigerian Lady @Oluwatobiloba.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://img.esteem.ws/k38amzzr6w.jpg

Thanks to @jodipamu
root_title: A Cold Lazy Morning.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 15: I Am Grateful For Peace.
body:
I have heard on countless occasions how people complain of war and insecurities around the area that they stay. 
There are so many people who are usually scared of their environment because they do not even know the next thing that will happen in the next minute.

![23596531_135471990445808_5271122218879811584_n.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdGqaHJXktTcEV6YRP38ZMQGt4nHMWQwqure9u6HfK1o1/23596531_135471990445808_5271122218879811584_n.jpg)

But,  I am grateful because this place I am abhores peace and absence of war. 
Anyone could even move around at any time without the fear of being kidnapped. 

The security of the entire community is dependent on every individual around the place,  so when a strange face is seen, everyone is alert and things are put in place properly. 
So,  I am grateful for the peace around this environment.


Thank you for coming around.
..............It's your Nigerian Lady @Oluwatobiloba.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://img.esteem.ws/k38amzzr6w.jpg
root_title: Gratitude Day 15: I Am Grateful For Peace.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 14: Sincerity Lies In Rural Areas.
body:
Hello people, I am grateful for another beautiful day and a conducive weather. 
You remember I told you about my relocation to this rural area and I will keep giving you update about the way things unfold in this rural community. 

![download (4).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmc98rXE4cJb3bxHiEJJ9aBSqWtQAWNyqTLi37dUMssbEa/download%20(4).jpeg)

I saw a level of sincerity which is very high and which might not be found in developed areas. 
I went to purchase fish from a woman and she told me that she could not sell the fish she had to me because it was the one she had left yesterday and she  felt it was not good enough to be sold. 
I know that if the same situation happened in the city, the woman would have looked for a way to make it warm and then sell it. 

I felt really good to know that there are still sincere people and they are found in rural areas.
I have started seeing positivity here and I will keep you informed about how the things go. 

[Image Source](https://www.google.com.ng/search?q=sincere+Ni
root_title: Gratitude Day 14: Sincerity Lies In Rural Areas.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 13. I Am Grateful For Civilization.
body:
Moving into this new community has even made me more grateful than I use to be before, because I have realized that the little things I take for granted is what the set of indiiduals over here treat like gold.
I use to feel local before now, I did not have the opportunity to enjoy somethings my mates and friends enjoyed as kids, so I usually feel out of the box, whenever they talk, I just keep quiet because I have nothing to say about the issue at hand.

https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/styles/732_width/public/nodeimage/Nigeria%20AgFS_0.jpg?itok=3PUqb1d4

Now, seeing this set of people have made me realize that I am even more civilized than I thought I was. You can imagine a matured individual not being able to speak proper english in this age and time, when you have people who cannot construct simple sentences, it is very bad.

Some of the bags I feel that they are old and should be disposed are the bags that the people over here call beautiful and they wish I should give to them as a gift.
You can
root_title: Gratitude Day 13. I Am Grateful For Civilization.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My New Experience In A Rural Environment.
body:
I just moved into this community that is a very rural area, I never knew that places like this still exist in this century, a place that is so local and blind to civilization.
I had to go there on a very important assignment and this is the place where I have to stay for months until I finally leave to a better location.

https://i2.wp.com/www.projectslib.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/GH_Rural_community_slide.jpg?fit=600%2C339&ssl=1

## My Arrival.

I arrived at this village area a day ago and everywhere looked really strange to me, while the vehicle moved, I could only hope that a miracle will happen and this place will change from the way I see it to a better place. But nothing happened and it happened to be a very local place.

https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/styles/732_width/public/nodeimage/Nigeria%20AgFS_0.jpg?itok=3PUqb1d4

### Issues With This New Place.

There is a lot of problem with this area but I will just list the little things I have noticed that makes me feel like crying. The first
root_title: My New Experience In A Rural Environment.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 10: I Am Grateful For Morals.
body:
I am so grateful for the morals I have, for the things I can do and the things I will never do.
Today, I watched a young man who was caught in the act of stealing being disgraced, he was publicly embarrassed as he was asked to remove his clothes and walk around the street naked while he received beating from the individuals he stole from. It was reported that he jumped over the fence into the house probably because he felt that no one was going to be at home by that time of the day, so he crept quietly into the building and he began to take one step after the other to carry out his mission.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aTyk9GBrEvQ/maxresdefault.jpg

Unfortunately for him, three young men were around and he was caught, they held him and they began to ask questions but instead of him to say the truth and go, he started to tell lies which made the young men more angry with him and they started to maltreat him.
They eventually took him to the police station in order to allow the law have its way and to prevent them f
root_title: Gratitude Day 10: I Am Grateful For Morals.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Interesting Marital Stories 3rd Round.
body:
I have written two marital stories now and the end result of the both was not a pleasant one, but today's story is that of a happy couple, these one makes me feel like getting married in the next minute.

![t9sb0aen8l.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/t9sb0aen8l.jpg)
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/search?q=interesting+marital+stories&client=firefox-b&sxsrf=ACYBGNRhwkJ9k6Qm4Xqn9nGj9GhxCHfZLg:1568107593665&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwip3tuA-MXkAhURmVwKHTubDb4Q_AUIBigB&biw=360&bih=560#imgrc=8U8A-ftAjGiHnM%3A)

Mr and Mrs Daniel got married at a very young age and they both loved each other so much that they were able to sacrifice anything for each other.
Things went well for them and they had five kids.

At the beginning, they were not well to do, but they eat and managed what was made available to them, life was going well for them because love was involved.
After some time, Mr Daniel got promoted at this place of work and this was a huge success to them, the family was extremely happy as they moved i
root_title: Interesting Marital Stories 3rd Round.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 9: I Am Grateful For Hardships.
body:
I have always known that life comes with hardships,
I always wanted to run away from them,
to me, the life I lived was hard enough,
so I prayed and hoped that it will not even get harder,
but it kept on reflecting in my head that there will be a time,
when things will totally get out of hand,
there will be a time when friends will betray,
a time when those I call love will show me how much they despise me,
the more I tried to run away from the reality of what was about to happen,
the more it even became more glaring that it was a phase I had to go through.

https://ldsmag.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/trials-768x511.jpg

Then, finally the time came, everything became difficult,
I stood confused about the next step to take,
until I remembered that Mama had thought me to fight,
she had thought me never to give up,
she had thought me to always look for a way out of every circumstance I found myself.

I immediately realized that I had to get up and look for a way out of what I had gotten into,
it even became mo
root_title: Gratitude Day 9: I Am Grateful For Hardships.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day 7: I Am Grateful For Safety.
body:
I don't really like travelling but these days I have no option than to travel around on most occasions .
Sometimes when I travel,  I see vehicles who have been involved in a miserable road accident and I cannot but say a big thank you to the sustainer of life. 

![images (31).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTykE7tM2rmpL2Tu7FqwftvJ7bLMC645nMCVu3byJe3r3/images%20(31).jpeg)

It is obvious that we have no power or strength of our own to save ourselves no matter how smart or intelligent we think we are. 
When we have this at the back of our mind constantly, we will know that we have to be grateful for everything that happens to us which includes safety from one point to another. 

I am grateful for safety, I am grateful because I have moved from one location to another without getting hurt.  It is not because I am so special or I have two heads but I am grateful for safety. 

[Image Source ](https://www.google.com.ng/search?q=I+am+grateful+for+safety&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=ivn&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&v
root_title: Gratitude Day 7: I Am Grateful For Safety.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gratitude Day: I Am Grateful That I Have Wonderful Siblings.
body:
Oh my,  I have so many things to be grateful for, immediately I saw the post by @tojukaka I knew I had to participate as well. 
I will like to start by saying I am grateful for the super amazing siblings that I have got.

title: Relationship Is Significant To Every Society.
body:
Relationship issues..... 
You will agree with me that relationship is the bedrock of the society. 
For every society to stand,  relationships have to be established, it can be a relationship between individuals of the opposite sex,  it could be a relationship between staff and employees, relationship between government and citizens and most importantly relationship between the creator and man.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Act Of Betrayal Is Usually A Permanent Injury To The Soul.
body:
Do you know what it feels like to get betrayed? 
Have you ever been betrayed before? 
Have you ever felt like someone or a group of people that you love so much decided to hurt you? 
![images (24).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaB4WfNR1ZaR3rWP3WnC5KTST9eGng55sy9WZvpsBEwrQ/images%20(24).jpeg)

Betrayal is a painful experience from someone you adore and you expect so much from. 
For you to feel betrayed, it means that you have placed that individual on a large scale so much that you feel that the person can do you no harm. 

I don't think people really get betrayed by people they do not trust as a matter of fact,  without trust,  there will be nothing called betrayal. 
One very bad thing that betrayal can do to a person is to destroy the individuals ego, betrayal can make you take drastic decisions like not being able to love and trust ever again. 
The reason why people still betray each other after so much commitment, is one thing I do not understand. 
Do you think there is a reason good enough to make yo
root_title: The Act Of Betrayal Is Usually A Permanent Injury To The Soul.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Gain Respect, Get Value And Live well.
body:
Value is something very relevant that should not in any way be taken for granted and what I mean by that is self value. 
The value you place on yourself determines to a large extent,  the way people will take you. 
![images (23).jpeg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmU3nQe5QPTL3aHMSAKaZK1Sdz6bZpdZ7u3jCSwjGphCDM/images%20(23).jpeg)

Self value turns you into a beautiful and wonderful being, it makes you creative and awesome .
The value you place on yourself will determine to a great extent, the way people will treat you. 

Self value can be obtained by obtaining every positive value that  you can, drill yourself in such a way that every thing  is an opportunity to learn something new. 

Place great value on yourself, do not be cheap to get,  do not follow the crowd at every slight opportunity and hold on to the truth that you believe. 

[Image Source](https://www.google.com.ng/search?q=self+value&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=ivn&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjhnfyOk-DaAhXKJsAKHRfnBYkQ_AUIESgB#imgrc=8IML0qf
root_title: Gain Respect, Get Value And Live well.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Pay Attention To Relevant Issues, Eat well And Live Well.
body:
The importance of food to the body is one that should not be overlooked and most importantly a good food. 
It is not just good enough to eat but it is essential to make it a good one.
 
![20131019_184045[1].jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcPtmfSt1fb5A5cx7TzgifM5faGyVFKD17bEQniyxRcFo/20131019_184045%5B1%5D.jpg)
Due to circumstances, some people have been made to solely rely on whatsoever  comes their way and some others due to ignorance have been made to eat whatever they get to eat. 
Some people eat quantity and not quality,  eating in large pieces and doing it the wrong way.

The disadvantage of not eating properly cannot be over mentioned because not eating the right way affects the body of humans so much that it could result into having a disease and even death. 

It is necessary that we take our focus off the quantity of food and begin to think towards the direction of proper feeding which deals with quality. Take into consideration whatever you consume because in a way,  it describes your appearance.
root_title: Pay Attention To Relevant Issues, Eat well And Live Well.

body:
Believe in yourself and in your ability to do things.  Believe in the availability of your strength to carry out the task you have been given. 
For every task you are given, you have the strength to fulfill all that you need, you just need to harness the strength you have and awaken the giant you have in you. 
Believe in your ability to work and become more successful with each and every passing moment.
root_title: Strength To Carry Out Your Responsibility.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Are You Ready To Grow Or Do You Just Feel That You Are Perfect The Way You Are.
body:
There are so many things that we try to give an excuse about and with my findings of late, I have realized that sometimes, we just think we are making progress whereas we are still at the same spot.
We are usually so carried away with the noise around us that we think that we are really getting bigger and better and most times we do not know that we are till standing at the same old spot.

https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/1400/1*2VyhI04DVEea-45pIoaYCA.jpeg

We give so many excuses and I will give certain examples below:
I am trying all that is within my power.
I have done all that  can do but everything is still the same.
I don't even have the strength to kill myself over issues.
I am just fine the way that I am.
So many people love my personality, so I think I am good to go.

These and many more are excuses that people give everyday and everytime and one thing about these excuses is that, they tie us down to a particular spot for a very long time, these things hinder us from making progress and achieving
root_title: Are You Ready To Grow Or Do You Just Feel That You Are Perfect The Way You Are.

title: My Stand As A Single Young Lady About Dating Married Men
body:
https://s-i.huffpost.com/gen/769525/images/o-DATING-MISTAKES-facebook.jpg

I was supposed to meet with someone to make some enquiries about certain things and when I finally meet with the man, I realized he was a successful young man who had a wife and two lovely daughters.

We reached an agreement and we decided that we could work together and it was fine by me. Until I realized that the young man wanted to start giving a strange attitude, I just laughed at him when I realized he was trying to fool around because he felt he had money to spend.

I then realized for the first time the reason why Ladies of my age fall very easily for married men, the love and care they will promise to shower, you know they already have a marriage experience, so the way they will treat you will be different from the way a young hustling guy will treat you.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Have Only Learnt Through Circumstances To Be The Best That I Can Be.
body:
On a lonely path, I moved, 
I sought help,
I cried out as much as I could,
my soul was dying gradually,
my spirit filled with so much hurt and regret from the past.

https://thoughtcatalog.files.wordpress.com/2016/02/24498911592_5812c61788_k.jpg?w=786

How I wish I was a little smarter,
how I wish I knew better,
how I wish I was a little wiser,
all this would not have happened.

I stood from a distance, as I saw those whom I have called friends betray me,
I watched from a distance as I saw them mock me,
I watched from a distance and I observed that they saw me burning and they turned their faces away.

Oh, how cruel can you be earth?
how cruel can you be oh nature?
why have you decided to turn against me,
what offence have I committed to receive such treatment?

https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--Qmz33zsO--/c_scale,fl_progressive,q_80,w_800/782230550231042849.jpg

I have cried so much that I have swollen eyes,
I have asked you to please forgive me,
I have pleaded with you to ignore my past,
root_title: I Have Only Learnt Through Circumstances To Be The Best That I Can Be.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: It's Another Throwback Thurday With @gee1.
body:
It's a beautiful Thursday over here and I can't keep calm because I want to share a good throwback story.

![20160119_095816.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmabMF8UkVEupYJVbCN3B8R3mpdXTXU4Ls7CfhwLgmPqEZ/20160119_095816.jpg)

It was a stressful day and we were supposed to get our school receipt after running around to get the school fees paid.
The real gist is that if you are opportune to pay your school fees early in my school, then you can get your school fee receipt without stress because you will just walk into the bursar's office and the secretary to the bursar will hand over your school receipt to you.

![20160119_095816.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmabMF8UkVEupYJVbCN3B8R3mpdXTXU4Ls7CfhwLgmPqEZ/20160119_095816.jpg)

But, the real issue begins when you are not able to pay your school fee on time, if you pay your fees late then you will know that getting a receipt is not going to be an easy task.
When it is time to get the receipt, everyone that paid late will gather in a hall and there the secretary
root_title: It's Another Throwback Thurday With @gee1.
