author: oluwatobiloba
title: It Is A Beautiful Thing To Forgive, It Restores Your Pride And Beauty.
body:
There is a sweet feeling that comes with forgiveness,
it makes your mind free from worries and it sets your soul free,
forgiveness makes you beautiful, in mind and soul.

Someone I respect so much did something that hurt me,
I was down and weak,
my attitude changed towards everyone around me,
I felt stupid and insulted.

https://dtqnv8in03d1n.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/forgive-yourself-for-past-mistakes.jpg

I lost my smile and laughter,
my neighbours kept asking me what the problem was,
but I could not tell anyone, I kept it all to myself,
I was dying slowly.

I then realized that I had to forgive and make myself happy,
I realized that I was going to ruin myself if I don't forgive,
I realized that if I wanted to be happy, I had to forgive,
and then move on with life,
it was a difficult task to do I must confess.

http://assets.blog.bible/uploads/blog/638/bible-verses-when-you-need-to-forgive.jpg

But, I read books, I listened to tape,
because I know that if I had to be happy,
I have to forgiv
root_title: It Is A Beautiful Thing To Forgive, It Restores Your Pride And Beauty.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: It's Another Thursday To Share Throwback Memories, I Hope You Find Mine Interesting.
body:
Thursdays are for throwbacks and it is another Thursday to share loving memories, I hope you find mine an interesting one to read.

![IMG_20150420_114532.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVKv7MFAAKE6sUCBi9XhcdkLEHHdnuV9VQHcUSTeNNZRA/IMG_20150420_114532.jpg)
This picture was taken during my first year in the university, it was one of those days when we woke up pretty early and rushed to the classroom only for us to wait all day for a lecturer that never comes.
Those days are usually very annoying because you might be having a good and beautiful sleep when your alarm will remind you that you have a class to attend, as a serious fresher (as we were called) you will have to jump out of bed and rush to the classroom, only for you to hear the voice of another lecturer asking you to leave the hall because he wants to use it for his own period.

Those days were indeed frustrating, I must confess. It was even more frustrating when you had nothing to eat before going to class that morning, and going to eat at that tim
root_title: It's Another Thursday To Share Throwback Memories, I Hope You Find Mine Interesting.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm ........Episode Eight
body:
I ran home as fast as my legs could carry me, I wanted to discuss it with the new mother I had found in this strange realm, but I was sure I had to do that in a way that she will not suspect my fears. I told her about the man I meet in the bushy path and she was very happy that Akanni came at the right time.
You see the reason why I do not like you walking alone, my precious daughter is too pretty to get hurt by one local and smelly young man, she said as she ran her hand through my body to ensure I was alright.

I smiled and told her I was fine even if I had something else in mind, but Mum, what does Dad do when he gets to the city? I quickly asked he goes to sell at the market she responded.
Can I go with him one day? because I want to know what it means to be a trader practically. She looked at me and smiled, you are such a smart child but you see, the marketplace is usually very crowded and you might even get lost, but if you promise to stay close to your father then I can convince him to take you along
root_title: My Life In The Other Realm ........Episode Eight

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating The Deepest and Sweetest Type of Love
body:
The love, the pain and the sacrifice,
all that you had to do for me,
you nailed it all on the cross,
you gave it all for me.

Today we are celebrating you,
because you took the pain for our sake,
you died so that I might live,
you were beaten so I could get total victory.

Yes, he gave it all, he loves me so much,
he died so that I might be free from sin and shame,
I love him because he first loved me,
and this love is indeed unique and special,
I don't think there is anyone like it.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-msWLdBSKoaE/UADD3jiLhwI/AAAAAAAABOQ/bk8JUW2-P1E/s1600/heartforgod.jpg

I love this Jesus who gave it all for me,
on the cross of calvary,
the sweetest and purest love,
having him has been supreme and amazing,
join me as we celebrate the risen king.

[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwiL4-j6wJvaAhWFthQKHTkxCocQjRx6BAgAEAU&url=http%3A%2F%2Fmonic79.blogspot.com%2F2012%2F07%2Fthe-love-dare-day-20-love-is-jesus.html&psig=AOvVaw0alreFCPq
root_title: Celebrating The Deepest and Sweetest Type of Love

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Call To Conciousness, Important Questions To Answer As We Remind Ourselves That We All Need Each other To Survive.
body:
Dear friends, I have a lot of questions to ask and I will be very glad if you are able to answer these questions sincerely to yourself and in your heart. 

http://lissarankin.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Orlando-277x300.jpg

Let the question series begin:
When was the last time you put a smile on someone's face?

When was the last time you made someone laugh really hard?

When was the last time you got sincere with yourself and you had the guts to tell yourself the truth?

when was the last time you told your neighbour the truth?

When was the last time you loved?

If you are to relocate from your residential area now, what will be neighbour reaction?

Will they be filled with excitement that the troublemaker is finally going to leave?

Or will they cry and ask you to stay back?

What about if you leave the earth today, what will become of your memories?

How many lives would you have touched?

Will you be able to say yes, I have lived to the fullest and I have loved sincerely?

When was the last time you
root_title: A Call To Conciousness, Important Questions To Answer As We Remind Ourselves That We All Need Each other To Survive.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: What Entrepreneurs Need to Know about Customer Service.
body:
It is no news that the business world has started experiencing what should be called a 'major revolution' when it comes to the way customers react to the experience they get.
The new way customers react is simply: you have to give them what they want, the exact way they want it, or within a twinkle of an eye, they have gone somewhere else.
Power is no longer with the entrepreneurs/ sellers as it use to be before, it is now in the hands of those who purchase and that is the customers.


![images (1).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVeXWxDSeaVjrkq3pgJxuC4mAxHZT4ZyHJru1hXsLdmQp/images%20(1).jpeg)

body:
It is rare to find a beautiful soul,
It is rare to find someone who believes in your dream,
It is rare to find someone who loves you despite your flaws,
It is rare to find someone who trusts your judgement.

It is rare to find friends who are accommodating,
It is rare to find friends who will support you,
It is rare to find friends who love you despite your flaws,
It is rare to find friends who love you unconditionally.

https://exploringyourmind.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/girl-in-flower.jpg

It is rare to find a community that supports you,
It is rare to find a community filled with great and lovely minds,
It is rare to find a community filled with amazing and accommodating ideas.

When you are opportuned to find any of these things, cherish them and hold them tight because it might be very difficult to find another like it.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Answering the Famous Question on the Lips of Producers: Why do I Have to Package my Products?
body:
Whenever we hear about the word packaging, what comes to our mind is the look of a product and how well designed a product looks like, which is definitely correct, but beyond the look of a product, packaging entails more.


![images (5).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPGEbfp3b2LKr8awWSD4XUouz2ZzFJSRGdXHdZP4WvNX1/images%20(5).jpeg)

[Image credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=packaging+of+products&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=inv&sxsrf=ACYBGNQUNrdeBDqHXW_uo_W1-b-IFlsb4Q:1581956810869&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjiy4uugNnnAhURVhoKHZxMB9cQ_AUoAXoECA8QAQ#imgrc=tY3xrac94rwAoM)

One of the major issues that start up companies usually encounter is how to package their product, in order to present the product at a cheap price which will bring about fast sales, some of them decide to completely ignore the aspect of packaging and leave the product bare, this act however comes with lot's of disadvantages which is something the producer or company do not know or they choose to ignore as they major on
root_title: Answering the Famous Question on the Lips of Producers: Why do I Have to Package my Products?

title: My Entry For The Loveitshoveit Challenge.
body:
I am glad to get nominated by our very own amazing @korexe and I could not just help but wait to share my idea on the #loveitshove it challenge.

The rules of the challenge are simple;
•List the five things that you love.
•List the five things that you really dislike
•Use the tag loveitshoveit
•Tag as many friends as you like to join in the fun.

Alright, let the fun begin and allow me to show you somethings you might not know about me.

* Love: The first thing on my list is absolutely going to be love.I must confess that I am a lover when I love, I do so with the whole of my heart.
I am contend with the feeling that comes with true love.

I think this picture was one of my favourite back then, it was taken after a Sunday service and I was really excited about that Sunday service because I just joined the choir group that month and I was given the opportunity to lead a Hausa song.

My fellowship was the largest the school had, with a great number of choir members with super amazing voices, I decided to join the choir group so that I will participate in the voice training and improve on my voice.
I was not even expecting a lead role anytime soon because there were people in the group who have never stood at the front of the church and they have been in the group for 2 years and more.

So, that day when I was chosen by the choir leader to take the song, I was shocked to my bones and I could interpret the look some people were giving (I mean those that have never led and have been in the group before me).
That week I pray

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Any Slight Change Experineced In Your Body Should Be Reported Immediately To Health Experts, A Lesson I Learned From A Story Of A Pretty Lady
body:
Our health as humans is something that should not be taken for granted, if we notice any little illness, we should .immediately get help from experts.
This post is inspired by the sad story I heard today and I felt it was important that I shared it because it might help someone.

There was a young lady who went to a boarding house at a very young age and she started developing unusual stomach abdominal pain, she was one who liked to keep to herself, so she decided not to tell anyone about it.
The unusual pain started during her secondary school days but she kept it a secret until she got to the university and the pain got even worse.

http://drperrone.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Marielaina-Perrone-DDS-Pediatric-Dentist-3-680x350.jpg

After some time, she started noticing that there was a discharge following the serious pain and that was when she decided to confide in the owner of a local medicine store in the area where she lived.

The woman told her that it might be symptoms of ulcer and she got dru
root_title: Any Slight Change Experineced In Your Body Should Be Reported Immediately To Health Experts, A Lesson I Learned From A Story Of A Pretty Lady

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Believe In Yourself And Achieve Greatness
body:
If there is one thing I have learned over time, it is the fact that no one will believe in you as much as you believe in yourself. 

The life of greatness and success that you desire is only achievable if you are willing to build up yourself and give all that it takes to achieve what you want. 

There is nothing you desire that cannot be attained,  that is one fact you should understand, hold on to your dreams and believe in the great power of positivism coming out in every corner. 

The sky is the limit for anyone who believes in the achievement of greatness and is also ready to work hard at it. 


Thank you for coming around.
..............It's your Nigerian Lady @Oluwatobiloba.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://img.esteem.ws/k38amzzr6w.jpg

title: The Friendship That Never Happened.
body:
I thought this will turn into a reality someday,
I thought that I will be able to love properly someday,
I thought that everything would become perfect with you someday.

I thought I will finally get to hold your hands,
I thought I will finally get to discuss every necessary thing with you,
I thought I will be able to open my heart up to you,
and allow you know my fears and my weakness.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/916/360/746.png

With every atom of hope,
I anticipated our meeting,
with every atom of hope,
I planned all that we were going to talk about,
and those places we are going to visit.

Months rolled into weeks,
weeks into days,
and even days  into hours,
I expected you every night,
and even at work,
I still could not concentrate.

Everyone asked what the problem was,
because they discovered I was no longer the usual cheerful lady they use to know,
but there was no one else I could tell,
because you were the only one I was free with.

And what is this that I am hearing?
that you

title: My Amazing Baby Sister
body:
https://i0.wp.com/www.benjaminkanarekblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/design-i-love-my-little-sister.jpg

The feeling of having a sister is amazing,
especially when it is a younger one,
that uses a similar size of cloth and shoe with you,
that makes her want to steal everything attractive that you have.

The aspect of argument and constant fight.
is usually very interesting too,
when she wants to be the one to win all the time.

I really love the fact that I have a kid sister who likes to disturb,
every time my phone rings,
she always wants to know the person at the other end,
and sometimes when I do not want her to know who the person is,
we end up fighting for the phone,
until the call finally drops.

The part I love most is when she tells me about
those boys that disturb her in school,
and how excited she is to tell them,
that she does not need their money,
because she has a big sister.

I just love her to the moon,
and so I decided to write this,
for my beautiful, smart and intelligent baby sister,
I

author: oluwatobiloba
title: We Should Have A Proper Re-Think About Everything We Want To Do. If You Want To Help Someone, Do So Without Any Wicked Intentions
body:
Before you take that decision, think and have a proper re-think all over.
In all that we do, we have to bear it in mind that we have to get very thoughtful about it, we have to get ready to think and think properly over again before we jump into any conclusion.

We might be thinking that it is only when we want to go into a business that we will have to think well about what we want to do, but that is not true because, in all that we do, we have to give a good and reasonable consideration.

https://pm1.narvii.com/6642/d53781c81fa4831d43c3bbbb5674e21c5e68b2ef_hq.jpg

This post s actually inspired by the story of a young lady that I heard some time ago and I will just like to share that story with you. She was going through some family problems, she had no money to pay her bills, she had no money to do all that she needed to pay for and then she became very frustrated.

body:
Yeah, it is another wonderful Thursday and since Thursdays are for throwbacks, let's have some fun with @gee1.

I took this picture the very first time I put my hair under a high-dryer, I was fat then and I am even forced to ask myself sometimes if I am gtting bigger or smaller in size. I think I did not have enough money to get a weavon for my hair that day, so the lady in the saloon advised that I could just relax my hair and give it a simple setting that could still last for a while before I get the money to make another hair.

I succumbed to her advice and I had my hair relaxed after the relaxer was washed off, it was rolled into different segments and pinned with rollers, a setting spray was added as well, and then the biggest part came, I had to put my hair under the drier.

At first, I thought I will be able to cope with the heat, I had endured tough and uncomfortable things,

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Fatal Mistake With A Crush
body:
https://data.whicdn.com/images/198457371/original.gif
Oh, my world,
he was just too cute, 
I mean he was just the way I wanted my man to be,
tall, slim and good- looking,
with a super attractive smile to get you on your toes.

I was still looking at him,
when he smiled at me,
and that was just all that I needed at that time.

He came close to me and held my hands,
he said he loved me and he planted a kiss on my forehead,
I was too cold to resist.

somewhere at a little corner of my mind,
I knew what I was doing was wrong,
but no, I said to myself,
you should stop living a boring lady and try out something new.

So I followed him as he pulled me along,
like a goat waiting to get slaughtered,
he even had a car, he drove me straight into an exquisite hotel,
one I had never been to before.

He treated me like a queen,
and we made love that night,
it was a first of it's kind for me,
I had a long lovely sleep,
and when I woke up,
he was gone, but he left a note and some money,
when I counted it, it was 20$,
and al
root_title: A Fatal Mistake With A Crush

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm........Seventh Episode
body:
Continued from [Here](https://steemit.com/fiction/@oluwatobiloba/my-life-in-the-other-realm-sixth-episode)

Immediately we got off the lonely bushy path, I ran into the arms of Akanni, the one who said he likes me.
What is the problem? he asked me, instead of me to give him a reply I decided to ask him a question too, do you know that young man coming behind us, I asked him?
Of course, I do, hope he did not hurt you, are you sure that you are fine? he started to sound worried. I am very fine, just take me home. When the tall full beared guy saw me with someone else, he went his own way. I was happy he did not make any trouble because some guy in my other life where I think I really belong, would have just started a fight with him.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/00/8a/77/008a772325c1a272907b1e6de622d87a.jpg

As we walked home, Akanni told me about the man I had that experience with, he told me how he was found of getting people raped, I hate to hear the word rape, so I quickly asked for the reason why he has
root_title: My Life In The Other Realm........Seventh Episode

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Is It A Crime To Pray For A Man To Get Wealthy
body:
https://qzprod.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/naira-and-dollars.jpg?quality=80&strip=all&w=3500

When I use to hear about money changing people,
I use to think there was an exception,
I thought he was a man with so much value and dignity,
who will not trade his dignity for anything on earth,
he was just a type of man that I admire greatly.

Oh, do not think that way he is not my lover,
he is my uncle, but he just happens to be one,
that I love and respect,
and I felt he deserved to have so much money to bring out the good trait in him.

His wife was exceptional,
she sacrificed all that she had for her husband and Kids,
she had no other life outside her home,
she gave all she had to her husband to make him become a better person.

My Uncle was very humble,
he was one who will not look twice at any other woman 
who was not his wife,
he was faithful to the core,
and even without money he was a loving husband.

Until suddenly, money came,
he had it in excess, and that was what we wanted,
so we were very glad,
but t
root_title: Is It A Crime To Pray For A Man To Get Wealthy

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Beautiful Experience At The Jabi Lake At Abuja. Water Bodies Are Beautiful And Peaceful
body: I visited the Jabi lake mall in Abuja and it was an opportunity for me to visit the commonly talked about a lake. I was indeed excited that I went at night, that made the environment calm and peaceful. You can imagine that I have lived with my parents around Abuja for more than 15 years and I have never had the opportunity to visit this region, so going there this very day was a big one for me. The reason why I have never visited this area is simply that I do not have the money to pay the required bills around here, but I am really excited that I finally got to visit the area. The next thing on my mind right now is to bring my siblings over here to so that they can get a view of the enironment, you know that family comes first for me. The water body really felt peaceful, the wave of air that blew around it was different, I guess it just happens with

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How Possible Is It For My Neighbor With A Cool Face To Be A Thief.
body:
My people, I welcome you once again to my blog where I always have lots of interesting things to tell you. What I have to tell you today is something that amazed me so much. 

I was in my room one afternoon trying to get some rest when suddenly I started hearing unusual voices, one of them was saying:I will slap you,  will you shut up your silly mouth,  where is your room,  who owns these gadgets? and other questions. 

What could the problem be, I remained puzzled in my room  and because I was eager to know what was going on,  I peeped through the window and then I saw gun men holding my neighbor. 

Although we are not in talking terms because he does not answer whenever I greet him, maybe because he feels I am too small or maybe because he owns a car and I don't have one.  (I have no idea what his reason could be). 

I peeped through the curtains in my room and I watched as they put handcuff on his hands and they took him away.

Later in the day,  we got to know that he went to steal with his gang members
root_title: How Possible Is It For My Neighbor With A Cool Face To Be A Thief.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Idea of Use and Dump. As A Lady, You Have To Stop Being A Cheap Commodity That Will Be Consumed And Rendered Useless. You Are Priceless, Yes I Said You Are.
body:
There are things that never cease to amaze me and I can't just help but wonder why those things happen the way that they do. I am a Lady and I am very proud to be one, but I have noticed that the way some ladies think can be really questioning.

A friend came to visit and she came along with a lady who was crying, my friend said she did not want to leave her alone at home so that she will not hurt herself and that is the reason why she decided to bring her to my place.
I became interested in the issue and the Lady told me that there was a guy she liked but she just saw that he was getting married to someone else next week.

She was really crying as she lamented about being an object that men have used and dumped on several occasions. I became interested in her case, so I sat close to her and I pleaded with her to stop crying, but she went further, this is not the first time, you will not understand. I was getting interested, I wanted to know more, so I pleaded with her to please tell me more about the whole
root_title: The Idea of Use and Dump. As A Lady, You Have To Stop Being A Cheap Commodity That Will Be Consumed And Rendered Useless. You Are Priceless, Yes I Said You Are.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Get Realisitc About Your Wishes.{Do Not Just Wish For It, Work For It Too}
body:
My brother has a shirt that he loves so much and he wears it for almost every special occasion he attends, the last time he wanted to go out, I told him not to wear the cloth and I asked him if there was really anything special with it, he said the only reason why he loves to wear the cloth is because of the words that are written on it and that was the time I decided to carefully read the words written on the cloth.

 <they wish for it, but we work for it>

These words really got me thinking as I realized that that is one great mystery of life, while we have people who only day-dream about achieving success, we have people who work extra hard to get things done.

https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8a/Make-a-Wish-Come-True-Overnight-Step-9.jpg/aid6747893-v4-728px-Make-a-Wish-Come-True-Overnight-Step-9.jpg

### What Do You Wish For?

It is not a lie that there is a great power behind your imagination, as a matter of fact, you can successfully transfer the idea from the mind into reality. The mind has so g
root_title: Get Realisitc About Your Wishes.{Do Not Just Wish For It, Work For It Too}

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Plight Of A Pretty Nigerian Lady (A True Life Story)
body:
The way some young boys behave can be really annoying, sometimes they act as though they have seen something to devour whenever they see a young pretty Lady. 

That was the experience of my pretty friend when she went out to get something, she stopped at a store where there where some young men sitting outside,  as she passed by,  they started smiling at each other and one of them said you know it has been long we have seen something like this,  so let us better make  good us of the chance we have. 


I guess they did not know that she understands their native language, Immediately she heard that she hurried out of the place and they all stared in amazement. 

As if that was not enough drama for a day,  she was standing at a point to purchase an item when a little boy hit her bag from behind,  she turned to look at the person and the next thing the little boy said was that: I am just greeting you Aunty,  she was shocked and was even too confused to say anything. 

While she stood there still trying to think
root_title: The Plight Of A Pretty Nigerian Lady (A True Life Story)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: After The Abuja Meet-up, I Decided To Stay Back To Enjoy Some Of The Things I Never Enjoyed Growing Up In Abuja, Because There Are Different Categories Of People Who Live In Abuja.Thanks To Steemit, Things Are Getting Better For Me And My Family.
body: The first category of people are the politicians, the sucessful business men and women and all the wealthy people of the society. You cannot even get close to these arears because of the tight security arund, but just walking past the environment will make you wish it was your father's property. The second category of people who live here are those who are just rich not wealthy. They can also afford to live in GRA'S and drive big cars, but definitely not like the wealthy ones. So they are just the middle classed individuals who are comfortable. Now, the third category is those people who live in the rural areas of Abuja, those places are not places you want to go to at all. The environment looks very rough and dirty, some of the roofs are old and leaky. The people in this area most times are those who do little everyday jobs and feed from hand to mou

title: The Ibadan Steemit Meet-up Was A Great One, I Enjoyed Every Bit Of It, I Learnt Something Great and My Plea.
body: The Ibadan steemit meet-up was mind blowing, I must commend the brain behind this meetup. I learnt lot of things during the course of this meet up and I was very glad that I attended the meetup. This was a very large gathering, the uyo meet-up is the largest gathering I have attended but I am say that this is a very large gathering as well. One great lesson I learnt from this meet-up is that, steemit is not all about the amount of money you have in your wallet, it is more about adding value, it is about your personality. I must confess that I really felt loved during the meet-up and I am grateful to everyone who made that possible. author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Am In Ibadan For The Ibadan Steemit Meet up.  We Set The Pace and Others Follow.
body:
Hello friends.... It is morning over here and I am saying a beautiful morning to you all,  I arrived Ibadan yesterday evening and that fresh air made me feel at home again. 

Ibadan is home for me,  this is where I come from and  I was born and raised here for some time as well.  I was able to still locate some places and I was really excited as I told my friends about it. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/wx3wcubkri.jpg)

When I got to Ibadan,  I was welcomed by my very own Ibadan brother @fisteganos,  a beautiful woman with a nice accent @mosunomotunde.  I like to see married women who still play around and feels free around people, @xpency was as well present,  the brief and summarized man(please don't beat me o,  I only heard someone calling you that) .  

Then I meet @nairadaddy, the daddy that makes money, I also meet @ewuoso I have heard a lot about him,  I am glad I finally meet him.  Then I meet my steemit daddy @ejemai, and he gave me pizza just like a father will do to it's child. 

Yes,  @destiny
root_title: I Am In Ibadan For The Ibadan Steemit Meet up.  We Set The Pace and Others Follow.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Power of Love-The Story of Sola and Rebecca
body:
An adage says where someone's heart is that is where his treasure will be. 
This adage can be applied to the chemistry that plays out between two lover birds. Love is a fire that burns without setting it ablaze, love is invincible, magical and unconditional.

Sola, a graduate of English department at Ambrose Ali University was posted to Ogun state for his service year  early last year after he has completed his Bs.c program. 
Prior before then sola has been fantasizing about a life without his parents guarding and overpampering him, maybe because he was their only son and a son of their old age. 

While he was in school, his mother visited every weekend to check on him. Although, his parents wanted him to stay off campus for the comfortability and convenience but sola insisted on staying in the campus hostel. 
Although, the lifestyle on campus was poor and unbearable but because sola wanted a low life as oppose to his original lifestyle as a son of mult-millionaire businessman & woman he decided to stay in t
root_title: The Power of Love-The Story of Sola and Rebecca

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Motivational Talks For The Day.  Get Motivated, Stay Motivated
body:
I have learnt over time that,  if you do not start anything good for yourself,  then you will never go far. 

The principle behind living a life filled with Success is to stop procrastinating, the idea of procrastination is a great destiny destroyer. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/76yjf1m1z6.jpg)

The moment you stop Procastinatng,it is one major enemy down already and then you can begin to work on other things. 


It is really necessary that you learn to improve on your abilities daily,  do not give room for idleness or laziness,  always have it in mind that the type of people that the world needs are those who have spent time to grow themselves and also work hard in the place of discipline. If you do not develop yourself,  no one will value you. 

Place a high value on yourself because the higher your value then the higher the demand you attract to yourself. 

[Image Source](https://medium.com/swlh/heres-why-you-need-to-learn-the-other-half-of-patience-now-51f7746d33dd)

act=8&ved=0ahUKEwiLodqVqaPZAhUHM

title: Yesterday Was A Day To Celebrate Love, And I Had So Much Fun With My Love @gbenga.
body:
Yesterday was another Valentine's Day, and it was an interesting day filled with so much love. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/g4pobm6714.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/84g29c161t.jpg)

My day was a rather lovely day and I must say that I enjoyed it to the fullest. 
As a matter of fact, this is the very first Valentine celebration I will have. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/s19t8yy5ru.jpg)

My school time table has never favored students for this Valentine celebration because we always have an exam paper a day after the celebration.

Yes, someone decided to spoil me and I must confess that I enjoyed every moment I had with him. 
So I am dedicating this post to the person who has decided to make my happiness his priority. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/xaijko28l4.jpg)

Those days when we started,  I think it was presicely 4   years ago when I meet you,  my friends told me you had nothing to offer,  my Dad told me I should look for a better option (someone who was financially stable), but I deci

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm (Fifth Season)
body:
My new friend and I walked back home with our pots of water gently sitting on our head, I loved the way I looked when I looked at myself in the water.

Abeke started telling me beautiful things about the village and I even got more interested in the things that she told me, I was eager to know more so I promised to go to the farm with her later in the day.

http://www.aljazeera.com/mritems/Images/2015/9/6/bf6bd898655f4a6fb2f1cb6c8ec61e33_18.jpg

I got back home and I found my supposed mother preparing breakfast, it was my favorite, white rice and stew, I was so eager to have a taste of the meal because the aroma filled the entire house.
I was getting used to her by now and I must confess that one of the things I enjoyed in this new realm of mine was the tasty meal this supposed mother of mine prepares, she cooks so well that I want to eat at every opportunity that I get.

http://www.wateraid.org/ng/~/media/Images/Global/Feature-or-static-carousel-1212x500-else-992x450/NIG5_064.jpg?h=500&la=en-NG&w=1212

Mama

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm (Fourth Season)
body:
Yeah, just like I promised in the previous episode, I loosened up a bit in the other realm and then I realized how much my supposed parents adore and cherish me, I was obviously like a gift from heaven to them.
My mother does the cooking, while I help out with sweeping and fetching of water just like the other maidens in the community.

My father likes to see that I appear beautiful amongst the other maidens around so when he goes to the city for business, he will get me beautiful wrappers and pieces of jewelry that looked really great on me.

![IMG_20180207_215257_436.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdzvQsELp1vfd7Qrv6eKzbRQhUWkR3zXc3CGgfNL83pXA/IMG_20180207_215257_436.jpg)

I decided to have a friend and there is this pretty Lady that comes by our house every morning to greet my parents whenever she is going to the stream to fetch water, I liked the fact that she had an attractive skin, so I decided to make her my friend.

I woke up early that morning to make sure I get to see my new friend and go to the s
root_title: My Life In The Other Realm (Fourth Season)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm (Third Season)
body:
I acted dumb because there was nothing that my confused mind could let out of my mouth, so I kept staring into the atmosphere and observing everything around which was still strange to me.

The woman who is supposed to be my mother is helplessly panting and running helter-skelter for people to come to her aid, she was screaming and in her words, I heard her say, even if I have offended anyone must they hurt my only child, they would have done something to me instead.

![Screenshot_20180123-205622_1.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdBNag4639Ti6fdL5Nxq9SGtE55Tact6jskMFXbMXoZgd/Screenshot_20180123-205622_1.jpg)

A lorry parked beside the house and a good looking man highlighted from the lorry, my supposed mother ran towards his direction as she knelt down and said, you are welcome my husband, this is what is happening, our own daughter cannot even speak to me or recognize me again, have I offended the gods or what is happening?

My supposed father came close to me and put his hand on my shoulder, he said my da
root_title: My Life In The Other Realm (Third Season)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm (Season 2)
body:
Of course, it was with your consent, you have lived here happily for some time now and every young man around here wants you as their wife because you are really calm and well cultured.

https://uh8yh30l48rpize52xh0q1o6i-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/EENG-II-11_23A.jpg

As a matter of fact, your presence in Mr. Ogodo's life has been a blessing because the difference in his family since your arrival has been very glaring.
I asked him a question, please for how long have I been here?
You have been here for about a week now, how come you cannot remember anything? I do not think you are feeling well, let me quickly take you home.

He held my hand and took me down a bushy path, I tied a wrapper on my waist and I wore a buba as the blouse to properly make it fit, I had my hair plaited in a local way and my ear-rings were locally made as well. I looked too different to even properly recognize myself.

When we got to the hut, he knocked on the wooden door and a woman came out, when she saw me, s
root_title: My Life In The Other Realm (Season 2)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Life In The Other Realm (First Season)
body:
And of course I had my head filled with so many things that morning, there was a lot of thought that crowded my head, I was thinking of my family, my relationship, my career and my life in general, how I was going to make everything work out and make my being meaningful.

I decided to go for morning jogging just to lift my mood and get my head cleared, BAE has been misbehaving and I did not want to be the first person to call him, so I wanted to get all those memories off my mind.
There were so many options to leave him for, so I was trying to decide if I should stick with him or just leave to be with someone else.

![IMG_20180207_215257_436.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdzvQsELp1vfd7Qrv6eKzbRQhUWkR3zXc3CGgfNL83pXA/IMG_20180207_215257_436.jpg)

I quickly put on something comfortable that I could easily jog with and I was on my way to jog, as I moved 5km away from home, I noticed some dogs by the road side, luckily for me I saw them afar off so I took another route immediately.

I started jogging towards
root_title: My Life In The Other Realm (First Season)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Late Entry For NDJT Contest 2
body:
I am so sorry for presenting my entry for the contest late, but I know I have to participate. I am a very boring person, I just hope you enjoy  me exploring the sincerity of my mind.

![IMG_20180203_103504.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdQtb54R7Z91VRQ4yW1iHMjjQVY3yAy2ua27YJc3g5Pfs/IMG_20180203_103504.jpg)

At what age did you have your first kiss?
At age 19, with my first and only boyfriend.(I told you I was boring)!!

What is the cheapest gift you have ever received?
A birthday card of 50Naira from my secondary school crush.

What is the most expensive gift you have ever received from a partner.
The gift of love (I think that is all that matters).

Ladies: Which would you rather go without? Brassiere or Make-up for three days.
I could comfortably go without the both, but I think I will still love to go without the make-up if I am to choose.

Guys: Which would you rather go without? A comb or a wristwatch?
For the guys......

Qualities of your ideal man or woman?
A God fearing, loving, serious-minded, ded
root_title: My Late Entry For NDJT Contest 2

author: oluwatobiloba
title: About Steemit Campus Invasion In Otefe,  Delta State
body:
The steemit campus invasion  was a huge success and I was really excited to be a part of the event. 

The speakers for the event were @destinysaid, @gbenga, and @ehiboss. 
I learned a lot of things from the event and I was glad to be in attendance. 

@mediahousnt anchored  the event and it was fun all through. 

@gbenga talked about how steemit has transformed  his life,  he told his story of moving from grass to grace and he said his life has changed because of steemit. 

@ehiboss talked about how real steemit is and he described  it as been far from being a ponzi scheme.

Free snacks was shared to everyone and we had some contestants, we had people who sang and others who danced. 

I was trying to upload a video, but it was not just  working, so I decided to share pictures instead.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/00oucyuexy.jpg)
This is me,  your very own @oluwatobiloba. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/3vzcrvc03u.jpg)
This is myself and Sir @gbenga. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/789u8bkzbp.jpg)
Myse
root_title: About Steemit Campus Invasion In Otefe,  Delta State

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Journey From Akure To Delta For The Steemit Campus Invasion.
body:
I heard about the steemit campus invasion organized by our very own @destinysaid, and I just had to attend it because @destinysaid is an awesome brother, so I started the journey from Akure to Delta.

I left home very excited and I thought to share the pictures, this is the first time I will be doing make up on my face by myself, and I think I tried at it.

![IMG_20180202_112936.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXXf9RmxLd8FTaGf96aiweNZAM1f6M5MMc1KtCc8AXouQ/IMG_20180202_112936.jpg)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Stay Inspired, Get Prepared For The Next Phase
body:
I have realized that sometimes we all just want to achieve success with so much speed that we fail to realize that we need to prepare ourselves for the next level we aspire to attain.

Yes, my friend there are different levels in life and we all want to go from one level of achievement to the other, but we fail to realize that most of these things needs us to be ready for them,

https://cdn.vectorstock.com/i/thumb-large/57/71/businessman-running-for-achievement-the-success-vector-16175771.jpg

Little wonder the reason why so many of us misuse opportunities, when we get them. It is because we have not prepared ourselves well enough for the next stage in life that we desire to attain.

So my friend, for that next level or next stage in life, you have to get properly prepared for it, that way you will make the best out of life.

[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjhu634xYjZAhUEXBQKHV2kAm0QjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vectorstock.com%2Froyal
root_title: Stay Inspired, Get Prepared For The Next Phase

author: oluwatobiloba
title: This Is To The Arm That Cares For Me Unconditionally.
body:
To the eyes that see me perfectly, to the eyes that loves me unconditionally,
To the hand that saves, to the hand that preserves, 
To the heart that cares,
To the hand that sustains,
To the brain that goes without rest, just because he cares for me.
I say I am grateful.

http://unconditionalrecovery.com/uploads/3/7/9/6/3796848/1356436743_orig.jpg

To the dears that listen constantly to my voice,
My requests are never too numerous for him,
He knows exactly the right moment to either say a yes, no or later,
To the ears that never gets tired of me . I say thank you.

https://static.wixstatic.com/media/57e86cf95ca648d0a9c58917c66c8ed7.jpg/v1/fill/w_458,h_305/57e86cf95ca648d0a9c58917c66c8ed7.jpg

To the mouth that speaks,
He loves me so much that he tells me when to move and when to stay where I am,
He orders my steps aright,
When he knows that I have a schedule that is too tight, he makes me tired and then I want a little rest, then he speaks to guide me.
I am really grateful.

Sometimes, I act really stubborn b
root_title: This Is To The Arm That Cares For Me Unconditionally.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Think It Is High Time You Begin To Take Good Care Of Yourself Because You Deserve It. Using Myself As A Case Study.
body:
As easy as these words I have spelled out in my topic seem, it was something really difficult for me to adhere to and I think that was because I thought about others more than myself.

I must admit that I am a lover, and when I love someone I could do anything for the person (except dying for the person!!), so the bottom line is that I love and it is for real.

![Screenshot_20180123-205741.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWCqH7mx1LkB5CCTb4NvY3vvvCnWid89rWmR2vciiaskW/Screenshot_20180123-205741.png)

As a born lover, I always look out for the good of everyone around me, placing myself out of the equation totally, at a young age, I started getting involved in petty trades and little things so that I could support the family and everything I made from all I got was given to my siblings.

I wanted them to feel satisfied, in the little way I could help, I wanted my Parents to always smile at me, I will take nothing out of all the profit I made back then and I will give all out.
At some point, my Mum was scared th
root_title: I Think It Is High Time You Begin To Take Good Care Of Yourself Because You Deserve It. Using Myself As A Case Study.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Happy Birthday To My Princess,!! I Love You Deary
body:
Today is really a special day for me because it was the day my one and only kid sister was born. My friend, my gist mate, my gossip partner, my love.

![IMG-20180128-WA0026.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmddCdwvEZgFLVZt539MFzJEjVKbFrAh55CJJAJWbySGP1/IMG-20180128-WA0026.jpg)

She is simply an angel in disguise, she is an epitome of beauty and those lovely dimples on her face add to the amazing features that God has bestowed upon her.

She is lovely and highly intelligent, when we were kids my parents use to insult me a lot for not being able to read like her because she had loved to read right from childhood and that has not changed up till date.

I am saying thank you for giving me the opportunity to be a big sister to you and to practice motherhood with you (because she says I behave like a mother). She said I am her best friend and I really feel flattered to hear that.

![IMG-20180128-WA0029.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcmDziZ3ZzXkoYx4rP126cPrSw6pGe81aNWHR1BFz1WMt/IMG-20180128-WA0029.jpg)

![IMG-201
root_title: Happy Birthday To My Princess,!! I Love You Deary

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating A Wonderful Brother !! Happy Birthday Uncle Steve.
body:
Yesterday was my very own uncle Steve's birthday and I really wanted to write a post to celebrate him, but the network over here is indeed terrible, so I decided to make it today.

![IMG-20180128-WA0000.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTxNQXxtJ6ZmfNEnqQHbYbGmxQTfA535wxXobEinixieL/IMG-20180128-WA0000.jpg)

I don't even know where to start from in celebrating this great brother of mine, very serious, loving and a wonderful person.

He can love for Africa, he is really a lover boy !!!(please don't tell him I said that oh), but I like him for that anyways, I love people who love genuinely and who really have the gods to show that their love is for real.

He can also form green lantern, and I just wish he had the power of a green lantern for real, I would have become super wealthy.

![20180104_194826.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYwPgkkPCptq6kKn9sccrLBMjAYd84NFZYZ5jeyJhwDDn/20180104_194826.jpg)

This is just one person I cannot help but wait for his wedding because I will dance like never before, as a matter

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Don't Know If It Just My Mentality, But This Does Not Just Describe A Normal Nigerian Home.
body:
I am not trying to get judgmental over this issue because I know that there are different reasons why people do things. But, then this is not just the type of Nigerian home that I grew up to learn about.

Trust me when I say that Nigerian homes are blessed and beautiful, although some of them are questionable just like this one I am about to tell you about.

http://www.ehealthinsurance.com.ng/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/family-support.jpg

I just moved into this new apartment where the owner of the house has a building where they live in but have different smaller rooms built around the big building which they give out for rent (hope you get the picture?)

Okay, I have no idea if the house belongs to the husband or the wife, the only thing I know is that they both live together with their two grown-up female children.

https://afrifoodnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/nigeria-family-300x150.jpg

### The Questioning Aspect.
There are two cars in the house, and the wife drives the two cars to work every da
root_title: I Don't Know If It Just My Mentality, But This Does Not Just Describe A Normal Nigerian Home.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Taking Off The Wigs, I Hope I Don't Look Too Bad
body:
Just trying to take some time off work and playing a little bit. I wanted to look different, without the wigs and I think I like the result, so I decided to share some of the pictures I took, I hope you like them.

I cannot explain the reason why I unconsciously raise my toe whenever I am taking a photograph and I had to disturb my neighbor to take them, so he was trying to show himself by reflecting in the mirror.

Take out time to play and laugh, you have absolutely nothing to get proud about, give, love, share and live a fulfilled life.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Regret I Feel From Paying Him A Surprise Visit
body:
I decided to try my hands on this; I hope I can do well with it. Enjoy and give feed backs.

Trying to think straight, trying to clear my head,
 Trying to be sure I was not just seeing something else,
I wanted to be sure that my eyes were seeing correctly,
I used my hands to wipe my face, to make sure that I was seeing clearly,
When I was sure that my eyes were not deceiving me,
I busted into tears, I cried and turned away.



https://madailygist.ng/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/emotionally-needy-lady.jpg

I had loved him with all my life,
I had loved him sincerely with all that I had,
Even when better options came, I did not leave him,
I held on to him because I thought he was the best option for me.

https://i2.wp.com/damiblog.com.ng/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/sad-lady-1.jpg?fit=769%2C465

Now, I wanted to give him a surprise visit,
And what I saw, was not something I will ever wish to see again,
He was with another Lady,
He always told me that he despised extra large Ladies and which was a call for me to wat
root_title: The Regret I Feel From Paying Him A Surprise Visit

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Meet My New Friend Kings, He Is Such An Attractive Little Boy and You Will Like Him Too.
body:
I just meet this wonderful and beautiful friend, he is such a wonderful person so I want you to meet him too.
 
I was in my room one day trying to relax when I heard a knock on the door when I got to the door I discovered it was my neighbor and she told me that she was going out and she wanted a little boy to stay with me.

I looked at the little boy and he smiled at me, his smile was really charming and attractive, so I fell in love with them immediately.

When he got into my room, he looked around and observed quietly.

How are you doing? I asked him. He looked at me and said, I am fine thank you.

What is your name? My name is kings.

![IMAG1310.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdeFEFJh85bhgNXGqszSkZjg1gAovBH5dZ8eTHhAYDruc/IMAG1310.jpg)

Almost immediately, the light came up and the little boy shouted, UP NEPA. I turned to look at him and he said so we are going to watch television. He touched my system and looked at my face as he said, open it and let us watch television.

I looked at him and I wish it w
root_title: Meet My New Friend Kings, He Is Such An Attractive Little Boy and You Will Like Him Too.

title: My Final Entry For The Seven Days Black and White Contest.
body:
This is going to be my final entry to the black and white contest and I must confess that I had a lovely time on this challenge, displaying lots of beautiful and descriptive pictures, I appreciate @samstickz for the nomination.

Follow these rules to participate in the the challenge:

Present 7 random black & white images that represent an aspect of your life.

Present one image every day for seven days.

No people.

No explanation.

Nominate someone every day. Although anyone can join in the challenge.

Use the tag: #sevendaybnwchallenge as one of your tags.

I nominate @snrm to participate in the contest.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The ndjt contest, now this contest really made me say the truth.
body:
I was nominated for this contest a few days back but I did not notice until yesterday and since then I have been thinking of what to write and how real I could be..... I was forced to ask myself if I will really answer these questions sincerely but the contest was initiated by @mimy, so I have no other choice than to answer the questions.

![Screenshot_20180112-215919.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmb41Ppm1BY9EenJgQGApHRNtD14GCbatzJaTHRZSKH9DT/Screenshot_20180112-215919.png)

Okay, let's get started.

What is that silly thing that takes a tear out of your eye?

   When I put on a fitted gown and my big stomach will not stop embarrassing me. 

What's the weirdest thing you love the most?

I can't think of any right now.

Funny part of the opposite gender that you like?

    Their ability to take responsibility and their strength.

Who is your steemit crush?

    @gbenga (I am just a girl with feelings. Lol)

What is the craziest thing you have done on steemit?

    I have been properly guided by a strong an
root_title: The ndjt contest, now this contest really made me say the truth.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How Well Have You Invested In Yourself, Or Are You Still Carried Away With Trying To Build Up People Who Will Insult You In The Nearest Future When You Have No Strength To Help Yourself Anymore.
body:
Most times we get so carried away with the things around us that we forget to take care of our self, we get so carried away by the amount we have in our bank accounts, by the number of cars we own and the number of houses we have bought that we forget that our soul needs to be taken care of, as this will help us have proper control and absolute management over all that we have acquired over time.

https://s-i.huffpost.com/gen/3312156/images/n-DIVORCE-FRIENDS-628x314.jpg

If only you know how powerful and valuable you are, then you will know that you are far above those things you have acquired and you can always get more satisfaction.

There are people who are victors but still behave like victims just because they do not understand how strong and powerful they are or how well they can make things work out for themselves.

Investing in yourself means that you can build yourself up, make yourself better, make yourself stronger, make yourself more independent. One problem we have is that we are so carried away
root_title: How Well Have You Invested In Yourself, Or Are You Still Carried Away With Trying To Build Up People Who Will Insult You In The Nearest Future When You Have No Strength To Help Yourself Anymore.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Short Story On The Reality Of Life.The Bitterness Came To an End.
body:
I was trying to reflect on somethings that have happened in my life this morning and I remember one of my late uncle and his dealings when he was alive.

This man was really a strong man and he looked like someone who will live forever, although he always has issues with his wife and the reason for the constant fight was one thing no one could explain.

http://thenationonlineng.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/African-woman-891x470.jpg

From the story we heard, it was said that they really loved each other and even when the girl's parent will not have them get married because of difference in religious belief, they eloped together to get married. Their love grew every day and people envied them.

After some time, they started fighting and what everyone thought to be a normal marital issue turned into something big, because a whole week will not pass by without them getting involved in a fight that people will come help them settle.
It graduated into them laying curses on each other whenever such fight happens,
root_title: A Short Story On The Reality Of Life.The Bitterness Came To an End.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: You Need to Start Taking Responsibilities For Your Actions
body:
One thing we are very good at is apportioning blames, looking for who we should blame for our failure, looking for who we should blame for our irresponsibilities and misconducts.
We are very good at trying to apportion blames, like he was a source of distraction to me, if he did not come into my life, I would not have failed at all, but his presence in my life caused all of this failure.

https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/65/Take-Responsibility-for-Your-Role-in-a-Breakup-Step-4.jpg/aid8251127-v4-728px-Take-Responsibility-for-Your-Role-in-a-Breakup-Step-4.jpg

One thing I do not understand is if you are saying that someone's presence in your life made you fail, were you sleeping when the person was going through the process of making you fail or what exactly were you doing at that point?

These are questions you should ask yourself whenever you want to start blaming someone or when you want to start making another person become responsible for the setback in your life.

One thing I want you to understand
root_title: You Need to Start Taking Responsibilities For Your Actions

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Appreciate The People Who Have Helped You Achieve Success
body:
Hello beautiful steemians, I welcome you to my blog this morning and I am very happy to have you around.
Yes, I want to talk to you this morning my friend and yes I mean you.

How well do you appreciate the people who have helped you in the achievement of life dreams and accomplishment.Do you even value them at all, or do you just make them feel that the period that you need them is over?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Another Owambe (Party) Story
body:
Every party she hears about does not ever pass her by, whenever she hears any information about any party available, she will hurry there.
She attends those events and dances like never before, sometimes she gets sprayed and picks up the money, 
On few occasions, she makes so much money to feed her for the entire week since people have the usual habit of spending so much during parties like that in Nigeria.

http://www.naijaloaded.com.ng/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/owambe4.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwizjJi33L3YAhWEbxQKHdCuCggQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.naijaloaded.com.ng%2Fothers%2F4-reasons-lagosians-love-owambe-parties&psig=AOvVaw3uuYryiJRGUS8dnH6FLZD2&ust=1515135151000494)

On other occasions, she will go with a warmer to put excess food inside and carefully keep it safe inside her big bag and rush home with it.

No one really noticed her and she continued in this habit for long until one day, she attended a wedding recepti
root_title: Another Owambe (Party) Story

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Fallng Apart 2
body:
She was indeed surprised to have him around and although she desired someone else to be around her by this point, she did not allow that to spoil her day as he took her out and they really had fun.

It was getting late and she knew that she had to leave immediately because it was getting really dark, she told that she had to get back home and he immediately offered to drop her at home,  even if she was already having a soft spot for this new guy, she knew how much her heart desired the other guy and how much she wanted him to come wrap his hands around her immediately.

She stepped out of his car and she gave him a warm smile which melted his heart as always, thank you for everything she said, he looked at her and said thank you for making me happy, and I really hope that you grant my request very soon.
Let us leave that talk until next time, thanks again she mumbled as she walked in a forward direction.

She got into her house and as she walked straight into her living room, she realized everywhere looked s
root_title: Fallng Apart 2

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Start Believing in Yourself and Make Yourself and Everyone Around You Better.
body:
Yeah...... we are finally in 2018 and I am so happy, I cannot even express how happy I am.
2017 has been great and awesome, although it did not start well and I was really scared at the middle of the year that things will not work well for me, as a matter of fact, I almost gave up until God started to change my story and I must say, he has been the one all the way.

So it is a new beginning again and I will like to ask you a simple question, how many lives did you affect in the year 2017, and if that is gone, how many lives have you planned to affect in the year 2018 or is it just going to be all about you again?

https://assets.entrepreneur.com/content/3x2/1300/1409161496-7-signs-great-employee-mgiht-bad-boss.jpg?width=750&crop=16:9

We should learn to stop expecting things from people all the time, rather we should be able to give to people as well.
Always learn to affect lives in the little way that you can and try to make yourself significant in any way you can.

Sometimes, it might not even be about giv
root_title: Start Believing in Yourself and Make Yourself and Everyone Around You Better.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Falling Apart
body:
Oh my God how on earth could he have forgotten her birthday again this year, this was not the first time he will forget an important day like that in her life.

She was really upset but because she loved him, she still placed a call through to him to remind him that he was supposed to call her to at least give a birthday wish which he had simply forgotten to do.

His phone rang three times before he finally picked up the call.

Him: Hello baby, how are you doing?

Her: Good afternoon, how is work going I hope it is not too stressful?

Him: Working hard as usual and by the way did you get an alert on your phone, I sent you some cash.

Her: I have not received any alert, but please do you know what today's date is?

Him: Today, is I think 12th or thereabouts, why are you even asking me about the date?

Her: Because today is my birthday and you did not call again.

Him: Please baby I am sorry, but you should understand the fact that I am very busy and I have so many things in my head to think of.

Her: And sinc
root_title: Falling Apart

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Falling In Love but Scared of my Past
body:
I started feeling hot and uncomfortable, that day was a day I never wanted to remember again, why will he ask me such a question and remind me of such annoying memories.
Yes, I loved him, I wanted to be able to tell him all about my past and present, I wanted to open up about my dreams, fears and all that has to do with me.

https://media0.mensxp.com/media/content/2017/Oct/how-to-love-a-woman-with-a-troubled-past-1400x653-1507636069_1100x513.jpg

But, this very chapter of my life was one thing I never wanted to remember ever again. The last time he asked me, I did not give a reply and immediately he noticed my countenance, he had said if you do not want to talk about it, then it’s fine.

Today, he seemed really serious about it, he did not want to take No for an answer, he wanted to know the reason why I will avoid talking about my father totally. 
He looked at me and said, please tell me what it is, I promise to understand. I smiled to myself when he made that statement because I wondered how he was going t
root_title: Falling In Love but Scared of my Past

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Another Story of a Happy Mother Who Trained Her Children Well.
body:
She had no idea what everything was all about, she had dressed up that morning as her first daughter had instructed her, she wore a simple but really nice gown that her daughter had gotten for her some days back.

As she stepped out of the house, she meets a taxi in front of her building and she questioned his presence, when he told her her daughter had sent him to pick her up, she did not believe him until she called her daughter over the phone and she instructed her to enter into the taxi.

She sat in the taxi and she remembered how she had lost her husband in a terrible car accident some years back, and ever since that time she had been weighed down with the responsibility of taking care of the two lovely angels she had with her.

She had gotten involved in different business just to make sure they had a successful education, she remembered how she had to go into debts to pay their fees and she had even sold off her jewelry and clothes on several occasions to meet up with their daily demand.

She got dist
root_title: Another Story of a Happy Mother Who Trained Her Children Well.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Still Preaching Self Love
body:
Have you had time to look at yourself in the mirror lately, have you ever taken a good look at those amazing curves, I mean the way your lips are specially carved your hips specially built, those amazing features that distinguish you, those features that make your friends know that this is you and nobody else but you.

http://belightliving.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/64-what-is-self-love-all-about.jpg

Why do you think you need exceptional approvement before you feel amazing or why do you think some people do not love you and the next thing is to commit suicide.

https://s-i.huffpost.com/gen/4019572/images/o-SELF-LOVE-facebook.jpg

Think twice my dear friend, have a second thought about your decision and begin to love yourself because you are amazing just the way you are.

[Image Source 1](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjYjoa63KzYAhVNlxQKHXp6C24QjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fbelightliving.com%2F2015%2F07%2Fself-love-alchemy%2F&psig=AOvVaw3L9zQwbX27fOy

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Christmas Celebration Was Great, Thanks To Steemit Platform. View Post to See Evidence.
body:
This Christmas celebration was an awesome one, it is the best I have experienced in a long while.

I am grateful to the sustainer of life, the giver of peace and the giver of wealth, my sustainer, my friend, and my God.

I am really grateful to the steemit platform and to the wonderful mind that introduced me to the community and has stayed supportive since that time and that is in the person of @gbenga. God bless you, boss.

To the amazing friends, I have meet on this platform, to those I have seen and those I have never seen, thank you all for the great support through upvotes and comments. You all made my Christmas wonderful.

I had fun with my amazing siblings and I am really happy I could make them smile this Christmas season, I really had fun. I have not taken pictures like this in a long time. Please enjoy the pictures while I share them with you.

On our way to church to celebrate that  Christmas morning!!!!

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Christmas Celebration in Nigeria
body:
Christmas celebration is usually a good period here in Nigeria, it is a time when families get together, periods when there is exchange of gifts and there is usually so much love during this season that you begin to wish it should last forever.

I will share some pictures with about the way people are celebrating Christmas over here in Nigeria and I hope you enjoy them.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Love Yourself
body:
Self-love is something that should be emphasized over and over again, it should be repeated in the ears of everyone who cares to listen that it is important that you learn to love yourself.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Dumb Little Child
body:
She did not need anyone to remind her about the beauty of her daughter, she knew her daughter was really pretty, she watched her beauty grow and blossom daily and she was happy she had such a great beauty as a daughter.

Everyone liked to be around her and to associate themselves with her, she was such a great beauty that no one could ignore, the only problem she had was that whenever people come close to her to ask for her name, she will just look up at them and smile.

http://www.headshots-newyork.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/Kushner.-138.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwi6_NWKiaHYAhXFXRQKHR_MB8cQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.headshots-newyork.com%2Fadorable-overload%2F&psig=AOvVaw21FcbtAgMA2N_whp3bPLAh&ust=1514150610507989)

A smile was the only therapy for the little girl because she was a dump, she could not speak. Her mother had tried different things that could make her daughter speak but all to no avail.

She was a little p
root_title: The Dumb Little Child

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Pregnant Women I Meet at the Hospital
body:
I was at the hospital some days back and I had to stay there for a long time because my kid sister was admitted to the hospital and I had to stay with her there.

Something caught my attention during our stay in the hospital and that was a pregnant woman whose bed was close to our own, this woman was really going through a lot of pain.
http://motherhoodinstyle.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/o-PREGNANCY-LABOR-facebook.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjL1JiGkpzYAhVM7RQKHeQ9CvYQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fmotherhoodinstyle.net%2F2015%2F01%2F16%2F7-ways-to-relieve-pain-during-labour%2F&psig=AOvVaw1taF-bADUr3IIqiHyROvH1&ust=1513981315938484)


It was already over two weeks to the date of her delivery and there was still no sign of labor except for the pain she felt in her stomach and all around her body.

She was told that she has to go through operation in order to give birth to the child safely, but she wanted to have her baby herself, so
root_title: The Pregnant Women I Meet at the Hospital

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Living A Wicked Life of Forever
body:
It is important that we learn to live our lives in a way that we become aware that there are people watching.
Some of us live as though we own the world or as if the entire human race should continually bow at our feet.

Some of us have enough and even much more than we can give to those who do not have, but we drag all that we have to ourselves and even collect from others who do not have.

https://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/151/590x/secondary/death-705265.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjn6JHJ95jYAhWLshQKHV-iDDIQjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.express.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fscience%2F727666%2FEND-OF-DEATH-Humans-live-FOREVER-aubrey-de-grey&psig=AOvVaw2vOpkvHpJnupS_EwCOWRC3&ust=1513871126980668)

I was at an ATM spot some days back and two women meet each other, it looked as if they were friends and colleagues at work, the following conversation ensued between them;

1st Woman: Did you hear that Mrs. Bimbo is dead?

2nd Woman: Oh,
root_title: Living A Wicked Life of Forever

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Her Beauty and Greed Led to Her Destruction
body:
She has beautiful long legs, she has an attractive smile, she has beautifully carved lips and a beautiful set of teeth to compliment her powerful and attractive smile.

She was the most sought after Lady, even among her peers and so many young and even old men wanted to have her as their own.

http://www.naijapals.com/newsimg/upcoming_Collette_Orji.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwj0uJ-cw5HYAhVHIcAKHabvDpQQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gistmania.com%2Ftalk%2Ftopic%2C135537.0.html&psig=AOvVaw2wcIhpKpbJsE82dtQvGB61&ust=1513616284896147)

Her beauty got into her head so much that she started to misbehave, she began to look around for people who could give her money, she became a very greedy person, she wanted more and more money and she could give all that is needed just to get more of the money.

http://www.nigerianmonitor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Photo-4-389x600.jpg

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Motivational Quotes For The Day
body:
Self-love is basically the most relevant and the first and basic step to a good life.
The moment you begin to love yourself, it makes impossible becomes possible.

http://www.india.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/love-yourself-1.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjisrbHpY3YAhVIchQKHbuOAOcQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.india.com%2Flifestyle%2Fhow-to-love-yourself-5-tips-to-help-you-love-yourself-unconditionally-1759586%2F&psig=AOvVaw3yngL9mOnvI0fc5rCPkXx0&ust=1513471156306435)

title: A Call To Become More Careful
body:
The world we live in has become one that calls for more carefulness and a high level of reasoning ability.
It is amazing how we try to live our lives in a normal way meanwhile there are some people who are basically just looking for ways to bring us down.

The fact that your friend's success is more visible than yours does not in any way make you a failure, the only time you become
root_title: A Call To Become More Careful

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Scientific Reason Behind Fear
body:
Most of us as humans cannot deny the fact that we are uncontrollably scared about little things that happen to us and our ability to subject to fear has caused us so much of life opportunities and pleasures.
We have canceled some important occasions to fear and as well we have avoided taking a certain risk that will move our lives forward just because we are scared.

### A Case Study.
I have a friend who did not step out of the university all through her stay for the period of four years, she stayed indoors and never attended any social gathering because she was scared that something will happen to her on the way or even at the event. It was really bad that she even sends people to the market since she cannot go by herself.

https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/nintchdbpict000339985138.jpg?strip=all&w=960&quality=100
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwi61bH_wILYAhWBvxQKHWDwCaoQjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thesun.co.uk%2Fne
root_title: The Scientific Reason Behind Fear

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Learning Humility- Those Who Make Noise The Most Are The Ones Who Have Nothing To Offer.
body:
When the good book told us not to think more highly of ourselves than we ought to, it sure had a lot of good reason and point as well for saying that and when you hear some wise people say that empty barrels make the loudest noise, there is surely no lie about that statement.

https://ldsblogs.com/files/2017/04/church-members-el-salvador-851922-gallery-1.jpg

It has become a usual thing for us to see people who have nothing make so much noise and brag about the things they own as if they have the whole world, as a matter of fact, they overrate all that they have and they make every other person feel as if he owns nothing.

http://damagecontrolmma.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/conga_thumb.jpg

I went to a musical concert just a day ago and apart from the fact that I felt inspired, I learned a lot from the concert. There was this young man who happened to be one of those who will be singing, and he attracted attention towards himself because of his attitude, he was moving up and down and acting as if he was t
root_title: Learning Humility- Those Who Make Noise The Most Are The Ones Who Have Nothing To Offer.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Story, The Successful Completion of a Phase in My Life. I am Grateful.
body:
This is no way a fiction as what you are about to read is something that happened to me and I write my story to motivate others, to give hope to those who have lost hope and to make myself feel better.
I am sharing a memorable part of the happenings in my life, please do enjoy.

It was October 2013 and I had written Jamb again that year but did not get admitted to any institution which means I had to stay at home for another extra year, I had prayed, cried and fasted but nothing seemed to happen.

I love being independent and I feel very happy whenever I can help my family members get what they need, I started to fry and sell puff-puff, at that point any money I make will be given to my siblings as an allowance to school to help support my parents.

One day, my dad called me and said his friend told him that I was staying at home for too long and it was not good for me as a female child, his friend then told him that he should check out a private university that requires less school fee, I looked at my dad a
root_title: My Story, The Successful Completion of a Phase in My Life. I am Grateful.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Showing Off My Natural Look
body:
Good day wonderful people, it is a sunny and bright day on this side of the globe.
It is a great day and I think we all have something to be grateful for, I have been reading through some really educating post on this platform and I am glad to be a part of this awesome community.

I am really learning to laugh well because it is healthy and it helps lift my worries.

@ehiboss as well wrote a post some days back and he emphasized on the importance of doing without makeup sometimes, I am not a makeup addict, I cannot even do a proper makeup on my face without the assistance of my friend.

Today, I decided to make my natural hair without attachment or any additives.
I took this pictures without any makeup, not even powder or lipstick.
I don't know if I look good, that will be left for you to judge as I share the pictures I took today with you. Enjoy!!!
