title: Motivational Quotes For Today
body:
You only remain at the level you are at the moment because you have refused to build yourself to become a better person.

A person who wants to become better must be dedicated to continual growth and development.

And yes, you do not just expect the growth to occur immediately, it has to take some time, period and process yes I mean process and steps of growth, steps that show that you are really ready to give all that it takes for you to become a better person, steps that require sacrifice.

Self-development helps you improve and it makes you become a better person in all that you do and say.
You really have to become committed to growth if you want to grow.

And one more thing is that you have to stop limiting yourself to the things that you can do, what is believable is achievable, whatsoever you do not believe you can achieve, you can never achieve it, so let the journey to the pursuit of excellence begins from your mind and develop yourself daily to become a better person.

This is from @oluwatobiloba,
root_title: Motivational Quotes For Today

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Just Give It An Extra Push And All Will Be Fine
body:
It is very easy for us to preach hope and tell people to keep believing in themselves until we are faced with a challenge of our own.

https://img.haikudeck.com/mg/C5B1524E-24C7-46C7-91FE-04BE8B8712EA.jpg

At that very moment we become struck with reality, we never knew it was this bad, we thought it will be very easy to pull through, and now we have found it out to be rather uneasy.

# My Own Part of the Preaching.

As a matter of sincerity, we might be going through so much right now, we might have even lost hope because times are indeed trying.
One thing we have to know is that, it is not even an option to give up now, that one is indeed certain because you have given too much already that you cannot take back.

https://photo-viewbug.s3.amazonaws.com/media/mediafiles/2014/11/05/36918581_large.jpg

There are so many things you will do and say that you cannot just retrieve back and of course you have sacrificed too much to make what you have today happen and all you need is just a little more push, just giv
root_title: Just Give It An Extra Push And All Will Be Fine

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Dealing With A Dry Skin
body:
Dry skin is a skin condition that is very common and almost everyone has become very familiar with it. Dry skin can occur in either young people or adults, but it is believed to be more present in aged people.

Dry skin is basically a condition of lack of appropriate amount of water in the layer of the skin.
For older people, the amount of natural skin oil and lubricant is believed to have reduced greatly and thereby causing an unresistant dry skin.
Dry skin can be either temporary lasting for a few days or weeks and it might as well graduate into a long-term problem.

# Signs That You Have A Dry Skin.

http://beyondurgentcaremed.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/blog-dryskin.jpg

* Continuous itching of the body could occur as a result of dry skin.

* Cracks and breaks occurring on the skin.

* Discomfort on the body.

# Below are listed some things that might have caused your skin to begin to crack.

* A dry skin might occur as a result of the present weather condition. When the weather is dry, it might have
root_title: Dealing With A Dry Skin

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Another Scam Experience
body:
His hope seemed to have gotten shattered, every wall seems to have gotten broken, it seems as if there was just no hope for him anymore, where in heaven's name will he begin from after he had lost everything to those wicked dupes.

They had come to him with a promise of a profitable increase in income, he does not like to get involved in things like this but this particular one looked very real and it had a lot of attractive promises.

https://i1.wp.com/www.computertutorflorida.com/blog/uploaded_images/rempel-739349.jpg

That was how he decided to put all his savings for the year into it, he was really expectant of the profit or return that he will obtain from it, so he became even very eager to give more and more.

He was supposed to get the return just a few weeks after the new year had started, it has become almost a norm for everywhere to look dry and empty at the beginning of a new year because it is believed that people have spent all that they have to celebrate the festive period.

https://www.jobberm
root_title: Another Scam Experience

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Strong Feeling of Hope
body:
She felt strange that morning, it was like every other day when she will just open her little kiosk at the side of the road and sell, but this morning was different, she had a strange feeling but she tried to ignore it.

She tried to fight against that negative feeling and she just had it in mind that everything will be alright.
She had gone to drop her kids in the school that morning and had watched her two lovely angels run to their classroom, that was her duty to drop her kids off before resuming at her kiosk to sell for the day.

https://i1.wp.com/citypulseng.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/rebecca-pic-3.jpg?fit=3216%2C4288&ssl=1

It was not her desire or her wish to have a shop in such a little place, and it was not her desire to have a place this small. When she started out the kiosk, she felt there will be an improvement as time goes on but the reverse was the case as the kiosk refused to increase.

https://iheanyiigboko.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/rita-dominic-3.jpg

It was not as if sales were not go
root_title: A Strong Feeling of Hope

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Appreciation Message To The Steemit Community
body:

### My sincere gratitude goes to the wonderful people I have met on this platform, those who have encouraged me in one way or the other especially through upvotes and comments.

### I am grateful to steemit for bringing out the talent in me, I was trying to write a post yesterday and when my brother read what I was writing, he looked at me and said this steemit has really brought out the talent in you.

https://i0.wp.com/lugenfamilyoffice.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/842988_10151747947568298_425222384_o1.jpg?fit=1024%2C768

### Sometimes I read through my blog and I am amazed at the things I have wri

title: MY INNOCENT AND CALM FRIEND GOT MARRIED TO A VERY TROUBLESOME LADY. (SO DISHEARTENING)
body:

He is so calm, respectful and innocent, he does not ever take anyone for granted. He can give even to the last money he has in his pocket, people really loved him. I know him so much because he is my neighbor and also a friend of my family.

But, how on earth did he manage to end up with such a woman as his wife, was he not careful enough to choose someone that was just perfect for him, was he so much in a rush to settle down, or what could be the reason for making such a mistake of choosing a woman like this?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Letter To My Sweet Mother. Untalented-mama
body:
My ever sweet mother, I cannot love you less,for all the sacrifices you have made for me, for those hard times you have passes through for me.

When I was a child, my little mind disliked you because I felt you shouted at me for no good reason, you were the same person who will punish me for not doing something right, I felt you were cruel to me when I will sweep the house to my own satisfaction and you will still come back to tell me it's not neat enough, I never knew you were only trying to make me become a young and perfect hardworking Lady that you will be proud of.


I can never forget the day you were trying to teach me how to prepare a particular food and your spilled hot water on yourself, I never said sorry because I felt it served you right for been wicked to me, my Dad got very angry at me and started floging me but you still pleaded with him to leave me alone as I was only having a childish mentality.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/mpff4mn2g4.jpg)

You came from a type of family where your fath
root_title: A Letter To My Sweet Mother. Untalented-mama

author: oluwatobiloba
title: She Fell Into The Same Trap Again
body:
OMG!!! Don’t tell me it has happened again, how can I be so stupid, how can I fall into the same trap all over again, what is happening to me, am I that foolish?
Joy asked herself this questions again as she watched him hang onto the waist of another Lady.
But, why are they all liars, is there no sincere person found among men again?

http://highclouds.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Nao-Bad-Blood.jpg

She remembered when he came to her for the first time, at that time she just ended her two years relationship with her ex-boyfriend because she had caught him with another lady, for that one it was not even the first time, she had given him benefits of doubt because he was the one who took her virginity, she had promised herself that any man who takes her virginity is the one she will spend the rest of her life with, she had been very foolish with that one for that reason.

Most times, she will go hungry just because he says he needs money for one thing and she has to send it to him, she had starved herself of
root_title: She Fell Into The Same Trap Again

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Life of a Preachers Kid
body:
Everyone expects the kid of a preacher to be the perfect and flawless one, whenever people hear that a kid has done something wrong, they say maybe he or she just needs to be corrected or taught some lessons about life, but on the other hand, if the child of a preacher commits the same offense, what you will hear people say is that, what nonsense, this kid is really uncultured and the kid lacks discipline despite the fact that he or she is the child of a preacher.

https://www.jetmag.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/TaylorColeman-Photo-1.jpg

This illustration is what happens everywhere and the interpretation is just that every kid has the right to make mistakes except a preachers kid and this is really amazing and very questioning, does it mean that it is not the same blood that flows in a normal kid that flows in a preachers kid?

The level of perfection expected by the society from the parents is as well transferred to the innocent child who just wants to grow and have a normal life like every other kid.
Th
root_title: The Life of a Preachers Kid

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Steemit Meet-up at Ibadan
body:
It has been a wonderful experience here coupled with the fact that I had to meet with some people some days back @ Ibadan.

@gbenga informed me about the meet up and he said he will like us to go together, I have not been to Ibadan for some time now, so I decided to go along with him and I also really wanted to meet new people.

# Steemit has the power to make you feel like a relevant person, steemit also has the power to make you look like a nonentity.
I will like to keep the interpretation of this words to myself until further notice.

Nevertheless, I had fun, it was a great pleasure to meet with our own very own boss @ejemai.

I was able to interact and spend time with another boss @gbenga. It is an honor sir.

I meet with @honormaus for the first time and this man is too tall, I felt intimidated when I saw this picture, how can I be this short?

![IMG-20171120-WA0015.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQJzY1JyC2ivQx5QXmztrE1ckLLfJ2QU17iDPC8fr13Vh/IMG-20171120-WA0015.jpg)

Myself and sir @honormaus and boss
root_title: The Steemit Meet-up at Ibadan

title: Do Men Have Any Good Reason To Cheat On Their Partner Or Is It Just The Women Who Are The Reason Why The Men Cheat
body:
For some time now, my very close friend and I have been arguing over a really big issue and I will like to share it on this great platform because I want to hear people's opinion about it.

One of my female friends came home one day and she began to tell us that her Mum has been down because her husband, who promised to love her forever, has been caught cheating.
The issue has really become a serious one as it seems as if the men we have in this generation just take it as a pleasure to break promises they have made to the woman they claim to love.

https://static1.squarespace.com/static/50dcd3bfe4b0395512971edc/t/5164a316e4b0ec2b02b87ada/1365549847086/cheating-man.jpg

# The Reason For The Argument
In just a week or two, you could hear up to a dozen cases of men who defile their marriage bed or young lovers who are about to get married but are cheating on each other.

https://mrperspective.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/why-men-cheat-on-their-wives-featured.png

My friend feels that mo

title: Celebrating A Friend Like No Other , Today and Always
body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/SUA9E0GcSyhCU/giphy.gif

Today I am going to be celebrating someone great and special, someone, who is understanding and awesome.
On a fateful day, I meet this wonderful person and I realized that he was an amazing person.

Today is all about this wonderful person that introduced me to the steemit community, he is really great, loving and intelligent.
I must confess that meeting you was really a great blessing and you are a very loving person.

http://www.planwallpaper.com/static/images/Happy_birthday-8.jpg

I remember when you told me about this great platform, you said it was a nice idea for me to join, but I felt reluctant about it, you went ahead to open an account for me and I even did not still take it seriously as at that time. You disturbed me and pushed me to the level I am today.

Your act of giving is something I can not just comprehend, how someone will give out the last money he has on him to someone he feels needs help desperately.

I remember the day you told me y

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Perfect Marriage.......Script Two
body:
The reason for the divorce was one thing she could not explain, she thought all was well between her parents, they were the perfect example of what she desired for any marriage, she starred at the lips of her mother expecting the next words that will come out of her lips, she just hope that those words will not make her faint.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/130/590x/divorce-rates-UK-plummet-marriage-819783.jpg

Her mother finally opened her mouth to ask, are you sure you can handle what I am about to tell you?
Yes Mum I can, she replied now more frightened as to what the problem could be.

Your father is having an extramarital affair, he has two kids with the other woman, what nonsense, what Mum, Mum what did you just say, she asked all these questions at once and she was not sure she was even expecting an answer for any one of them.

But why will dad even think of doing a thing like that, he has me and my siblings, he has a beautiful, loving and sacrificial wife,
root_title: The Perfect Marriage.......Script Two

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Perfect Marriage
body:
She walked out of the car looking devastated and angry, she frowned as she stepped out of the car which her husband drove, and walked straight into her room.

https://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/130/590x/divorce-rates-UK-plummet-marriage-819783.jpg

Her kids greeted and she responded slightly, her husband walked in just after her and he had an unusual frown on his face too, the kids knew something was wrong but they could not say what the problem was.

Their first child who is the calm and very observant one in the family knew that something was definitely wrong, she was the closest to both parents and she could tell whenever something was going wrong with them.

She walked straight into the mother's room and found her sitting right at the edge of the bed with head bent in deep thought. She moved closer to the bed and asked her mother if there was any problem with her?

No problem her mum replied, she looked closely at her mum and said you and I know that you cannot lie to me and I can tell when som
root_title: The Perfect Marriage

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Nigeria Is A Blessed Country With Wonderful Citizens, My Little Advise To The Nigeria Community
body:
Hello, my people, your Nigerian Lady is here again and I am here to talk about what I feel about our community I mean the ever great “Nigerian community”.

http://buzznigeria.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/nigeria-fans1.jpg

There is no doubt that Nigeria is a blessed and great nation with very hardworking citizens, one thing about Nigerians is our ability to survive in whatsoever condition and weather.
I have never seen any type of community or country like Nigeria that has citizens who can survive amidst hunger, pain and all. I once heard a comedian say that when people who are not Nigerians commit suicide, he is always surprised because Nigerians will prefer to sell the rope meant for the suicide and use the money to eat rather than committing the act of suicide.

http://www.hellomedia.ng/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Nigeria.jpg

As Nigerians, we are known to help our own people, there is this particular ethnic group in Nigeria that I love so much and they are the Hausas. These people may have their own bad
root_title: Nigeria Is A Blessed Country With Wonderful Citizens, My Little Advise To The Nigeria Community

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Life of a Preacher
body:
Continued from [this post](https://steemit.com/preachers/@oluwatobiloba/the-life-of-a-preacher)

The assigned preacher needs to preach about the words of the good book and he needs to pass the message across and as such you begin to see him as God's example on earth, you believe he should be a perfect being without sin or flaws. He tells you that adultery is wrong according to the good book and even the sighting of a woman in a strange way is wrong.

http://cdn.images.express.co.uk/img/dynamic/130/590x/27f18choir-492380.jpg

The next day, on his way out, he meets with a really pretty and fair, he has a soft spot for fair ladies, he keeps looking at her because she is just irresistible. She moves close to him fully much aware of what she is making him go through so much pressure at that point.

The preacher cannot help it, oh no he cannot control himself any longer, and so he hurries to the door and gets it locked,  the lady who looked really prepared for him begins to unbutton her dress, she becomes more tem
root_title: The Life of a Preacher

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How The Yoruba's in Nigeria Get Married
body:
When my network began to act in a manner that was not pleasing today, I began to imagine things as my mind began to admire some beautiful events and happenings.

http://www.madivasmag.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/yoruba-wedding-madivas-@weezy_scott.jpg?x71067

I saw some pictures of some beautiful and well adorned Yoruba brides and I began to imagine myself in that beautiful attire with smiles beaming through my little face and walking confidently as a Yoruba bride.
I decided to share about how the Yoruba's go about their traditional wedding.

http://yorubaweddingpage.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/femi00364-2-722x300.jpg


The Yoruba traditional wedding is a really colorful and eventful occasion but before the main day of the events, some underground preparations have taken place, those preparations are only known by members of the family and relatives, the only thing that the friends and well wishers will know is that the wedding ceremony is going to be taking place on a fixed date and they will all come
root_title: How The Yoruba's in Nigeria Get Married

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Life of a Preacher
body:
The life of a preacher is one that is not really easy, so many people see them from a distance and admire them, they wish they could be like them and they could get all the attention gotten by the preacher.

http://religionnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/20130530-022408.jpg

But, the things they go through internally that cannot be exposed or said in the public are worse than the praise and attention they receive in public.

# The Life of a Preacher

I am going to be sharing some things that happen to some preacher's that other people do not have an idea about, I have had it in mind to talk about it right from the time I was a child but I guess this is a beautiful platform to share my thought and the right time is now.

http://ministry127.com/sites/default/files/%5Buid%5D/images/iStock_000004644267Medium.jpg

A preacher is a religious leader who has been assigned to share or preach the gospel.
He or she has the sole responsibility of taking care of the people he has been assigned to guide.

On most occas
root_title: The Life of a Preacher

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Steemit Restored the Love Between my Dad and I
body:
I have learned somethings and I am still learning, I cannot but say I am grateful to be on a platform that has helped me to be able to share my ideas.

When I was a little girl, I had a book like a diary, I use to write down whatsoever anyone did to me either good or bad. I said to myself one day, I will be able to write this down in a place that so many people will be able to read.

![IMAG0775_1.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbJFLmdqAdQNhstjM7DKFiE1LUwbqdEv4zzgvE9btFErr/IMAG0775_1.jpg)

How that dream was going to come through was something I could not explain but I was very sure that I wanted a large number of people to read through but I was only a poor little girl who had no one's attention.

The day I found out about steemit by a very great and wonderful steemian,  was the beginning of the accomplishment of my dreams, even if I was initially lazy about the platform, I was encouraged and I stayed.

I had always wanted to make my father proud of me, I had always wanted to show that something great and
root_title: Steemit Restored the Love Between my Dad and I

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Beautiful Morning, Another Opportunity to Become A Better Person
body:
It is a beautiful morning,
a great day filled with pleasant opportunities,
it is one that is blessed beyond measures and has all that we need in it.

https://blog.bufferapp.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/happy.jpg

it is a new month, one that has never come before,
the first of its kind,
the one that contains great possibilities,
the one that brings us closer to a promising future,
and as well moves us closer to the grave.

To the grave, is something most people do not like to hear about,
they are scared of what they will leave behind,
what will happen when they are gone,
what about all the wealth they have acquired,
and then all the things they have constantly procrastinate about.

http://www.catholic.org/files/images/media/14576232344686_700.jpg

What about the over-pampered child, how then will he handle the wealth,
what about the people they have refused to help at the needed point and they gave the excuse of later,
what will befall them now,
what about the aged parents they have abandoned and have refus
root_title: A Beautiful Morning, Another Opportunity to Become A Better Person

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Story of The Six Blind Men and the Elephant
body:
There were six men from a great city,
The six were learned men,
And they all set out to see the elephant,
Even if they were all blind,
They all wanted to satisfy the curiosity they had in their mind,
They all wanted to get their mind satisfied.

https://www.euractiv.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2015/12/elephants_africa_creditbrian_snelson_flickr.jpeg

The first blind man moved close to the elephant,
And it looked as if the elephant wanted to fall,
He placed his hand upon the elephant’s broad and sturdy side,
The first blind man concluded in his heart that this elephant looked like a wall.

The second blind man went close to the elephant and felt the tusk,
He felt what he felt was round, smooth and sharp,
He exclaimed that the elephant looked like a spear.

The third man approached the standing elephant, 
And he took the squirming trunk in his hands,
He boldly spoke that the elephant is like a snake.

The fourth blind man reached out to the elephant,
With eagerness of heart and held it around it’s knee
He e
root_title: The Story of The Six Blind Men and the Elephant

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Necessity To Grow In Life
body:
One thing that is majorly important and necessary in life is our ability to be of help and assistance to another person.

Helping people get out of their own problems and struggles is a major factor that enhances a man's ability to live well and live right.

It is as well really important that asides helping people, we have something important to live for, it is necessary that we become principles that we live for and that we can abide by properly without any compromise.

https://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/thumbnails/image/xhab_mars_greenhouse2.jpg
[Link](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwiHyKbpiJTXAhWEVBQKHQR8BZQQjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nasa.gov%2Ffeature%2Ffarming-in-martian-gardens&psig=AOvVaw39fCjToMecRs_V2lCQHqYf&ust=1509305905276397)

When you have something to live for, it does not only give you long life and satisfaction, it as well makes you realize that there are simple but basic steps along the way that are as well importance.

I
root_title: The Necessity To Grow In Life

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How A Neighbor Celebrated His Mother's Death
body:
I walked back home today feeling really tired because it has really been a stressful and frustrating day. I tried to gather strength to just get myself into the room, all that was on my mind was where the strength will come from as I needed to take a cool bath and sleep.

As I approached my house, I began to hear sounds of trumpet and drums, it was a rather strange rhythm, I got close and I saw woman in group frying, cooking and doing other things, only then did I remember that an old woman living in the back of my room had passed away last week and today was going to be the burial ceremony.

http://thenationonlineng.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/olubadan.jpg

The ceremony had started and I noticed that a coffin was brought out of the old woman's room, it was carried by a group of young men known as undertakers, who lifted it on their shoulders and they were followed by some people who were playing the saxophone and hitting the drum, the display lasted for a while as the people around there were greatly ent
root_title: How A Neighbor Celebrated His Mother's Death

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Letter To The One I Love
body:
I was scared of ever giving my heart to love,
I had seen so many cases of betrayed trust,
I had seen so many cases of unending betrayal,
I had seen so many cases of unforgiveness caused by constant heartbreaks,
I did not want to fall a victim of this,
So I decided to prevent my heart from being captivated by love,
I decided I was going to be a strong woman who cannot be controlled by any man because that was what I perceived every relationship to be.

https://img1.etsystatic.com/133/2/5882799/il_340x270.859012305_m2m5.jpg

I said to my self constantly, tobiloba you do not need a man in your life,
I pulled my ear whenever I looked into the mirror and I said my darling you do not need a man to make you feel special or feel loved,
you are beautiful and strong.

I remember those days I even tried to admire some guys but the fact that they have their trousers below their waste and looked so uncultured drove me away from them,
some of them dressed well, but when they open their mouth to speak, they just say rubbis
root_title: A Letter To The One I Love

author: oluwatobiloba
title: It is High Time Youths Learn that People do not Celebrate Certificate, instead they Celebrate the impact you have to offer.
body:
I am someone who likes to go to school, in fact whenever I offend my dad then, what he use to use to scare me is the fact that he will stop paying my school fee, I will begin to cry when I remember that if my dad stops paying my fees, then it means that I will not go to school again. Not going to school was the only thing that could make me begin to beg my dad and ask him to please forgive me, I will cry and refuse to eat until my dad assures me again that I will go to school. 

https://static1.squarespace.com/static/5844525520099e10cb781a65/58446051893fc0f82be1dc86/5844613e2e69cf1ae46b0715/1480876354055/13418606_1435531636472658_8335982657144757817_o.jpg?format=500w

After sometime, I realized that there are some people whose entire life is centered around just books and the only thing that they know how to do is to read, read and read, they have no other life outside their book, this is not a bad idea either.
My point exactly is that people need to learn to know how to put into practice the things they hav
root_title: It is High Time Youths Learn that People do not Celebrate Certificate, instead they Celebrate the impact you have to offer.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The 24Hours We Have In Life Is Enough To Achieve All That We Need To Achieve Because The The People We See Whom Have Achieved So Much Have The Same 24 Hours
body:
https://greatist.com/sites/default/files/questions-feature.jpg

When you sleep during the time when you need to work, it is a great enemy of success. There is no successful man that sleeps too much because every second of time is very important and it is as well necessary that there is no time to waste because with every second that counts, it is a reminder that we are one second away from the time we are supposed to use on planet earth.

If we bear this in mind, I think we will try to be efficient at all the things that we do, we will take every day, every hour, every minute and as well every second seriously, we will not waste any precious time of ours on things that are irrelevant, instead we will look for ways to make an efficient use of our time and make the best use of our lives.

It is important that we also remind ourselves of the fact that there are some people who are just waiting for your downfall in order to rejoice, they are just waiting for you to say that you have lost all that you have acquir
root_title: The 24Hours We Have In Life Is Enough To Achieve All That We Need To Achieve Because The The People We See Whom Have Achieved So Much Have The Same 24 Hours

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Reason For A High Increase in the Level of Sanity in a Certain Part of Nigeria
body:
Today as I walked on the street, I noticed a mad man walking on the street completely naked which is one of those things we see regularly at this part of Nigeria, I mean in Ile-ife which is the city where I am studying presently, they walk round the street and you are even careful not to come in contact with any one of them.

Before I say the story of the mad man I saw today, I remember being in a bus one day and as the bus driver drove carefully on the street, a mad woman who was completely naked jumped into the middle of the road, no one knows the direction she came out from as we all screamed in the bus, the only thing that saved our bus driver was that he was not driving on a high-speed because if he was, he would have been in a very big trouble.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gYa0Eh4iyV8/UzJEWz9cfGI/AAAAAAAACck/ZPxFrrIGl6I/s1600/ritualists+human+tongues+ibadan.jpg

Today, I was in a bus and I saw a woman who looked alright talking to a mad man who was completely naked, the woman looked stressed, tired and f
root_title: The Reason For A High Increase in the Level of Sanity in a Certain Part of Nigeria

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Do not Hold Back on The Good You Can Do To Others
body:
The act of help rendered to others are things that are really important in the life of a man and most times it cannot be forgotten by the individual that the help has been rendered unto.
Some people go through a lot of hard times and they do not get anyone to help them come out of the situation, but a healthy act of help rendered by an individual makes all the difference.

# The Times When You Need to Render Help
The act of rendering help is a thing that should not be determined by time and period because it is something we need to do at all times. Whenever we see someone who needs help or assistance in any way or any area, we should always be ready to assist.

https://i.imgur.com/KTXjd.jpg?fb

# What About The Good We Do Not Get Paid For?
The good we do to people are sometimes not paid back by the people we do them too because they feel that it is their right and you choose to help them without them asking you for help, so they do not even turn back to say they are grateful for what you have done to them.
root_title: Do not Hold Back on The Good You Can Do To Others

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Feeling Some Men have about Ladies that Expose Their Upper Body
body:
Exposing some parts of the female body has actually become a norm in the society today. Almost every lady wants to feel belonged and well accepted by revealing some part of the body which should be covered.

African culture, however, supports decency and morality, we believe that if you want to dress up with clothes then do that properly, but if you want to strip naked, alright then let us see it.

# The Reason why Ladies expose Their Upper Body.

Most ladies who bring out their mammary gland in clothes, feel good and alright about it, as a matter of fact some ladies see anyone who tells them about how their bodies should be covered as being judgmental, they believe that they have the right to dress the way they like and present themselves publicly, the way it seems fit to them.

# The Way Some Guys Feel About Your Exposed Upper Body.

But, one sad thing about this matter is the way some guys feel about ladies who expose their mammary gland, the things I write here are not things that are personal to me but
root_title: The Feeling Some Men have about Ladies that Expose Their Upper Body

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Learn to Grow, Learn to Live. Be Dedicated to Self Growth and Development
body:
It is no news that constant development in any area of choice of a man helps to make a person better and actively efficient in whatever he or she does.

Constant development can never be underrated in any circumstance of life, it is important that a man learns to work hard and become regular at the pursuit of excellence.

If the pursuit of excellence is something that is important to you, then you need to know that constant development is a major key to success and definite life growth.

https://ak9.picdn.net/shutterstock/videos/27406429/thumb/1.jpg

For a man to develop himself, he has to be dedicated to self-improvement in every area of his life, some people think they can grow overnight and that is not possible in any way because the process of growth is gradual and deliberate.
The deliberate act of growth is a functional one that cannot be overlooked or taken for granted.

When I did my industrial training programme in a great establishment, one thing I learned from the company was the importance of cont
root_title: Learn to Grow, Learn to Live. Be Dedicated to Self Growth and Development

author: oluwatobiloba
title: You need to Work
body:
From the beginning of the existence of mankind, he has been given the responsibility to fend for himself, he has become the sole owner of himself and he has become responsible for anything he wants to do.

It amazes me then when I see some kind of people that exist and they feel very reluctant to work but they want to greatly benefit from life. I am really amazed whenever I see people who are reluctant to work but they greatly envy the people who can work hard and have the benefit of hard work.

https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.themuse.com%2Fuploaded%2Fattachments%2F21294.jpg%3Fv%3D900b0c095d9d377622f264d2cf8f6764b5304f011fedd05763f625683a254825&h=367

The truth remains that if you can work hard, nature will bring you what you deserve as the benefit of life and if you are also lazy, you will reap the fruit of laziness. But the reason why people lazy people envy the hard working ones is what I do not understand.

Some lazy people even have the opportunity to be gainfully employed
root_title: You need to Work

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Bitter Experience......Five
body:
Thanks for following this series, you can check out previous blog [Here](https://steemit.com/story/@oluwatobiloba/a-bitter-experience-four)

While at work one day, my boss son returned home as usual and he came with a lady. I immediately recognized her as the lady Mrs. Auntom's son brought home.
I reached for my phone as I took a picture of the both of them cuddling each other from a distance.

It was a phone Mrs.Autom's son had bought for me when he noticed I did not have any phone, it was a really a nice one and I was happy I could easily reach my mum instead of constantly running to the market to meet her whenever I wanted to tell her something.

http://theprayingwoman.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/10-pillars-of-a-healthy-relationship-couple-arguing-fighting-yelling-mind-kandy.jpg?x80717

I went to serve the both of them food and I was really angry at the fact that this lady could cheat on a man who has done nothing else than just been faithful to her, Mrs. Autom's son constantly talks about how much he
root_title: A Bitter Experience......Five

author: oluwatobiloba
title: What You Give to Life is the Result You Will Obtain From it, Some Basic Facts Towards The Achievement of Better Things
body:
People usually interpret the word mountain to mean problem, difficulties, and issues of life. 
The way we see mountains is the way it will be to us, some of us think we cannot make it and that has become our mentality towards life.

A man can be blessed with the things of the mountain instead of being scared of the mountain. 
The mountain has so many benefits but it only depends on your ability to harness and try to understand it before you could get those benefits.

For anyone who desires greatness and the achievement of life success, then the individual must know that he or she cannot just operate on the same level with everyone else.

However, the steps taken should not be one that is wicked, because in the pursuit of life achievement some people do not mind destroying others just to enable them to get to the top.

https://i2.wp.com/crossfitnewengland.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/037a_edited-2.jpg

No matter the life circumstances life throws at you, you have the power within to be able to overcome it,
root_title: What You Give to Life is the Result You Will Obtain From it, Some Basic Facts Towards The Achievement of Better Things

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Proper Parenting, Does Your Child See You as a Monster or as a Mentor
body:
Have you ever been with someone who is scared of her parents before, it is usually a really sad situation. I do not believe any child should be scared of his or her parents as they are supposed to be our guide, our little God, our shield amongst all others, so when you begin to see your parents as a treat then something is really wrong.

http://thefederalist.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/shutterstock_142826356-998x665.jpg

# The Fault of The Parents
Sometimes the parents are at fault because instead of making the children see the fact that they care about them, they make them see the side of being furious instead.

I am pretty much aware of the fact that some parents believe in the fact that if there are continual joy and happiness in the home it means the kid is spoilt, they believe that if the kids are not free with their parents that means they are doing their job as a good parent properly.

https://fthmb.tqn.com/zKSGGbqRB1dB80Z7bujQxFtQV_c=/735x0/GettyImages-mentorrelationship-5734a7983df78c6bb0c06aba.j
root_title: Proper Parenting, Does Your Child See You as a Monster or as a Mentor

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Bitter Experience .....Four
body:
Thanks for following my story, you can check out the previous story [Here](https://steemit.com/story/@oluwatobiloba/a-bitter-experience-three).

When I got home, I realized that Mrs. Autom had given my siblings something to eat and she had played cartoon for them to watch. I was really excited and when I thanked her, she explained to me that she was only an old woman who had always wanted to have people especially little children around her, so she was happy to have us. She told me not to bother to sweep the house anymore because of she had someone who does that for her already, so I just gave the person nothing to do when I cleaned the house that morning.

https://i.onthe.io/vllkyt1q6u7ei176v.cc052f57.jpg

On my way home from work, I had gone to the market to purchase gas cooker, some cooking utensils and another foodstuff with the money given to me by my boss. My mum returned home from the market with some things she bought after she made sales from her fish selling business.

 One fateful day, I got back
root_title: A Bitter Experience .....Four

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Bitter Experience .....Three
body:
We settled down in the room that Mrs.Autom had given to us in her beautiful home, I woke up early the next day and I swept the entire house,  I dressed my siblings up for school and took them along so I could drop them off before I resume work for that day.

I quickly dropped them off school and gave them the 200 Naira I had on me so that they could use it to eat for that day since we had nothing to cook within our new home.

I resumed work and my caring boss asked why I ran home early the previous day and I explained to her that I had to save my helpless siblings from the storm since we had no roof over our head.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://www.bellanaija.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/dreamstime_m_59907664.jpg

She felt really bad and she just said to me, go on with your work, I will see you when I return from work.

I went about the day's job with gladness in my heart as we now had a roof over our head. My boss son who happened to be really spoilt came back home that afternoon.

I really dislik
root_title: A Bitter Experience .....Three

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Desired Life Of Royalty
body:
https://cdn2.benzinga.com/files/imagecache/1024x768xUP/images/story/2012/crown-1701934_1920.jpg

Majority of people in life want power, fame, success and wants to be celebrated. Almost everyone wants to be crowned kings and queens no one wants to become slaves or servants to anyone.

If a thousand people are asked about how they want their future to be, a thousand individuals will tell you that they want a perfect future where they will have no problem, a perfect future where they will have people who will serve them, a perfect future where they will have everything they desire to their dispensation.

The life of royalty is one that should greatly be admirable because we feel that they have all that they need, we feel they are satisfied with the position that they are and so we really want to be like them.

# Are you ready to pay the price?

The big question is if you are ready to pay the price of responsibility and sacrifice that will move you to your desired level of greatness.

These great people we see h
root_title: The Desired Life Of Royalty

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience Today: The Reaction of Some Nigerian Youths
body:
Good day, wonderful steemian, it is a wonderful Sunday over here and so we say happy Sunday to every of our friends and loved ones.
I am supposed to continue the series of my emotional story, but I decided to take a break because I felt I should share this heart touching experience I had today.

I went to church as a Christian and I must say it was a wonderful experience, after service I was outside the church when I noticed that some people were looking towards a particular direction and crowd had begun to gather already. I like looking out for every opportunity around me to write a post, my friends say I like amebo which means pocknosing but I don't mind, as long as it turns out to be a good post, then I am good to go.

https://media.gq.com/photos/55842cd709f0bee5644342d9/master/w_704,h_964,c_limit/style-2012-06-european-fashion-week-girl-watching-milan-01.jpg

In order to satisfy my curious mind, I moved closer to the scene and I realized that some young guys were beating a boy which I think should be aro

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Bitter Experience.......Two
body:
In order to understand the story perfectly, you can begin reading from  [here](https://steemit.com/experience/@oluwatobiloba/a-bitter-experience)

Everywhere was calm now, the rain had stopped and people had returned back to their houses, my mum and I stood as we both knew that we have no house to return to. I held her hands and pulled her towards the home where I kept my siblings and I said prayers in my heart as we walked along the way, I wanted everything to be perfect and alright, I want to make my mum happy but I don't know when that will happen, I thing I am sure about is that all this will soon become history and we will all be happy once again.

Our lives did not begin like this, we were comfortable and we could boast of three square meals with a good school and I guess my parents were just satisfied with what they have. Things changed suddenly and my dad started keeping late nights, my mum asked questions but he said he had to work more in order to earn more money and we cannot but wish for more mon
root_title: A Bitter Experience.......Two

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Bitter Experience
body:
http://www.naijapals.com/newsimg/crying_black_woman.jpg

The days were running really fast and it looked as if the normal 24 hours that we are supposed to have in a day has been reduced to 12 hours. The raining days are approaching I said to my self and the flood might just move our little home away, we have managed to build this little place after the last rain and we were glad that at least we had a roof over our head with the hope that before the next rainy season we would have gathered enough money to get a better place but things have not been going well as our fish business has started to fail, sales was not going well at all. 

https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/677/23548579851_eb70f73e7e_b.jpg

The little money we make is what we use to eat for the day. There was no way I could go back to school because I had to work to feed the family and I wanted my little brother to be able to acquire a little education as well.
A friend helped me to get a job with a rich family where I could work as the maid, I receiv
root_title: A Bitter Experience

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Reason Why You Should Act When You Have an Idea
body:
This post is inspired by a post I read from @fisteganos blog and it made me remember some experiences I had as a child. Some things were really strange to me then and I wondered why things happened the way they did.

I remember while I was washing plate as a kid and a song popped into my head, I had never heard anyone sing that song before and I sang that song all through that week, even my siblings started singing along with me. I was really happy that I could just think of a song by my self and if my siblings liked it then it means that some other people out there will like it as well.

http://beautifieddesigns.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/braids-for-black-kids.jpg

But, one thing that shocked me to my bone was when I was passing one day in another neighborhood different from ours and I heard someone else singing my song. I stopped to listen carefully to the song and I was so sure that that song was from my mind,and that boy was not living close to our house, so how did he hear my song and how come he ca
root_title: The Reason Why You Should Act When You Have an Idea

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating Single Mothers Now and Always
body:
Being a single mother is not an easy task at all as the burden that should  be borne by two people is now borne by a single person. Single mothers are usually strong, relentless and very good people, their strength is usually out of this world. They have the courage and a kind of hard shell that is just indescribable.

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/1d/fc/ed/1dfcedff9c91d8763682fbc3fdc25bde--single-parent-quotes-single-mother-quotes.jpg

Some single mothers sacrifice all that they have to make sure that their kids have a good life, they can sacrifice all that they have for their children to just have a good life.
 
I know of a single mother who has just one daughter, she had so many opportunity to get married to another husband but has refused to do so because she has the best interest of her daughter at heart. One man she almost got married to came to her house one day and he began to order her daughter around, the daughter out of the good home training she had received from her mum  did all that the man asked h
root_title: Celebrating Single Mothers Now and Always

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Rainbow at The End of the Storm
body:
A rainbow is usually seen when the ray of sun passes through a water droplet and a common process known as refraction and reflection then makes it burst into different beautiful colors. 

A cloud usually symbolizes the announcement of a coming rain.

The presence of a rainbow reminds one of a period of peace and abundance.

https://isardasorensen.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/tp-nyc-sunrise-rainbow-8-4-17.jpg?w=426&h=232

Today, I will try to describe people's life in some phases. In life we are bound by nature to face some circumstances that are not favorable. Sometimes things are not usually rosy for most people in life.

Some people have to go through the challenges of being physically disabled, sometimes they wish to do things like some other people but they cannot, they sit and watch and they just wish that life was a little bit fair to them. They wish they could move around comfortably and do things like other people are doing.
But unfortunately, nature has made them the way they are and they cannot figh
root_title: The Rainbow at The End of the Storm

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Power in the Love of a Good Mother
body:
I am a person who believes so much in the impact of a mother in a child’s life because it is very important.
A mother is someone who has the best interest of her child at heart, even if not for any reason she will think about the stress she had to go through for nine months and as well the pains of delivery. 

http://evergreen.study/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/ben-white-132978-940x627.jpg

A mother will not want to abandon or forsake her child for whatsoever reason, instead she will hold firm and she will always find a reason why she should not give up on the child no matter how frustrating the child is. Although, it has been realized that some mothers are very heartless and they can abandon  their kids with anyone at any time. We have even heard of cases of mothers who kill their kids because they do not have enough money to take care of them, but today I am not talking about those  talking about such mothers.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/0f/ea/9e/0fea9e95a6a7de4009b92f6d70f0e7cc.jpg

I am
root_title: The Power in the Love of a Good Mother

author: oluwatobiloba
title: In The Land of The Spirit......Script Four
body:
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://siddhartasaha.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/road-1.jpg?w=930

Gift thought about the next line of action to be blocking every necessary route where help will come from for her husband, she needed to get fast at it because time was no longer on her side.
She taught of killing his mistress after the experience of so much pain but then she thought again that if she should kill her, she will have the power to do things as she does now, so she asked her friends and she was told that it is only those who did good while they were on earth that will posses the type of power she posses presently but those who did evil or wickedness while they were alive will have no such power and they will not even stay here as they have a different place where they belong.

She was happy to hear that, so she allowed her husband's mistress to go through just a little more pain until she was sure that her husband had spent all that he had on her and he even had debt on ground, she then killed her.
root_title: In The Land of The Spirit......Script Four

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Importance of Self Love
body:
There have been so many cases of people who are ignorant of the fact that they are perfect and just beautiful the way they are and so because they are ignorant of this fact, they go around feeling intimidated by the type of person they have become.

I heard a story of a really pretty lady who got herself killed because she was skinny, her friends and colleagues insulted her because they felt she was just too skinny and they felt it was an abnormality, she tried eating constantly but it did not work for her as she did not become big. Someone advised to take tea at night before she goes to bed and she tried that as well but she did not still get fat.

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oOFgUN8P0kA/VrTzYh0sh9I/AAAAAAAAHzY/zbFUwm0b2SQ/s1600/Love%2Byourself%2BLucy.jpeg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwiwyZG_scbWAhXIPhQKHWCvB34QjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Flivingoncloudandreanine.blogspot.com%2F2016%2F02%2Fthe-importance-of-self-love-love.html&psig=AFQjC
root_title: The Importance of Self Love

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating My Baby Brother (Happy Birthday Darling)
body:
On a special day like this in the year ...., a young wonderful child was added into my family. I was very happy as I held my first kid brother, I was really glad we now had a boy in the family. I remember fighting with everybody on his naming ceremony day telling them not to touch my baby and I wanted to be the only one to carry him.

After some time, he stated adding weight so I could not carry him properly anymore so I had no other option than to allow older women carry him.When he started growing, he learned to call my name first and I was very happy to watch him grow.
While growing, he was really really inquisitive, he will open any electronics and he will want to see whatever was inside, he will want to touch every wire and repair every electronics.

![IMG-20170926-WA0012.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUe7UGL6R1qVa4BrcRtDkD3yPt6Fgo32tNHaz3JiktdQ4/IMG-20170926-WA0012.jpg)

My baby brother went to open my dad's wrist watch one day and as he opened it to see what was inside we knew that was the end of t
root_title: Celebrating My Baby Brother (Happy Birthday Darling)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Couple Fight In My Neighbourhood
body:
So..... Wonderful steemians I want to share one small amebo (gossip) with you, it was something I experienced yesterday and it seem it was a perfect back up to the post I wrote four days ago.

I was just in my little room and started hearing someone shouting and crying with a voice underneath, you must kill me today, I say you must kill me, you this foolish man after managing with you all this while and before we knew it, neighbors started coming out to see what was happening and I also ran out of my room to see what was happening.

https://fruitfulmarriages.files.wordpress.com/2016/03/couple-argue-pf.jpg?w=300&h=300
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjF99Px-b7WAhWGPhQKHWPBAmkQjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Ffruitfulmarriages.wordpress.com%2F2016%2F03%2F14%2Flearn-to-fight-better-as-a-couple%2Fcomment-page-1%2F&psig=AFQjCNFBCT_6cEGPda2RQQklbdrWgiNWqA&ust=1506381315473935)

I realized that my neighbor, Mama Jude and her husband were at it again

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The inquisitive Baby Elephant
body:
Baby elephant just started to grow and everyone was happy to watch him grow, he was the pride of the family, he had a beautiful skin and a glowing face to compliment. He was a very smart young creature and this increased the love and shelter he received from friends and families, he was as well really inquisitive he wanted to know the reason behind everything.

http://www.acuteaday.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/mother-elephant-baby-elephant-calf.jpg

One day, he saw the bed flying, and he asked why can this creature fly and we cannot fly, his aunt then explained to him that those creatures have feathers and only creatures who have feathers can fly. He went further to ask but why don't we have feathers? she ignored him and said enough of the questions today.

He created questions out of everything he saw around, he asked questions like: what do this creatures have for dinner, where do this animals sleep, what do they eat and he will get responses accordingly. 

He particularly wanted to know what each a
root_title: The inquisitive Baby Elephant

author: oluwatobiloba
title: In The Land of The Spitit.......Script Three
body:
Gift sat confused without knowing what else to do, she felt really betrayed by the man she loved, all that filled her mind now was what will become of her beautiful kids, will this lady begin to maltreat her kids and was there something she could do to prevent it?

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://siddhartasaha.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/road-1.jpg?w=930

An old man walked up to her and said, Morning Gift, she looked confused and asked, but how do you know my name? he smiled and said to her nothing is hidden in the land of the spirit, we see all that we want to see, we hear all we want to hear and we control the affairs of the physical world.

That is interesting then , she thought that means I can protect my kids from the hands of that wicked man and his mistress. He said, but you need to take things slow, I know how much you want to defend your kids . She looked at him and asked, how possible is it for you to read my mind he smiled and said because I can read your mind.
But, why can't I read your tho
root_title: In The Land of The Spitit.......Script Three

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Imperfect Marriages
body:
I saw a very old man and his wife today trying to cross the road, they held each other and with a great smile on their faces they both crossed the road and then it inspired me to write this post.

http://www.hitchedmag.com/images/article/life_advice_marriagemyth_06302010.jpg

Looking at the high rate at which so many marriages fail and the increasing level of divorce in our society at a point in my life I wondered if people still had long lasting marriages, I looked all around me and everyone was either divorced or either staying in an unhappy marriage because of pride,reputation and some of them because they do not want their child or children to suffer.

I wanted to just see an happy marriage that will change my mindset about married people, I wanted to see a marriage that will be perfect and without stress, a marriage where the both parties will respect each other, a marriage where everything will work out just fine, but even the ones who look happy from the outside are going through a lot of terrible sit
root_title: Imperfect Marriages

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Is The Word ''Sorry'' A Difficult Word
body:
I am of the opinion that people should be able to realize when they have done something wrong and become apologetic about it. I have a class mate who feels he is not obliged to apologies for anything he does wrong, he did something wrong to his girl friend in my presence one day and I was trying to tell him to apologize to her, he immediately replied by saying he does not say sorry to anybody he went further by telling me that he constantly has issues with his Dad at home just because he cannot say he is sorry.

The Lady who happened to be his girl friend and who could not handle the insult any longer, told him she was done with the relationship and she walked out, I tried talking to him to call her back and at least just say he is sorry. He immediately said to me Tobi I have broken up with 3 other ladies because of this same issue of not being able to say sorry and I just stood at a spot confused and amazed at how someone will not be able to say sorry .

https://usercontent1.hubstatic.com/8241412_f520.jpg
root_title: Is The Word ''Sorry'' A Difficult Word

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Retiring To Be A Little Wiser (Why You Need to Read books)
body:
The process of growth might not really be an easy one as it deserves so much hard work and dedication. However, it is very important for individuals to keep growing, the process might look long and stressful but it will pay off eventually.

An act of being wise is an act of getting a little bit more patient and accept your growing process, the growing process of some individuals might be different from each other. My hobbies might be what someone else detest the most.

https://media.licdn.com/mpr/mpr/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAhhAAAAJDZkMzM5NTIxLTliZTUtNDFlNC05NzI2LWU3MWJlMTI5ODhiNA.jpg

Books are really good because they contain great information that has not  been revealed for you, although reading might be a little bit stressful. Continues reading, open's our minds to the realities of life .

Books helps us stay encouraged at periods when we need encouragement.

Reading of books gives you a special satisfaction and an usual craving for good and new things.

Books helps to reduce stress.

Books help to improve on your
root_title: Retiring To Be A Little Wiser (Why You Need to Read books)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: In The Land Of The Spirit .....Script Two
body:
She sat on a rock and kept mute as her mind paced round and round without having an exact location, her friend came to her and this conversation ensued between them:

https://siddhartasaha.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/road-1.jpg?w=930

Gift: I am so happy you are here now, please can you tell me what the problem is exactly, what is going on here.

New friend: You are now dead, you do not belong to the world where you were before now you belong to a new world where things are different.

Gift: But, how can I be dead, that is not possible?

New friend: I know that you shouldn't be dead by now, but your so called loving husband sent assassins to you.

Gift: That cannot be true, how will you say a thing like that?

New Friend: I know how much you love him, I am certain about how much you have given to him and because he wants to marry another wife he has to get you off the way, so he could acquire all the wealth and settle down with his new wife.

Gift: But why didn't he just ask for a divorce instead, must he be
root_title: In The Land Of The Spirit .....Script Two

author: oluwatobiloba
title: In The Land of The Spirit
body:
https://media.npr.org/assets/img/2015/10/05/elsalvadorgirls-2_wide-9f8c2b263b0b73335ce4f9dec52bd63162e6cfc2.jpg?s=1400

She was such a nice fellow, greatly admired by everyone  and loved by the entire community.

She was my best friend, she was my source of inspiration, I don't know why the cold hands of death will take her away from me.

She was the reason why I had peace, she is the reason for my smile and my hope.

This were the words written by friends and loved ones as tribute during the burial ceremony of Gift.

She was assassinated in cold blood on that faithful day when she was driving around town, she noticed a car was driving behind her but it was on a lonely road, they immediately ran past her car and shoot her dead.

In the land of the spirit, she stood confused and wondered what could be happening as the whole place looked really strange to her. She had never seen a place like this before.

The whole place looked so quiet and peaceful and everything was still.

Suddenly, someone came close to he
root_title: In The Land of The Spirit

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Improving a small scale business
body:
Starting a small scale business can be really frustrating because it the returns are not as great as what you will get from large scale businesses. To manage a business efficiently means to allocate resources for the growth and development of the business.

Effective management of a business requires careful planning, organizing, directing and growing different activities that will enable massive growth of the business.

https://www.teamwork.com/assets/images/jobs/gallery/2.jpg
[source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwiR3e-YgJ7WAhUDIVAKHd81DIwQjRwIBw&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.teamwork.com%2Fjobs%2F&psig=AFQjCNFSneghOmpBQCMSNd5H0Z7w0yksBw&ust=1505248775579199)

In order to efficiently run a small scale business properly, proper planning must be put into consideration. Basic planning process includes;
Be sure about your objectives.
Carefully examine the environment for the business
Develop definite strategies that may be used to achieve your stated goals
root_title: Improving a small scale business

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Value You Add To Life
body:
At the long run it happens that your life is not estimated based on the number of houses you have built, the number of cars you have, the amount you have in your back account or even the gold and silver you have acquired, what your life is basically dependent on is how you have been able to help others ;how much life you have impacted, the lives you have helped build up, the people you have given reasons to laugh again.

Let us look at it from this point:you have everything you want, you are happy and blessed and your life is fulfilled but you have never for once tried to stretch out a hand of help to somebody else, of what benefit then is the money to you.

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EDLxyf_HnDo/VX_gVBzKaZI/AAAAAAAAD-Q/WhE9tsGtQ-A/s1600/Less%2Bprevilege.jpg

Sometimes we give excuses of the fact that we're not financially buoyant and that is the reason why we have not helped anybody but it is not only about the money, what about assistance by actions and words words of encouragement 

All the wealth you are
root_title: The Value You Add To Life

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Nutritritional Value of Avocado seed....A Research Work
body:
I will be  sharing my knowledge on the research work I am doing presently with my wonderful friends here on steemit and I hope that it is beneficial.

It has been discovered that after the eating of Avocado which happened to be a great and beneficial fruit, the seed is often discarded because so many people do not have a proper knowledge on how beneficial this seed is. Since the level of poverty in the nation is increasing everyday, it is important that we make maximum use of everything we purchase.

The experiment will be carried out using  sixteen (16) Wister Strain Albino rats, this rats will be divided into four groups each consisting of four rats.

The first group of four rat will be feed with the reference protein diet.

The second group of four rats will be feed with the nitrogen free diet which is the basal diet.

The third group of four rats will be feed with the raw avocado seed.

The fourth group of four rats will be feed with the cooked avocado seed.

The avocado seed was obtained manually from t
root_title: The Nutritritional Value of Avocado seed....A Research Work

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Things Turned out well Afterall.....Really Grateful
body:
I once wrote a post about a lecturer of mine who is an old man but really very annoying.
This lecturer of mine who is really an old man seems to want to have an affair with every of his female student, the issue has really become a thorn in the flesh and students started complaining about him seriously,but no one has been bold enough to face him because he is a very good and intelligent man who is respected by everyone.

There is this Lady whom this old lecturer wanted to have an affair with,and because she refused he failed her in her final year which made her have an extra year.

When we were distributed under our project supervisors, I was placed under this old man, fear gripped me the day I saw the list because of the numerous stories I have heard about him and that means that I need to constantly go to his office.

I tried all I could not to go to his office alone and even when I did, I made sure I wore really long and covered clothes. Luckily for me, he didn't have any interest in me and I was always g
root_title: Things Turned out well Afterall.....Really Grateful

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Lessons Associated With Growth
body:
When I had to leave my mother’s womb to respond to the call of nature and show up on planet earth, everyone was happy at the arrival of a new baby and everyone wanted to behold my innocent and pretty looking face. They could not help but feel my pretty tiny hand on their strong and hard skin.


After those long hours of the journey I just embarked upon to come to planet earth, I was tired and hungry and I needed something to feed me and then the first challenge came which was to draw out milk from a dry breast.

https://www.tesco-baby.com/content/uploads/2014/02/AM_skin-to-skin.jpg


I was too hungry to complain and even if I did, it was obvious no one could hear me out, so I put my strength at it and worked hard at bringing out milk and after sometime I smiled at myself because I won, there I learned that this new place I have come to requires hard work.

Then, with time I started to grow and I saw other big babies run around, so I tried to be like them. I will constantly stand and fall again, I will imagin
root_title: Lessons Associated With Growth

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Why You Need To Discover Destiny.
body:
Your destiny is your future and that is the goal of creation. The greatest tragedy in life is the premature termination of the future destiny.

The major goal in life is to make it to one's personal future and that is the description of success.

http://carlyshankman.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/e992064c4d49ba9758dc159c71666040.jpg

The fulfillment of your purpose in life is determined by hard work and persistence.


Whatever laid down goals you have in life should prompt hard work and guide you to destiny fulfilment.

You can begin to make plans for what you want your future to be by making proper plans now. Everything hidden inside of you  has been kept there to enable you fulfil basic life purpose.

Your Destiny is your predetermined destination. Movement to purpose fulfilment is a gradual and unfailing process.
Keeping an appointment with destiny is moving and growing in the right path.

Whatever you were born to do, you have been empowered to do. Discovering of destiny keeps you alive.

Destiny protec
root_title: Why You Need To Discover Destiny.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Bleeding Soul Behind The Ever Radiant Face
body:
There are so many women we see around with a very happy face, we see them and so many young ladies hope to be like them when we grow up, some of us wish our families could be like theirs, we admire the strength that they have but most times when we try to get a bit close to this women we realize how broken and shattered they are inside and how often their imprisoned soul screams for help.

When I saw this image for steemit-virus contest, this thoughts drop into my mind immediately, and this is my entry for the contest.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://i.pinimg.com/736x/ba/4b/1e/ba4b1e8f365de38e9c5e93c599a17d0b--illusion-art-say-something.jpg


I once had a mentor whom I wish I could be like every day; I loved her so much that I started to change the way I walk by emulating hers, her family was one that seems so perfect, I always like staying around her. Her husband is one type of man you will want to be your husband, I prayed to God everyday that God should give me a man like him as the both of them se
root_title: The Bleeding Soul Behind The Ever Radiant Face

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How greed Led my Aunt to Destruction
body:
As a young lady, I watch myself grow into a woman daily. I have on several occasions had to stay away from home to live with other relatives either to spend my holiday with them or just to be away from home for a while.

Most of the people I get to stay with are married people and during those periods of my visitation I have seen some of them go through some marital issues (which is a normal phenomenon) since they do not come from the same background, they are bound to have misunderstanding sometimes.
These visitations have allowed me make some decisions about how I want to live my live . So many great lessons have as well been learned.

During the course of one of those visitations, I stayed with a very beautiful Aunt who used her beauty to get all that she wanted,I use to sneak to her house sometimes from  school without the consent of my Mum whenever I wanted to collect money from her. 
She eventually  got married to a wealthy politician after constant complains by family members. The man got  a house for
root_title: How greed Led my Aunt to Destruction

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Journey So Far on Steemit
body:
I was introduced to this great platform by a very great and wonderful steemian @Gbenga, he wanted every of his friend to join the platform.

I remember those times when I will always give excuses why I do not need to join Steemit, he went through the stress of downloading so many applications on my system because it is an old one using his subscription. He is someone with a large heart and he can give to the last.(Let me stop here because I could go on and on spending time to describe this rare gem).

When I joined, the reward was not attractive at all, I tried chatting with people who had high reputation and who made lots of money from their posts, I was advised to comment on the posts of great steemians but I realized that my comment was either ignored or just replied with yes or thanks while those with high reputation got the attention even without saying anything .

This triggered a post I wrote about the minnows being ignored but it was as if I wasn't making any sense at all.@Karenb543 replied and said
root_title: My Journey So Far on Steemit

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Rejected Child
body:
A rejected stone is a word that can be used to describe Bukola because from childhood she was a constant victim of sickness  and on several occasions she slumps in the class room, on the road I mean virtually everywhere.

Because of her ill health she was avoided by most of her class mate and lecturers, she was not free to run around or feel free like other kids, even her parents could not take her to some places. There where times when they will take her siblings out and just abandon her at home with the house maid.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/5s3s1oMsg74/hqdefault.jpg

But, she was a really nice person, jovial, and a very good friend you can trust her for almost everything but she could not just help her sad mood whenever she remembers what she has to go through.

One unique thing about Bukola was that whosoever helps her or lifts a finger to assist her usually receives unusual favor and help, but no body realized that not even her parents they felt they were just been fortunate but they never linked the sourc
root_title: The Rejected Child

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Exhibiting The Act of Greatness
body:
Greatness is not all about wealth it is about impact and significance.Greatness is about how well you have been able to impact others, what you have added to their lives and how you have been able to help them become a better person.
https://wiki.godvillegame.com/images/e/e2/Just_do_it.jpg

# Attributes of greatness.

 ######  Great people are diligent people: Diligence is an attribute of greatness. Great people put all their best into something that they want to achieve.

###### Great people are humble people: People who are indeed great are very humble people, they are not proud in any way.

###### Great people are people with good attitude and a good heart: Your character determines to a great extent how far you go in life.

https://leadershipfreak.files.wordpress.com/2017/04/being-real-is-the-first-step-to-being-great.jpg?w=620&h=364

###### Great people are not selfish people.

###### Great people are solution providers.

###### Great people are givers.

###### Great people are those with good mindset.
root_title: Exhibiting The Act of Greatness

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Expression of Love Through Good Deeds
body:
Love is a word that is often mentioned in almost every statement today but it has been discovered that what most people know about love is what they express through words and not actions.

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/5d/4e/55/5d4e55a7628a6d64ea37839f577cca0a--love-is-real-love.jpg

Putting the act of love into action involves seeing someone in need and lifting a hand of help to assist the fellow.
So many of us claim that we love people especially those that we are in a relationship with but the real test of love comes up whenever you have to express it.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/dd/9c/55/dd9c55b9092a5a9e740ea38b0cd3febd--saint-quotes-catholic-quotes.jpg

Speaking of people that we are in a relationship with, I heard a story of two lovers who were attacked by robbers, the thief in their aim to test their love for each other gave the guy the gun to shoot the girl, he claimed he could do no such thing because he loves her so much. The thieves threatened to shoot him instead, but he said his love
root_title: Expression of Love Through Good Deeds

author: oluwatobiloba
title: If Wishes were Horses
body:
My little mind always likes to travel far and wide thinking of things that can be actualized and those that cannot be actualized.

I have always wished for so many things that I did not get at the end of the day, I have as well wished for things that were actualized.

http://metamorph.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/whitehorse_0.jpg
Today, I looked out of the tiny window in my little room and I started to imagine things...............Someone called me and asked, are you oluwatobiloba which I replied yes and he said we just saw your name on steemit and we realized that you are an inspirational and amazing writer,  we have decided to reward you handsomely . I was really puzzled and as well speechless.

My post began to yield good rewards and I became really rich, things became so perfect for my family and I, I had the money to get my Mum and siblings  beautiful clothes and apparels and I began to live the type of life I have always dreamed of.

Life became indeed beautiful for me and I had no reason to get s
root_title: If Wishes were Horses

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Importance of Gratitude
body:
It has been realized that one major factor that is lacking in our contemporary society is an act of gratitude.
One will remain stuck in life if the act of appreciation is not practiced.
One reason why people are ingrate is because they feel; everyone should be responsible for their happiness.

Some people always fail to be grateful because they prefer to live their lives as victims of circumstances.


Gratitude has the power to open doors of greatness .
Gratitude has the power to open doors of opportunities.

Gratitude has the ability to get someone connected with favor.

https://media.licdn.com/mpr/mpr/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAZUAAAAJDAzNjdlNGIyLTRkMjktNDY0Mi04M2MxLTc4MTU0MjFkYmM5MQ.jpg
