author: oluwatobiloba
title: HIV AND AIDS
body:
In June 1981 scientists published the first report of a mysterious and fatal illness that initially appeared to affect only homosexual men. Subsequent early reports speculated that this illness resulted from homosexual men’s sexual activity and, possibly, recreational drug use. In the months that followed, however, this same illness was diagnosed in newborns, children, men, and women, a pattern strongly suggesting a blood-borne infection as the cause of the observed illness. The illness was initially identified by several terms (e.g., “gay bowel syndrome,” “lymphadenopathy virus (LAV),” and AIDS-associated retrovirus (ARV), but by 1982 this disease came to be known as acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS) because of the impact of the infectious agent, human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), on an infected person’s immune system. Since about 1995 the term HIV disease has been used to describe the condition of HIV infected persons from the point of early infection through the development of AIDS.
http://acces
root_title: HIV AND AIDS

author: oluwatobiloba
title: ABORTION - ALL IN ALL
body:
**DISCLAIMER**: This post does not encourage abortion, rather, it is aimed at shedding light to the basic understanding of the topic itself. The fact herein presented should not be mis-constructed and applied wrongly.

Abortion is one of the most emotional and divisive moral issues of twenty-first-century American life. Consensus has not been reached on the numerous questions that swirl around the subject, including whether or not a woman has the right to choose a legal abortion, and under what conditions; the role of parents if she is not legally an adult; and the roles of the state and religion having veto power. In addition, the questions of when life begins and at what point it should be protected remain controversial.

Strictly defined, abortion is the expulsion or removal of an embryo or fetus from the uterus before it has developed sufficiently to survive outside the mother (before viability). As commonly used, the term abortion refers only to artificially induced expulsions caused by mechanical means
root_title: ABORTION - ALL IN ALL

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Make Your Home Filled With Love and Happiness.
body:
A family where love exists is always a beautiful and lovely sight to behold, love and happiness is a good place to dwell.

However, a family that has no peace is a place where people will always want to run from. 
Imagine visiting a family where the husband and wife fights,  throws bottles and other things on themselves, that house is a place to desert totally.


https://i.pinimg.com/236x/45/df/7a/45df7ae2b4a2ba80f55ec84c35d3c7a8.jpg
[Image Source](https://i.pinimg.com/236x/45/df/7a/45df7ae2b4a2ba80f55ec84c35d3c7a8.jpg)


The presence of love in a family brings about prosperity and promotion in all ramifications, it brings about upliftment and success all around. 
Personally, I would rather stay in a home where there is so much to laugh about that a home where there is always something to frown about. 

It is however our individual duty to make our homes a place to live or a place to run away from. Some parents have succeeded in making their children strangers in their homes because they always want to look
root_title: Make Your Home Filled With Love and Happiness.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Everyday I want to become a Woman of Value and Substance.
body:
I have always wanted to become someone of positive impact, 
Everytime I wake up,  I want to become someone whose voice will be heard, 
I want to become a Woman of substance and value, 
I want to become a Woman who can take charge of her home, 
I want to become a blessing to my home and my generation as a whole.
I don't want to ever become a societal nuisance,
I don't want to become someone that a man will insult or call valueless. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/fe24un9eit.jpg)

Hence,  the reason for my hard work and persistence in achieving whatsoever I want to achieve. 
My drive increased today when I heard a conversation that ensued between a woman and her husband. 

The husband in a public place insulted the woman and called her names, he kept on threatening her to take another wife that will take care of him properly. 
He seem to be tired of her and this woman looked very helpless and tired as well,  as she begged him not to frustrate her. 

This action got me motivated the more to strive and pray to
root_title: Everyday I want to become a Woman of Value and Substance.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's Talk About it with @oluwatobiloba.
body:
Hey lovers,  I welcome you to the last episode of let's talk about it with @oluwatobiloba, for the year 2018, the next time we will have this show again will be in the year 2019.

I must confess that you have made 2018 an amazing year for us,  thank you so much for the contribution, the love,  the emails, may God bless you. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/noqjtsj497.jpg)

### The Gist for Today. 

The relationship gist I have for you this evening is not one that I am happy about at all,  as a matter of fact I feel really sad about it, because I personally know the individuals involved. 

This young lovers started their love journey and when they realized they were compatible,  they decided to settle down and get married. 
The marriage went on for about one year or two without any child, but finally the wife got pregnant and this made every member of the family very happy. 

The period she was pregnant was not a convenient one for her at all because she was sick most of the time,  she was also a type of wom
root_title: Let's Talk About it with @oluwatobiloba.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's Stop the Pretence.
body:
The rate and level at which people act in fake ways is really alarming, the level of pretence that exist in the society has increased greatly. 

Everyone seem to live a beautiful and attractive lifestyle, a lot of people go to the extent of borrowing cars,  clothes and accessories just to look classy and rich. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/kb4xzpp8w0.jpg)

Personally, I will say that the idea of living a fake life is a very wrong one,  living a fake life sends good opportunities far away from you, people who might probably see you in an unpleasant condition and might want to be of help,  will now think that you do not need any assistance in any way. 

Live your life in a simple loving way,  you do not have to go out of your way to please others. 
Stay blessed and loved.
root_title: Let's Stop the Pretence.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Story on the Powerful Effect of Money.
body:
Who ever says that money is not powerful is very wrong, it is really powerful I tell you.  The effective power of money  is proved in this story I am about to share with you,  so let's read through the interesting story friends.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/kar640iuyy.jpg)

There was a young lady from a humble family, the family was indeed good but the parent seem not to like the first child, it seem she was the worst thing that happened to the family.
The parents always called her names and made her feel bad for everything she does. 

Her childhood days was practically filled with pain,  tears and regret, on countless occasions, she tried to run away from home but something kept holding her back. 
Mosttimes, she will decide to stay back in school to avoid receiving insult by the time she gets home. 

However,  things changed just after she finished school,  things became really good for her financially even to her own surprise.
Things turned around at home as well when she started buying things home and
root_title: A Story on the Powerful Effect of Money.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Festive Periods: The Period for Price Inflation.
body:
This crazy idea of increasing the price of goods just because it is a festive period could be really annoying, the price of food increases,  the price of wears generally increases and even the price of fruits.

https://www.zimbabwesituation.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/www.dailynews.co_.zwOriginal__zoom-b6ae213242e7b8a6cc131e83444913d616beed14.jpg

[Image Source](https://www.zimbabwesituation.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/www.dailynews.co_.zwOriginal__zoom-b6ae213242e7b8a6cc131e83444913d616beed14.jpg)


The most annoying part about this entire thing is the fact that,  even the cost of transportation increases greatly.
So you will have to pay in a great amount to go visit your family and then you also have to pay in a very high amount to travel back to your place of residence. 

Today, I had to travel over a short distance which should cost only 600Naira on a normal day,  but because of the claim of a festive season,  I had to pay 1,000 Naira to my destination which was the cheapest means of transportation
root_title: Festive Periods: The Period for Price Inflation.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Take a close look friends, do not jump into conclusions too fast.
body:
A number of times as humans,  we jump into conclusions very fast without properly analyzing what the entire situation looks like. 
We are used to jumping into conclusions that at the end of the day, we tend to regret,  if only we can learn to take closer looks at things, a lot of mistakes will be totally avoided. 

https://www.verywellmind.com/thmb/Spqg2hEearmEg5nyAu3uUH8Z-UM=/2121x1413/filters:no_upscale():max_bytes(150000):strip_icc()/CoupleFighting-5655fa125f9b5835e438a278.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.verywellmind.com/thmb/Spqg2hEearmEg5nyAu3uUH8Z-UM=/2121x1413/filters:no_upscale():max_bytes(150000):strip_icc()/CoupleFighting-5655fa125f9b5835e438a278.jpg)


Once upon a time, there was a young man who looked hopeless,  he looked very frustrated, he saw an old friend and begged him for assistance. 
The old friend who is very okay financially decided to take his friend in immediately, his daughter urged him to study his friend properly, but the father insisted on the fact that he knows his old friend very
root_title: Take a close look friends, do not jump into conclusions too fast.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Tour on the Street.
body:
Today, i decided to take an evening stroll brcause i got angry at somethings at home, I felt I needed some time alone, i needed time to cool off but then I realized that staying at home was even better because I would have just locked myself in a room or better still sit somewhere, but getting space to breath outside was something I found impossible.

  ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/101f8deopw.jpg)

I walked quietly on a lonely road, trying to take my mind through the event that got me upset when a young man stopped me and started to ask questions, I pleaded with him to let me go but he was unwilling because he wanted to have my mobile contact, I was obviously not in a good mood for long conversation but I also did not want to look disrespectful. Since he was not willing to let go, I had no other option than to walk out on him.

After some minutes, I noticed someone was following me very closely, out of fear, I turned around and I found a young man wearing a face cap.
He quickly faked a smile as I looked at
root_title: A Tour on the Street.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How do we handle the issue of decency in religious places.
body:
I walked to my place of worship and I quietly sat at the back of the auditorium worshiping with the brethren quietly until we were told to have our seat.
I sat down at the back and a lady in front of me sat as well.

https://usercontent1.hubstatic.com/13589308_f520.jpg
[Image Credit](https://usercontent1.hubstatic.com/13589308_f520.jpg)
As the service was going on, I noticed that the lady sitting in front of me had her back uncovered, as if that was not enough, the front was a little exposed as well.
With irritating stretch marks all over the exposed area, I wonder the reason she had to do that.
Asides from that, she was sipping a cold drink and even chewing gum.

When the leader started preaching, she brought out her phone and inserted her ear piece into her ears as she played music.
I was amazed as I noticed this and a lot of questions filled my mind.

If the ushers had stopped her from getting into the premises, she would have decided not to believe in God any longer.
But, what do you think can be done to
root_title: How do we handle the issue of decency in religious places.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Observation of the events of life.
body:
Everyday I see people struggle to survive,
I see people who try to make a living from what they do,
I see people who are contend with what they have,
I see people who always struggle to get more,
I see lazy people, young and old,
I also see hardworking people young and old as well.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/4y4x4gounx.jpg)

The picture of a perfect life can only be seen in those who pretend,
The picture of a perfect marriage can only be noticed in the couple who learn to hide their scars,
The picture of an amazing future can only be seen in the diligent youths of today.

I stand amazed at the level and manner at which people rise and fall,
A number of times, people fall never to rise again,
On the other hand, people also rise never to fall again.
At one house people rejoice, and at the next house people mourn.
The difference between the wise and the foolish is a great one.

Thank you for coming around, I am @tobi.
root_title: Observation of the events of life.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: All I asked for was love.....
body:
I wanted to experience love so bad that I was ready to give all that it would take.

At a point in my life, I was concerned about my carrier,
All I could think about was making my name a big one in the society,
All I could think about was to take my family away from the mess of poverty,
I wanted us to experience love to the fullest.

https://www.mggranddayspa.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/couple-moving-couch-600x400.jpg

[Image Credit](https://www.mggranddayspa.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/couple-moving-couch-600x400.jpg)

I did not have time for love or relationship at all,
A lot of suitors came around but all I wanted,
Was to make money and make good money.
I was extremely hard working and diligent at all I did.

Now, that I have attained a certain level of success,
People in the neighborhood seem to love me,
I can afford to take my family members on special treats,
I can afford to feel special and help my family get whatever they need.
Then, I felt it was a good time to settle for love.

I looked for a
root_title: All I asked for was love.....

author: oluwatobiloba
title: This Issue we need to fight against.
body:
The typical African mentality makes us believe in the fact that a woman has no business of her own, all she needs to do is to support her husband in every way.
We were previously told that we belonged in the kitchen, we had no business with taking care of the home, we had no right to speak when the men spoke, we had no right to work, we had to right to make any public suggestion and I think that is the major reason why our forefathers felt it was a waste of time to send their female children to school.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/q7n26lpqjy.jpg)

However, over time a lot of things changed and women could do equal jobs with the men and even speak when the men spoke.
The value of womanhood increased as we could speak for our selves over the things we feel are right or wrong.

There are these set of women that I respect so much, these women despite being hardworking and intelligent, still value the great importance of keeping a home and maintaining a beautiful family. 
But, one thing that keeps getting me
root_title: This Issue we need to fight against.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's Talk About it with @tobi.
body:
Hey lovers, it's been a while, but i am glad we are together again on the show let's talk about it with @tobi.
I am sure you have all been doing fine and I pray that the good Lord will continually give us reasons to smile.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/7u3v5vyuyh.jpg)
[Image Reference](My picture)

Our guest for today is not a new person at all, he came around sometime last year, he complained about a lady he loved so much but it was obvious that she was only after his money, with your advice we were able to guide Mr Dare and he came back to say thank you.
However, there seem to be a little bit of confusion right now for Mr Dare and he needs your counsel on the way to go about it, I will allow Mr Dare speak for himself.
(Relaxes) Mr Dare you are welcome to the show Sir.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/csggmwclwx.jpg)
[Image Reference](My picture)


 Hello tobi, I must confess that I really appreciate the response I got the last time I came on your show, thank you so much for everything.
I was able to get
root_title: Let's Talk About it with @tobi.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Consistency is necessary in the achievement of dreams.
body:
Once you are sure of being on the right path, remember that consistency is the key.
It might sound easy when we ear people's success stories, it seem as though they achieved what they achieved within a twinkle of an eye, but the truth is that it was not really easy for them also.

https://www.norealjewelry.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/4-Ways-to-stay-consistent-while-chasing-after-your-dreams-featured-image.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.norealjewelry.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/4-Ways-to-stay-consistent-while-chasing-after-your-dreams-featured-image.jpg)

A lot of time, people get discouraged when they see their mates achieving one level of success or the other while they remain at the spot they are.
One question you have to ask yourself sincerely is if you started at the same time with your friend and if you moved at the same pace with them.
A lot of people start out at the same time but move at different paces , and some others start earlier than others, but  unfortunately everyone expects the same re
root_title: Consistency is necessary in the achievement of dreams.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Stop the condemnation....
body:
Before you condemn others, take a close look at yourself.
It is very easy to condemn others and make them feel terrible, it is very easy to look at people with disgust and make them feel very miserable, but in most occasions, we fail to carefully observe ourselves before we condemn others.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/53904hjj1m.jpg)

Life can be filled with issues and conditions of life, life can be filled with reasons for us to act in an unpleasant manner and when we do, we often forget that others have flaws as well.
So before you really condemn your actions, ask yourself truly if you are perfect.
root_title: Stop the condemnation....

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Lording over your workers.
body:
There are a lot of conditions that can make one's employees begin to act in strange manners and one of those things, is the attitude of the employer towards them.

https://getrealchristianity.files.wordpress.com/2017/11/blog-pic-112517.jpg
[Image Credit](https://getrealchristianity.files.wordpress.com/2017/11/blog-pic-112517.jpg)


Employees are sometimes forced to behave in ways that are really questioning, they are forced to act in very strange ways and this is because their employers treat them like slaves.

It is not new that some employees are very rude, lazy and disrespectful but on other occasions, some of them come to work with the mindset of giving their best, until they come in contact with that very rude and annoying boss, their countenance fall and they begin to mosbehave.

Thanks for reading this short post, stay loved and beautiful. God bless
root_title: Lording over your workers.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Interesting story from the village.
body:
Hello friends, I have an interesting story to share with you today and I anticipate your wonderful response.
It was a cool lovely evening and I sat under a tree in the village, this has become my favorite spot in the village as it happens to be a place with the best network service.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/bmt8jebp9h.jpg)

I noticed some people started gathering in front of the house of the head of village(they call him Baale).
There was a case to settle, and usually the community leaders and the Baale will settle the issue.

I sat properly in order to get the full story of the event and I am definitely going to share it with you.
It was a big issue within a man and his wife. This man has two wives but the current problem was between him and the first woman he got married to.

They have obviously been having issues for a very long time, the man had chosen the second wife over the first and he has abandoned the first wife in the process.
He does not eat the food prepared by the first wife, he does no
root_title: Interesting story from the village.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A mother who does not know the meaning of her child's name.
body:
I walked into the classroom one day, since my current job is to teach some village kids. I smiled broadly when I noticed that we had a new student in the class, I was extremely excited to see her.
I asked her to introduce herself to the class and she mentioned that her name was Edit, we all clapped for her and e welcomed her to the school.

https://resources.stuff.co.nz/content/dam/images/1/q/x/o/8/r/image.related.StuffLandscapeSixteenByNine.710x400.1qxo4m.png/1532385400638.jpg
[Image credit](https://resources.stuff.co.nz/content/dam/images/1/q/x/o/8/r/image.related.StuffLandscapeSixteenByNine.710x400.1qxo4m.png/1532385400638.jpg)

I was however concerned about the name and I really wanted to know the meaning, so I called the little girl after the class and I asked her for the full meaning of Edit, she replied innocently and said, Aunty there is no full meaning.
Out of curiosity, I went further to ask her for the meaning of her name and she said she does not know the meaning as well.

I told her to ask her m
root_title: A mother who does not know the meaning of her child's name.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Chicken Experience.
body:
It happens that I have been longing to eat chicken for a long time now, the idea of eating chicken kept on ringing in my mind but I had other things to handle so I knew I had to leave eating of chicken aside and focus on the necessary things which is more important than the eating of chicken.
I finally had the opportunity to eat chicken yesterday and I was very happy. But one thing is that I realized is  that as I eat the chicken, the people around that environment looked at me strangely.
They felt I must be a very rich kid who could afford to eat chicken everyday and even at her convenience whenever she wishes.
As they stared on, I knew how long I have been trying to get a good chicken, I knew some of them would have even more money than me and chicken might not be the next thing on their agenda
but I cannot explain to them as their praying eyes said it all and as they entered the room, I could hear sounds of hmmm hmmmm, echoing at every corner of the room to the extent that I even felt like running out.

h
root_title: The Chicken Experience.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The painful effect of trusting people.
body:
The effect of trusting people to much.
It is no news that a lot of people only stay around people they could get something from and not because they love them.

https://timedotcom.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/108003347.jpg
[Image Credit](https://timedotcom.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/108003347.jpg)

I am a person with some level of care free attitude, something's that people really take serious are the things I could possibly ignore.
When I arrived in this village, I realized that the only people with access to the two hours light available in the village are the corps members and the owners of the village, so I allowed those with phones to come charge in my room.
Sometimes, I leave my room open while I am outside trying to get network so everyone will be able to charge.
Usually when I travel I leave a pair of my key with the old woman and her kids to charge their phone.

Unfortunately, when I travelled home of recent, I realized that some things  got missing in my room, I felt very bad and requested for my r
root_title: The painful effect of trusting people.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating my princess.
body:
I remember when Mum gave birth to her, I was found of her because I had found someone who was just like me, I had found a sibling and I would not let anyone else touch her.
I loved to protect and carry her around even if I was also little at that time.
She was the best gift I had that year.

![IMG-20190128-WA0009.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmfR14SewPJ3hCgYPHPqS6wRzx9UK4K48hNzzETyt4q7yD/IMG-20190128-WA0009.jpg)

Growing up, she became an amazing girl, hard working, persistent and her decisions are always final.
She became my super hero, she always wants to show me off to the world and tell everyone that she has a big sister.

![IMG-20190128-WA0010.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmfXNJXpG626SDLyF2d6gBzyaF1TftY9hEfxE6uWAgUVfQ/IMG-20190128-WA0010.jpg)

She is trying to be like me, but I am watching her become a better version of ME.
I love you so much baby girl, soar higher and become the best you can ever be.
Never forget that your big sister loves you.
root_title: Celebrating my princess.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating my imperfect self.
body:
I realized that some of us spend a lot of time admiring other people, we look at some people and we immediately wish that, we had the type of their shape,complexion , height and other things.
It is a very good thing to admire others, I do that a lot, it however becomes an issue when you look down on yourself or when you value others better than you value yourself.

![IMG_20190118_080549_076.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVbks4yc6UnC8c5GqQaQpf2Jz5cnqEQPXQYpierJkueeD/IMG_20190118_080549_076.jpg)

![IMG_20190118_080722_047.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmfG8Zw5uJDgw8Eyrnc5ciPT9NH5t27ns3qyndYmDLMh5p/IMG_20190118_080722_047.jpg)

I looked at myself in the mirror today and I observed my beautiful and well carved face, my black and beautiful completion was on point, I also appreciated my big stomach even if I would have preferred a flat one.
I realized I was wonderfully and beautifully made, no one can ever make me feel other wise.
I appreciated my creator for making me look excellent.

But, what about
root_title: Celebrating my imperfect self.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Relationship Issues.....Matters of the Heart.
body:
Hello friends, in my quest and drive to know the reason why relationships fail, to know the reason why a lot of couple shout and nag at every little opportunity, I began to read a book and make other research as well. I will let you know  what I have learnt as time goes on.

https://markmanson.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/relationship-advice-cover-2.jpg
[Image Source](https://markmanson.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/relationship-advice-cover-2.jpg)

The first thing I learnt is the importance and relevance of respect in a relationship.
Respect has an active role to play in matters of the heart, no matter how much you both long to stay with each other, the absence of respect will make your stay hell on earth.

It is however important to note that men have EGO, so this falls back on the function of a woman.
The respect given should be a mutual one, but as ladies we need to know that the responsibility of giving respect to our spouses lies heavily upon our shoulders, we really need to shower them the respect
root_title: Relationship Issues.....Matters of the Heart.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's talk about love and relationships with @tobi.
body:
Hello Dearie's, it's another beautiful Sunday and I am excited and blessed to be alive, I know you feel the same way.
It is another great day to talk about love, let's see what is happening in the love world or love zone.
Remember you can always send your love related messages to: adekunlemercy95@gmail.com and we can all get to talk about it in a way you would love.


There is something I have been thinking about and I want to share with you friends, I don't have an answer to the question but I hope I will be able to get answers at the end of the show today.
![IMG-20180407-WA0002.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUvWG5oQtuyPk4KgHErDr6J1vuMVD4BaL2a71acLEzEYZ/IMG-20180407-WA0002.jpg)

I have heard so many guys as well as ladies say crazy things about the girls that sleep around with different boys. (Some people call them runs girls while others calls them prostitute), everyone feels they are bad people but only very little persons talk about the/male opposite gender/male who do the same thing.

![IMG-20180
root_title: Let's talk about love and relationships with @tobi.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Letter to my Prince Charming.
body:
You are the fairest and sweetest of them all,
I remember how we started and I bless God for giving you to me,
I read and hear a lot of people's story everyday,
I watch the way people handle their relationship,
And I cannot but thank goodness for giving you to me.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1nMAFFu49hA/hqdefault.jpg
[Image Source](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1nMAFFu49hA/hqdefault.jpg)

Sometimes, I stare at you and you might wonder why I stare,
But I just love the way you do your thing,
You are different and special,
You are unique and understanding,
You are brilliant and hardworking,
You are special more than I can write.

I just want you to know that I love you now and I will always do,
God will bless and keep us together,
I will always love you everyday, keep soaring darling.
root_title: A Letter to my Prince Charming.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Look Smart and Beautiful.
body:
I believe so much in the fact that the way we dress say  so many things about us, there is so much that can be interpreted from our dressing ability.
The first thing we look at when we see people is their appearance, so no matter how well we can speak,our dressing should also be given ultimate consideration.

There is a lady in my place of work whose dressing gives me ultimate concern, she happens to be a very religious person who does not believe that it is right to dress well, have you seen people who do not care about their looks because they believe it is a crime to look good?

![IMG_20190208_083604_382.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYieyv9zkKUpyt2RNQVY8hLn81NqN1WFhfNGcCCRmYeqD/IMG_20190208_083604_382.JPG)

The way she dresses really gives me reasons to worry, and she feels she is the best well dressed person around, so in cases like that, I guess the best thing is just to keep looking.
I feel our appearance should be taken with ultimate seriousness, try to become a better version of yourself ever
root_title: Look Smart and Beautiful.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Political Noise.
body:
Even if I am not a fan of politics, I see nothing wrong with supporting the political agent or political party  you wish to support. It however becomes a big problem when you disturb others because you for feel you are a politician that has got every required connection.

https://c1.staticflickr.com/8/7365/8722751605_f46fee65e2_b.jpg
[Source](https://c1.staticflickr.com/8/7365/8722751605_f46fee65e2_b.jpg)

It was really an annoying scene this morning when I was on the road and it was discovered that there was a long queue at the front , we had to wait for a long time only for us to discover that the cause of the delay was an ongoing political rally.
This act is rather disturbing because it would have been acceptable it was done by a corner of the road and not on the main street where people have to carry out their day to day activities to earn a living.

Let me know what you feel about this in the comment section, does it happen as well in your area. It is a political season at this side and friends are advi
root_title: Political Noise.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Different ways to celebrate love.
body:
Yesterday was valentines day that almost everyone was expecting. A day like yesterday is one where so many things are expected, a lot of people's hopes are raised high and different types of imagination filled the hearts of so many people.

https://www.dundeerep.co.uk/Images/News/love-season-thumbnail.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.dundeerep.co.uk/Images/News/love-season-thumbnail.jpg)

People at various levels of life celebrated love in their own way, the rich celebrated love in expensive and classy way while the middle classed individuals also celebrated love in superb ways.
One of the things that got me fascinated yesterday was when I saw those who did not have much to spend, celebrating love in beautiful ways and giving a smile that was from the heart.
Aspire greatness in every way but remember to laugh and love genuinely as you climb the ladder of success.

Thanks for coming around and remember that love is a beautiful thing. I am @tobi, have a beautiful love filled season.
root_title: Different ways to celebrate love.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Family should be everything we need.
body:
I woke up this morning and immediately made a phone call to my lovely siblings to ascertain that they are all doing great and wish them a lovely and beautiful day ahead.
The relevance or importance of a family can never be over mentioned or over rated.
The family is the bedrock of every society, family is where we breath, what we do and how we survive.

https://d2gg9evh47fn9z.cloudfront.net/800px_COLOURBOX21670579.jpg
[Credit](https://d2gg9evh47fn9z.cloudfront.net/800px_COLOURBOX21670579.jpg)

I remember the days when home was a place I wanted to always run away from, when staying at home made me pale and sick. I realized that a family should not be like that.
A family should be a place where people will always want to run to, a place where needs should be meet, a place where broken hearts should be mended and most importantly, a place that breeds peace and confidence.

It is relevant to make your home and family a place filled with lots of love, satisfaction, peace and joy.
Let every of your family member h
root_title: Family should be everything we need.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: For a Sweet Relationship.
body:
There is no accidental love, everything happened according to adequate preparation, in order to have a good relationship based on love, you need to consider these things:

1. Get knowledge about what you are about to venture into. Read good books about love and relationships, read books about the things you have to do.
You need to know when to speak and when to stay quiet in order to keep your relationship.

![IMG_20181223_184849_153.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmapv1FeevVZxLjk5rNnVmKcaG42vAMWbi5rFTf7KwAY51/IMG_20181223_184849_153.jpg)

A man and the woman are obviously different beings, it is essential that we understand the reason why the different gender behaves in the way they do.
When needs are meet in the home, fulfillment is assured.
The knowledge of gender difference is indeed essential to make a good home.

2. Have a spiritual background, this will help to stay firm with your decisions.
Understand that there are times and seasons for everything in life.
Get rid of pressure totally by holding
root_title: For a Sweet Relationship.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Depression adds no value in anyway.
body:
I use to be someone who was very scattered, I wanted to do a lot of things at the same time, I was always busy, I had a lot on my head and headache was the constant result.
Thank goodness my sweet friend was able to notice this issue very fast and call me to order, he noticed I was becoming a shadow of myself and I was becoming a frustrated person gradually.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/resizer/xlpeQgfpf-hEE1MKQ16sFxHHORM=/1024x0/arc-anglerfish-washpost-prod-washpost.s3.amazonaws.com/public/HDBZS4Q2IU6GHF5NOJLBZ3ROBY.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.washingtonpost.com/resizer/xlpeQgfpf-hEE1MKQ16sFxHHORM=/1024x0/arc-anglerfish-washpost-prod-washpost.s3.amazonaws.com/public/HDBZS4Q2IU6GHF5NOJLBZ3ROBY.jpg)

I realized that being calm is essential for growth and learning how to take one thing at a time will help to keep your sanity.
Whenever you are handling a business, take proper care and analyze it properly to avoid setback.
root_title: Depression adds no value in anyway.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Give Sincerely to those who are in Need.
body:
I have learnt the misery and the power behind giving, I have learnt the technicality associated with giving, I have discovered that we have a lot of things to gain when we give.
There are two ways to give: Sometimes we give at our convenience and other times some people give even when it is not convenient for them.
I use to give initially, only when it was convenient for me, I gave only when I felt it was suitable until I realized that there is a higher realm to giving even when it is not convenient for you.

https://richardstep.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/young-couple-giving-back-to-homeless-man-richardstep.jpg
[Image Credit](https://richardstep.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/young-couple-giving-back-to-homeless-man-richardstep.jpg)

I have learnt that it is essential to give even when it is not convenient for you, sometimes it might be the last thing you have on you and you just have to give it all to someone who is desperately in need.
I have a mentor and a friend who can give even the last thing he ha
root_title: Give Sincerely to those who are in Need.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Becoming a beast to the people you should guide.
body:
Feelings are natural and necessary but knowing how to control your feelings is more important.
There are some kids in the village who were sent by their parents to the boarding house to study,
I was amazed and disappointed when I realized that one particular person in the village who should be like an uncle to the kids in the boarding house was having an affair with them.

http://img.koreatimes.co.kr/upload/newsV2/images/151116_p16_hosoda1.jpg
[Credit](http://img.koreatimes.co.kr/upload/newsV2/images/151116_p16_hosoda1.jpg)

These kids are within the range of thirteen to fifteen and this young man was trusted by the school management to take care of the kids.
I wonder how he felt comfortable messing up with kids who could be his children or even his younger siblings.

It was painful to realize that someone who was trusted by the school management could be the one teaching these little children things they should not even know about just yet.

I was moved to tears when I realized these wicked act and I alread
root_title: Becoming a beast to the people you should guide.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Let's Discuss Matters of the Heart with @oluwatobiloba.
body:
Hello beauties.... It's another beautiful Saturday and that means it is another time to talk about relationships. I am really excited about this.
Today is the first Saturday in the month of March and thank goodness we all are alive to be a part of it, what more can we say than a big thank you to the faithful keeper of life.

![IMG-20180407-WA0002.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUvWG5oQtuyPk4KgHErDr6J1vuMVD4BaL2a71acLEzEYZ/IMG-20180407-WA0002.jpg)

Today's relationship gist is about two young love birds, the issue was reported by the lady who feels scared that the young man she broke up with might end up doing something bad to himself.
Here is the full story friends.....

A friend gave someone my number and we started talking, I haven't met him before but I just liked his sense of humour! 
He asked me out and I said yes! I know it's not right, we haven't met before.

I've been contemplating whether to continue the relationship or to meet him, it was a hard choice. 
I decided to leave him! 

![IMG-201804
root_title: Let's Discuss Matters of the Heart with @oluwatobiloba.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Joy like I have never seen before is what i have found here in the village especially ...
body:
... with the kids. Most of them are subjected to a high level of poverty, they work so hard but get little reward for their labour, they eat what they find at the end of a hard day job. The women tie their wrappers to their chest as they prepare food for their husbands and children. Some of them who happens to either be the third, fourth or fifth wife struggle for the love and attention of their husbands as they try to spice their food properly in order to give it a great taste. Unfortunately, the application cannot take longer words now, so visit my blog for more of the story.

![460c6c4dee6c0f9730fd61a08bd1364c](https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/backend-alpha-kw-50/460c6c4dee6c0f9730fd61a08bd1364c)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The interesting village experience.
body:
I decided to go and wash my doll in the village stream instead if using the borehole water made available for the corps members in the village, I wanted to experience what it felt like to wash in the river. It was great to feel the cold water on my feet and also watch the kids play and splash water in each other. The smile on their face was real as they were surprised to see a doll as big as mine. They all wanted to hold it and play with it and they took it upon themselves to wash it properly until it became neat. I love the free spirit over here in the village.

![58bf2938ca1f186a8febb6a57661423c](https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/backend-alpha-kw-50/58bf2938ca1f186a8febb6a57661423c)

root_title: The interesting village experience.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Would you rather show off your lover or keep it as a secret.
body:
Hello beauties, I welcome you to my blog once again and I really want to say thank you for coming around, I really appreciate your effort.
As a lover of lover, there is something that has been coming across my mind for sometime now and I know that you my friends are in a very good position to give an answer to my question.

https://www.wikihow.com/images/7/7e/Be-Really-Sexy-with-Your-Boyfriend-Step-2-Version-2.jpg
[Credit](https://www.wikihow.com/images/7/7e/Be-Really-Sexy-with-Your-Boyfriend-Step-2-Version-2.jpg)

What is your opinion about showing off your lover to the world?
You know a lot of people have different opinions to different things and the way we all handle relationships vary as well.
What might be a big deal to me might be nothing to worry about to my friend or neighbor, so the way we see things is very different.

Some people feel that talking about their lovers all the time is a big deal and they would rather keep their relationship private while some others feel that it is right to show off
root_title: Would you rather show off your lover or keep it as a secret.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I am grateful for the things I have.
body:
I am grateful for the ability to breath,
I am grateful for the food I have to eat,
I am grateful for shelter,
I am grateful for good health,

https://fee.org/media/19768/gratitude.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=1920&rnd=131303491160000000
[Image Source](https://fee.org/media/19768/gratitude.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=1920&rnd=131303491160000000)

I am grateful for the ability to feed,
I am grateful for the ability to move,
I am grateful for the ability to speak
I am grateful for tough times,
I am grateful for times of lesson,
I am grateful for times of abundance,
I am grateful for the ability to smile,
I am grateful for my loved ones,
I am grateful for the ability to say thank you for what I have.
root_title: I am grateful for the things I have.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience Today with a Rude Driver.
body:
The life we live in is a very dramatic one, as a matter of fact, my day has been so dramatic, a lot of things happened today and I don't even know where to start my story from.
Is it from the attitude of my per-time boss or the one of bus drivers or even the one of the touts at the bus garage, the matter tire me oo, my people (In pidgin).

https://www.way2earning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/206413799_7c68420938_o.jpg
[Source](https://www.way2earning.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/206413799_7c68420938_o.jpg)

I left my house this morning hurrying to the usual car garage just after my sales rep almost got me upset, I stopped at the garage and I realized there was only one empty bus, I was asked to go there and sit for the bus to get filled, I pleaded with the person collecting money to permit me to join an oncoming bus that was almost full, but he refused.
I decided to walk down and the bus came to pick me from there, the bus keys were seized and the man was asked to remain, I pleaded with them to release t
root_title: My Experience Today with a Rude Driver.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Life and Struggles.
body:
I have been really worried about a lot of things recently, I have been thinking and it seem as if the pain in my heart increased as the day goes by and I feel pain in my heart.
I need some cash to get things going, parents are on my neck and all sort of issues, I tried my best but all to no avail, my pet even became more ill.

![IMG_20190118_080722_045.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSxbjCXcdpgQQoWc5smSRN2RAyzCbyaj4KmonoW7e1nJh/IMG_20190118_080722_045.jpg)

Weeping became my hobby until I realized that I was getting weak everyday and my strength had started to fail, then I realized that I could only overcome this problem with my decision to become a strong woman.
I reminded myself about some of the things I had faced in the past and how everything came out well.
I knew I had to be strong for myself as well as for those who love me.

I realized that thinking or getting worried will not get me anywhere, getting worried will not even provide me with the money that I need.
So I have decided to be strong fo
root_title: Life and Struggles.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Road to Success is Usually not Smooth.
body:
It is not an easy task to begin something good for yourself because the truth remains that, everyone wants to get associated with success but no one ever wants to get associated with failure.
The moment when you begin to realize who your true friends are, is when you have absolutely nothing to offer and they still decide to stick with you and even provide necessary solutions to get you out of whatsoever mess you find yourself in.

http://petracoach.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/road-to-success-.jpg
[Image Source](http://petracoach.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/road-to-success-.jpg)

The level of progress or great life achievement, is not one that comes easy at all, sometimes you will need to give it every strength you have in you and make sacrifices where necessary, some days you will have to decide to stay totally away from any meal or rest because you have the decision to succeed irrespective of what it might cost you.

The journey of success is not really a smooth one, but in order to grow, you need to
root_title: The Road to Success is Usually not Smooth.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Praises to the ever faithful God.
body:
There is a God who is good and ever faithful
 He is dependable and awesome,
He lives in the heavens and rules over the affairs of men,

https://media.swncdn.com/cms/CW/35203-thanks.1200w.tn.jpg
[Credit](https://media.swncdn.com/cms/CW/35203-thanks.1200w.tn.jpg)

The one who has kings and even mere men bow to him,
The one who is supreme over every being, situation and circumstances.
I just want to say, I am really grateful.
root_title: Praises to the ever faithful God.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Relevance of Daily Positive Confession.
body:
You can never be better than the person you think you are, you are always a better version of yourself and no one can make you feel less than you are.

Sometimes we feel weak, rejected and frustrated, we think that maybe nothing good could even come out of us and depression sets in gradually which is not a good one.
I have come to realize that there is a great power and authority in the things we say, whatsoever we say carries power and as such, we need to be careful about what proceeds out of our mouth.


https://media.swncdn.com/cms/IB/39748-discussion-confession-group-thinkstock-g-stockstudio.1200w.tn.jpg
[Image Source](https://media.swncdn.com/cms/IB/39748-discussion-confession-group-thinkstock-g-stockstudio.1200w.tn.jpg)

A lot of people are so used to being negative that everything around their lives begin to show negativism, when you see someone who is having a lot of problem, the first thing you have to look out for, is what they say to themselves.
It is essential that we learn to say good and positi
root_title: The Relevance of Daily Positive Confession.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Woman I should Become.
body:
I realized that I had to awaken the woman within me, I had to strengthen myself and train myself to become a lovely wife to my husband and of course a wonderful mother to my precious kids.

https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0568/4561/files/StrongRoof.jpg?v=1490117525
[Image credit](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0568/4561/files/StrongRoof.jpg?v=1490117525)

I realized that a good woman will learn to make sacrifices where necessary either it is convenient or not, so I am learning to make more sacrifices than I have ever done.

A good and strong woman will be slow to anger and forgive easily, so I am trying my best to forgive as quick and as fast as I can.

I also realized as much as I needed to eat well, I also had to remain healthy, so exercise is important.
There are so many other qualities, but I will have to begin with this and I hope you feel the same way dear friends.

Thanks a lot for coming around dearies, you can always drop relationship questions and issues here: adekunlemercy95@gmail.com
root_title: The Woman I should Become.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Do the younger generation have anything to offer?
body:
In some culture, especially in the African culture, the younger ones are supposed to stay quite whenever the elders speak.
As a matter of fact, the younger ones have nothing good to add whenever elders speak.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DuM00xOUcAEA2yT.jpg
[Image credit](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DuM00xOUcAEA2yT.jpg)

In my own opinion however, I feel sometimes the younger ones have something to offer as well.
What is your opinion concerning this issue friends.
root_title: Do the younger generation have anything to offer?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Religion and the Fear it has Created in the Hearts of so many People.
body:
Hello dearies, I trust your week has been beautiful? Mine has been dramatic oo, but that is a story for another day.
I have realized that so many people are scared of their doctrines or their religious leaders, to the extent that when they see their religious leaders coming, they begin to shake.

Today, I went to a small supermarket close to my house to get some things, just as I approached, I noticed that the two sales girls ran out of the shop and knelt by the roadside to greet a man who sat in his car, I wondered what was going on and I decided to observe.
They discussed with the man for some time before they ran back to their duty post,  I later heard their conversation which got me really thrilled.

https://insurance.kotak.com/assets/images/uploads/insurance-guides/articles/Be-prepared-against-death-disability-and-disease2.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/search?q=religion+and+fear&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiJ1u3otKDhAhUxUxUIHXDyCP0Q_AUIDigB&biw=1525&bih=670&dpr=0.9#imgdii=m_eu8-Nhu-
root_title: Religion and the Fear it has Created in the Hearts of so many People.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Little of Everything [ A Lesson from Mum's Diary].
body:
I don't think there is anything like "too much knowledge (I stand corrected).
When I was a kid, I realized that my Mum had an idea of almost everything and she wanted her children to have the same thing, but I was usually angry whenever she tries to correct people because I felt we should only be good at our own profession or skill and allow other people do their thing.

https://images.indianexpress.com/2019/02/a-little-bit-of-everything-1.jpg
[Image credit](https://images.indianexpress.com/2019/02/a-little-bit-of-everything-1.jpg)

Until one day, a man was fixing something in the house, and my Mum screamed immediately, do not fix it that way, do it the other way.
My siblings and I murmured and said Mummy has started again, she liked to feel as if she knows everything.
We watched and the man came to thank my Mum for correcting him, he claimed that he would have made a terrible mistake if my Mum had not corrected him.

That was the day I decided to change my view about getting knowledge, I realized it was nec
root_title: A Little of Everything [ A Lesson from Mum's Diary].

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Nothing Lasts Forever [A Sneak Peak into Mum's Diary].
body:
I have learnt from situations,
I have learnt from circumstances,
I have learnt from stories,
I have come to the realization of the fact that,
Nothing last forever except God's grace.

https://ctl.s6img.com/society6/img/8JGuMZjQmoFoUmxohJsKZ5H0FV8/w_700/tapestries/standard/~artwork,fw_5538,fh_6513,iw_5525,ih_6500/s6-original-art-uploads/society6/uploads/misc/caee786d7a744c2aa3d907c27f0e5bcb/~~/nothing-lasts-forever174489-tapestries.jpg?wait=0&attempt=0
[Image Credit](https://ctl.s6img.com/society6/img/8JGuMZjQmoFoUmxohJsKZ5H0FV8/w_700/tapestries/standard/~artwork,fw_5538,fh_6513,iw_5525,ih_6500/s6-original-art-uploads/society6/uploads/misc/caee786d7a744c2aa3d907c27f0e5bcb/~~/nothing-lasts-forever174489-tapestries.jpg?wait=0&attempt=0)

Whenever Mum spoke back then especially to people who are greedy, she will always say nothing lasts forever except God's grace, I wondered why she said that, but now I know better.

I have realized that, pains when handled properly, do not last forever.
Riches when mishandled a
root_title: Nothing Lasts Forever [A Sneak Peak into Mum's Diary].

author: oluwatobiloba
title: An Interesting and Sad Tale of Love.
body:
Hello lovers, it is another great and beautiful Saturday. The weather here is extremely hot and right now, I just feel like resting in a pool of cold water.
Hmmmmm, it is another day to talk about love matter oo my people and I hope you enjoy this amazing episode.

Today, I will be telling you a story I heard from a friend and I want to know your opinion about the whole story.

http://www.scaryforkids.com/pics/sad-story.jpg
[Image Source](http://www.scaryforkids.com/sad-stories/)

A beautiful lady who has a good looking fiancee who was ready to settle down decided to finally take him to her mother who has been willing to meet the young man that has remained the reason behind her daughter's smile.

The drama however began when her mother asked the young man to leave her house, this action left the daughter in a confused state because she knows how her mother had been disturbing her to bring him home after they have spoken over the phone on countless occasions.

She ran back to the room and pleaded with her mu
root_title: An Interesting and Sad Tale of Love.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Mum, My Pride.
body:
The fairest I have ever known,
The most gentle and meek woman I know,
Amazing, understanding, yet disciplined,
 A complete lover of God,
A complete lover of family,
A firm decision maker and a good mother.

![IMG_20190331_174155_109.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeGuud7EwXEksDTcY5dECGxETwZFc57UwR5kXpQ8FM81z/IMG_20190331_174155_109.JPG)


I remember how she will always wake up every night and begin to speak positive words over her husband and kids.
I will be right to call her the pillar of our home.
Sometimes, my dad will shout at her and say things that really hurt just because she is trying to over-protect us.

I want to give you reasons to smile endlessly and shower you with the love you had to sacrifice for our sake.
Thanks for keeping scars so that I can shine and glow,
My one in a million type of Mum, may God bless and keep you for me.
Thanks for the sacrifices and words of encouragement, I will always make you proud.

I am @tobi.
root_title: My Mum, My Pride.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Beautiful Dog and I.
body:
I have always been a lover of birds especially parrots because of how smart they are.
I know that dogs are as well smart but their ability to bite always gets me scared of them.

![IMG_20190222_090917.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmasYVV9W7L12GSmZgkpXCPYX6kJbbt41gHwudDsAEmhaZ/IMG_20190222_090917.jpg)

Recently, my partner bought a dog and I have started falling in love with her.
Although I am not really used to her just yet, but gradually I am getting to love her the more.
I realized that this lovely dog is even smarter than I expect, she plays with others and jumps at them, but since she realized that I don't like her jumping on my body or bringing her mouth close to my body, she totally avoids doing that to me.

![IMG_20190222_090930.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmafiNHttzRpvkB4seumFJsrEvVxcRgWdgPQKbLX5ezw54/IMG_20190222_090930.jpg)

My love for my dog as increased greatly because she is becoming more beautiful, radiant and intelligent.
This had made me realize that dogs are beautiful and a p
root_title: My Beautiful Dog and I.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: You do not have to loose what is important to you before you value them.
body:
It is no news that a lot of people do not value the things they have until they loose it eventually. Sometimes, we might just get really used to the things we have in our possession that we do not realize how valuable it is, until the moment it is lost.

https://saleslinks.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Value.jpg
[Image Reference](https://saleslinks.com/customer-value-growing-sales-revenue-creating-better-customer-experiences/)

Imagine having three knives in your kitchen,to you having a knife in your house is definitely not a big deal because you have more than enough, but when your neighbour talks about how fast she needs to get a knife, you become surprised since it is not supposed to be an issue at all.
But the day you want to use a knife in your kitchen urgently and you realize it is gone, that moment you will realize how important the knife has been to you.

The same thing is applicable to our friends, family and the people around us.
As a matter of personal opinion, I feel the people we decide to move
root_title: You do not have to loose what is important to you before you value them.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Revolving Around Negetivity, Keeps you Unhappy.
body:
Negativity has a strong power in the life of a man and it has the power to destroy things a lot.
When I was a kid I had a book where I wrote down the offence of anyone who did wrong to me, I kept the book in a very safe and secure place where no one could see it.
Whenever my parents did a thing that was annoying, I would write it down in the book and keep it well.
I always wanted to remember everything they did wrong because I felt they were just not fair to me.

https://www.the-wau.com/timthumb.php?src=uploads/1505646073229.jpg&h=523&w=1000&zc=1
[Image Credit](https://www.the-wau.com/post/life/5-ways-you-can-overcome-your-negative-thoughts/11000)

I carried on with this attitude until I got someone who loved me, he gave me a very nice journal as a present, but instead of me to use it to write beautiful poems, I started using it to write down his offence as well.
I wrote down everything wrong my lover did to me in the expensive journal(gift) he got for me.
The day he realized what happened, he was greatly up
root_title: Revolving Around Negetivity, Keeps you Unhappy.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Money: A Beautiful and Destructive Instrument.
body:
The relevance of money can never be over mentioned, as a matter of fact, the lack of money could make someone sick or even begin to experience things that are unpleasant.
Money is so important that it cannot be written off in the life of a man, so money is something that one cannot do without.

https://images.theconversation.com/files/219669/original/file-20180520-42238-1ixuggz.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&q=45&auto=format&w=496&fit=clip
[Image Source](http://theconversation.com/how-money-is-destroying-the-world-96517)

However, as important as money is, and as relevant as it is, we need to know how to manage it's effect when it comes.
As good as money is, it has a strong force that could make you do the things you vowed never to do.
The strong effect of a mismanaged money could place a man in a state of abject poverty and regret for life.

The praises of men when there is money to offer them increases greatly, but if we learn the principle of chewing and not swallowing praises, it will help us a lot.
I will see you a
root_title: Money: A Beautiful and Destructive Instrument.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Looking Towards the Positive Direction.
body:
Life is indeed filled with lots of issues and unfair situations, some things will happen in life that might make one feel like a total failure or someone who is completely useless.
But there is a vibe that comes from within when you permit positive energy.

https://www.cognadev.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Untitled-design-1.png
[Image Credit](https://www.cognadev.com/the-dark-side-of-always-looking-on-the-bright-side-of-life/)

One thing I have learnt from life is that, negativism has the power to keep you down, it has the power to make you feel sad.
But, having the spirit of positivism keeps you alive and makes you stronger.

Positive energy happens to be a major factor in life, a definite key to keep you going.
Looking towards the bright side of life keeps you stronger and makes you better everyday.
Stay loved and beautiful friends. I am @tobi.
root_title: Looking Towards the Positive Direction.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Giving-up Is Not Your Option; It Should Be Your Companion Enemy.
body:
No one is completely safe from the issues and problems of life, the truth is that, even those we seem to look up to and admire, have their own issues that they silently cover.
It is good to share our problems sometimes, but it is also essential to know whom to share it with.

https://www.unboundedwisdom.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/effeects-of-hardwork-that-make-it-father-of-prosperity.jpeg
[credit](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwiDpOargd7hAhUCuRoKHf-4AkQQjRx6BAgBEAU&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.unboundedwisdom.com%2Fpower-hard-work-4-outstanding-effects-hard-work-make-father-prosperity%2F&psig=AOvVaw1VzQTWrDVAfOnuljenh--s&ust=1555826981027185)


Problems and difficulties of life may raise it's ugly head at a point in our lives, but our decision to tell every body we see what our problems are, will only make us become a laughing stock sooner or later.
As a matter of truth, people do not really care about our problems or issues, they just want to have an idea on what th
root_title: Giving-up Is Not Your Option; It Should Be Your Companion Enemy.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Difficulty with using dtube.
body:
I had a very bad and annoying experience today using dtube.
I love to use the app because it gives me opportunity to express myself and share how I feel with fellow vloggers.
But unfortunately,I have not been able to upload my video.

![IMG_20190422_170726.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYhcLgp2fpny913NVVVh2DjvRd5vQ2KztXKssRjsBbBUL/IMG_20190422_170726.jpg)

![IMG_20190422_170728.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVDP12Ba68v7pGyV8vb4xGJAug9ChpjwzzP2r1tzDUXhN/IMG_20190422_170728.jpg)

I went through so much stress trying to record the video and when it was time to upload the vidoe on dtube, it was another issue.
I tried to upload the video and for hours, it kept on loading, I left my phone untouched for a long time because I did not want any interruption with the process of uploading.
I was glad to see the video finish uploading after about two hours, but only for me to click submit and the error message i received was that I had to upload a video first.

I was really upset, I tried again and I got th
root_title: Difficulty with using dtube.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating The Risen King.
body:
A time of the year where we take time to celebrate a king,
A king who is incomparable, 
A king who is supreme,
A king who rules over the affairs of men,
A king who is amazing,
A king who is extraordinary.

http://rs.catholic365.com/images/articles/jumbo/10777-1cdf9de6-d43d-40de-9758-8b80d38c7cc3.jpg
[Image Credit](http://www.catholic365.com/article/10147/my-resurrected-king-has-resurrected-me.html)

He is one who came to die for our sake,
The resurrected God who lived to take our sin away,
A God who died to take away our pain,
A God who is extraordinary.
I choose to call him my Lord and my source,
I choose to call him the beginning and the end,
I choose to call him the giver of every good gift,
Alpha and omega, the first and the last,
My redeemer and king.

Share your opinion about the resurrected king friends, he is definitely the reason for the season.
Thanks for coming around, I am @oluwatobiloba
root_title: Celebrating The Risen King.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Prison Story [First Episode]
body:
It rained heavily on this faithful night, it seemed as if the sky was going to tear into pieces.
The family were enjoying their meal at the dinning table, and the little princess of the house was slouched on the sofa reading a copy of Mills and Boons, a story she enjoyed so much.
Her younger brother had complained earlier about headache and her mother had given him some drugs to ease the pain, she asked him to go to bed.

https://images.theconversation.com/files/265755/original/file-20190326-36276-6c565m.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&q=45&auto=format&w=496&fit=clip
[Imahe Credit](http://theconversation.com/the-inside-story-on-crime-within-prison-114075)

Her fourteenth birthday was just months away, and she could still relish the thoughts of the way father had thrown her a big party and had treated every of her friend and classmates to a very sumptuous reception and, this had happened two months before the said date.
root_title: The Prison Story [First Episode]

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Prison Story [Episode Two].
body:
The rain will not just stop, it kept on hitting on the roof top endlessly. She personally loved this period of the year, she loved it more even at night especially when she was already asleep as this will help her sleep even deeper, according to her.

Her mother called out to her, Serah, get us some water from the kitchen.
Fuming, he rose from the sofa and then headed towards the kitchen. She was still trying to check the refrigerator when she started to hear strange sounds from the room.
Lie down, she heard, where is the money?

She quickly placed her finger on the switch and put off the light in the kitchen, she did not need anyone to tell her these were armed men and they could unleash pains in everyone.
Where is the money you fool, one of the robbers thundered loudly and his voice was loud
root_title: The Prison Story [Episode Two].

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Reason why you have to be good to everyone. (A Story Written by my little brother).
body:
This post is special to me because it was written by my baby brother. I hope you enjoy it.

There was a boy call Samuel who spent time flexing around with friends, so due to the kind of friends he moves around with, amazed to him to start stealing and disturbing the whole community, even when his father sent him to school, he beat the teachers and the student. 

https://66.media.tumblr.com/96fe08ca26291aba66e92b0b1f96cd46/tumblr_mlbndx0OVt1qgopu5o1_500.jpg
[Image Credit](https://andyswan.com/post/48080102613/destruction-is-easier-than-creating-its-the)


There was a day the school principal flogged him as a result of his nonchalant attitude. 
While the principal was on his way going back home,  he blocked the Principal and beat him up, so the school had no choice than to expel him, then he turned into an area boy, then they started calling him (Agama lizard) when he was expelled from school, he became an  hired assassin,  so once anyone was to get murdered in the village, it was his area of specification.
root_title: Reason why you have to be good to everyone. (A Story Written by my little brother).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Almost Lost my Life as a Result of Serving the Nation (Please Save the Kids in Rural Areas).
body:
My name is Adekunle Mercy Oluwatobi, I served with the 2018/2019 corps members batch A stream one in Makinde village, Odigbo local government in Ondo state, Nigeria.

I was excited to leave camp and collect my posting letter just like other corps members. I found someone who was also posted to the same place with me and this made me even more comfortable, we went to check the location and I was shocked to see what the place looked like.
It was a typical village with a terrible road and mud houses, I never knew things like this existed in Nigeria, I looked around and every house was just the same with men and women holding their farm materials as they return from farm to their respective houses.
I was about to reject the idea of staying in this village, when I overheard the kids praying for us to stay, there were so excited to see us.
I felt if people could survive here, I should be able to survive as well. I wanted to experience what it felt like to stay in a village, and I was able to convince the other cor
root_title: I Almost Lost my Life as a Result of Serving the Nation (Please Save the Kids in Rural Areas).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Life is Ironical.
body:
One funny thing about life is the way the entire situation is just different from what it really is.
A lot of things in life are the exact opposite of what they appear to be, some existing humans are as well the exact opposite of whom they appear to be.

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HuZ6LESq80o/Te5pVn_J29I/AAAAAAAAFAY/bWasJwopylA/s1600/DSCF4079.JPG
[Image Credit](https://jaishrie.blogspot.com/2011/06/world-environment-day-how-ironical.html?m=1)

There are people who look rich and classy but are living in debt and even have have to stay hungry sometimes.
However, there are people who seem not to be concerned about wearing good things but they don't joke with food, they eat in a high class way.

I remember hearing the story of a girl while we were in school, this girl would spend every pocket money she receives from her parents on clothes, bags, hair and shoes.
She would even go to the extent of collecting loan from friends to buy what to wear.
But, when it comes to food, she will begin to beg around for food. T
root_title: Life is Ironical.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Giving out from an empty bowl.
body:
I ran across a write-up today that had it inscribed: you do not give out something from an empty plate, I knew those words were just meant for me.
I paused for a second to think about my life and I realized how often I have tried to please others and even give out from an empty bowl.

![images.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRhvir6RShP2VwunPUTrJPevQEBpqEjzEKzPbjmkfhJay/images.jpeg)
[Image credit](https://fgcu360.com/2016/09/20/empty-bowls-celebrates-art-giving/)

Life has not been rosy I must confess and my rough times has made me learn and I am still learning also.
I have learnt the necessity of learning to take care of myself first before others. The people we tend to live our lives for, do not care about what you give to them.

When you have a bowl full of goodies, you can easily give out to others without any issue, but if you do not take care of yourself at all and even keep trying to give from a bowl that is as good as being empty, sooner or later you will get yourself completely dry and rough w
root_title: Giving out from an empty bowl.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: On Your Own Part, Strive to do Good.
body:
The crazy attitude displayed by some people, has the ability to make one loose his or her sanity.
There are people you might be doing good to, but the only thing on their mind is to ruin you, there are individuals you might be trying to uplift as well, but the only thing on their mind is to look for ways to destroy you totally.

https://timedotcom.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/success-finish-line-goals-achievments-betterment.jpg?quality=85
[Image Reference](http://time.com/4479890/best-version-of-yourself/)

These things happen everyday and everywhere, but the attitude of humans should not make us loose our sense of humanity or our willingness to do good.
The best way to give, is by not expecting anything in return.
Truth remains, those we try to help today might hunt us tomorrow.

There is a call for extra carefulness, but the insanity of man should never make you loose your sense of doing good.
Thanks a lot for coming around, I am @tobi. Stay loved and beautiful.
root_title: On Your Own Part, Strive to do Good.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: To Love, Not For The Things You Have The Ability To Offer.
body:
I have realized that there are two sides to love, when I speak of love, I do not only speak of the relationship that exist between a boy and a girl or a man and a woman, I speak of relationship in a general term, I speak of the relationship that exist between parents to their children, relationship between siblings, relationship between friends and every other form of relationship we can think of.

https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3c/Comfort-Someone-When-There-is-Nothing-You-Can-Offer-Except-Solace-Step-09.jpg/aid608654-v4-728px-Comfort-Someone-When-There-is-Nothing-You-Can-Offer-Except-Solace-Step-09.jpg

[Image credit](https://m.wikihow.com/Comfort-Someone-When-There-is-Nothing-You-Can-Offer-Except-Solace)

The two sides of love I have learnt include:
* Those that love you sincerely for who you are.
* Those who love you for what you are able to offer.

Sometimes, it might be difficult to differentiate between these two groups until something really dramatic happens or until something changes for some
root_title: To Love, Not For The Things You Have The Ability To Offer.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Where Exactly Should  A Woman Call It Quit------ A True Life Marriage Based Story
body:
The noise I heard this morning woke me up from my sleep, I wondered what could have been the cause of the noise at the early hours of the day. I tried to listen carefully and I realized that it was my neighbours from the other end, it was this man and his wife again. I could recognize their voice, they have a regular case of misunderstanding but whenever it happens it was usually the man who was threatening the woman and neighbours will come to plead on her behalf, but this morning, it was rather different because it was the wife who was raising her voice and she threatened to humiliate him.

https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/wuzup-naija/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/24151727/divorce-sex-lack-of-sex--e1537798657574.jpg

I wondered what the case could be, I knew it could not be that of cheating, because they have a belief that the men have the right to cheat but a woman must not dare, so what could be the problem I asked myself a little further.
I listened a little bit carefully, and I learnt that the man had s
root_title: Where Exactly Should  A Woman Call It Quit------ A True Life Marriage Based Story

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Good Health Is A Life Time Necessity.
body:
There is nothing as good and sweet as experiencing good health, good health was something I took for granted, I thought it was just a normal thing to feel the way that I feel, and sometimes I even complain over the little feelings of pain that I experienced.

https://www.unitedway.org/i/Blog_11-15-18_Success_In_Life_Starts_With_Good_Health.jpg/@zx_1000@zy_500

I, however, knew how relevant good health is in the life of a man after the brief illness I had. I started feeling weak and tired, but to me, it was a normal feeling of stress, all I needed to do was to get a good rest and I would be alright, I thought to myself. But, this was different as I got weaker by the day.
When things were getting out of hand, I decided to visit the hospital, a check was carried out on me and it was confirmed that I typhoid and Malaria, the doctor said I had to begin treatment immediately and I obeyed, it was supposed to be 3 days of injection but I was not even feeling any better after the injection for three days, after compl
root_title: Good Health Is A Life Time Necessity.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Poverty and It's Limit.
body:
There are things that happen in life that appear really funny, I wonder if it only appears funny to me or it appears funny to every other person that sees it.
A lot of people have a constant grudge and complain against poverty, they have a lot to say as to the way they feel about their status of being poor, they murmur and sometimes even cry about it. When you see them during periods like this, you almost wish there is a way you could help them out of their predicament as of that period.

https://images.theconversation.com/files/228296/original/file-20180718-142435-1v01jtj.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&q=45&auto=format&w=496&fit=clip

You might, however, change your mind about helping them when you realize how lazy and idle they can be. These set of people whom you see murmuring and complaining, you expect to take the best use of every opportunity they see in order to make a living for themselves, but they refuse to do that as they sit to only talk about their predicament.

http://borgenproject.org/wp-content/uploads/I
root_title: Poverty and It's Limit.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Pleasant Surprise.
body:
It was a beautiful morning and the reflection of the sun that entered through the window woke me up from my sleep, I felt lazy to get up from my bed, so I decided to stay in bed a little more longer.
However, the sweet musical sound I was hearing, got me up from the bed. I sat up, as I wondered where such a lovely sound could come from at that moment. It appeared it was closer than I even imagined.

https://previews.123rf.com/images/jeffbanke/jeffbanke1012/jeffbanke101200193/8508029-young-african-american-woman-smiling-because-of-a-pleasant-surprise-isolated-on-white-background.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.123rf.com/photo_8508029_young-african-american-woman-smiling-because-of-a-pleasant-surprise-isolated-on-white-background.html)

I jumped out of the bed and headed straight for the door, I was surprised to see a man with a trumpet, obviously, the great sound emersed from that region, I had not seen his face before, so this made me speechless, before I could say anything, I saw a young lady holding a beaut
root_title: The Pleasant Surprise.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Friendship and Condemnation.
body:
It is terrible to stay around people who love to criticize you.
Such people always see something wrong with practically everything you do.

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bLJCdZjwfz0/Tqd8A0_E3hI/AAAAAAAAAq0/eDac2aZzdBU/s1600/liberating-power-of-grace.jpg
[Image Credit](http://dailyjesusnow.blogspot.com/2011/10/walking-without-condemnation.html?m=1)

It is good to have people who love to correct you whenever you do something wrong, people who believe in you and who will walk with you all the way taking necessary decisions to keep you on track.
But, there is also a great difference between someone who wants to condemn you, and someone who wants the best for you, it is just that sometimes we tend to mix things up.

Personally, I feel we should never condemn someone we love, the act of condeming those we claim to love, will always make them feel bad.
We should try as much as we can, to move away from people who likes to condemn us, as this will clearly make us feel bad and terrible all the time.
