root_title: Friendship and Condemnation.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Building up the Self Confidence of a Child ---Proper Parenting.
body:
I believe greatly in the fact that a child that is properly loved at home will find it difficult to be a victim of inferiority complex, because the parent and family makes the child feels so special that no one would ever be able to tell the child otherwise.
The case is however different when it comes to a child who does not receive love from home, a child who is always made to feel as though he or she is not accepted in the home, when such a child goes out of the home, he or she would want to look for every opportunity to feel accepted not minding if it is in a positive or negative way.

http://www.internetbusinessideas-viralmarketing.com/images/Self-Esteem.jpg
[Image Credit](http://www.internetbusinessideas-viralmarketing.com/building-self-esteem-2.html)

We will have a society filled with more caring people if parents as well as family members, learn to make their kids feel they are accepted in the home.
Acceptability in the family builds up the self confidence of a child.
We see children roaming the stre
root_title: Building up the Self Confidence of a Child ---Proper Parenting.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Trust as a Necessary Factor in every Relatiinship.
body:
The issue of trust has become a major tool that is absent in a lot of relationships.
Every relationship either between parents, between family members (nuclear or extended) or lovers requires a high level of trust and commitment.

https://coda.newjobs.com/api/imagesproxy/ms/cms/content30/images/building-trust.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.monster.com/career-advice/article/6-steps-to-building-trust-in-the-workplace-hot-jobs)

However, if trust is absent in any relationship, the relationship will never stand.
I once listened to a great woman share her experience and she mentioned that when she first got married to her husband, she had a high level of insecurity, she could not stand him speaking to another lady talk more of trying to hug her, she will get very angry and flare up.
But, something happened on a faithful day that made her change her mind, she said she went out with her husband and she saw a mentor there, what shocked her was the way her mentor's husband stood around with ladies, hugging and talkin
root_title: Trust as a Necessary Factor in every Relatiinship.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Sometimes, you need to take Yourself on a Special Treat.
body:
I have heard people say on countless occasions, that the only thing a person has to himself is the food we eat while we are alive, it is believed that every other thing we own such as: houses, cars, clothes, money, jewelries and others could be taken by another person either through theft while we are alive, or even take it after our demise.
The most annoying part is that, such acquired wealth might be taken by someone we will not give it to on a normal ground.

![GBWA-20190520232631.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRKDtc4vJyPGNdy6QuSRpVdWJQF83GgxkdzXhkfZtXe5T/GBWA-20190520232631.jpg)

I realized that sometimes I work so hard that I forget about myself, I work so hard that food is something I totally set aside, as a matter of fact, it becomes the least thing on my mind at that moment.

There is something I had wanted to get for a while now, I really felt like eating it very badly, but I did not want to touch the money I had because I wanted business to progress really badly, I however changed my mind ab
root_title: Sometimes, you need to take Yourself on a Special Treat.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Experience from Buying a Road side Food.
body:
A lot of time, purchasing a road side food seem to be the best option for us especially as a busy Nigerian, we get so busy that the only option we have is to grab a road side food or snacks to help satisfy our hunger.

https://www.agronigeria.com.ng/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/corn-n-pear.jpg

I usually like to grab snacks from the road side and my favourite is roasted corn, so whenever I have extra cash with me, I love to get one.
I was excited when I sighted a woman selling roasted corn by the road side, I quickly approached her but I meet a customer there trying to buy corn as well, so I had to wait for him to buy first.

https://guardian.ng/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Corn-20-9-15-Copy.jpg


However, his actions got me totally discouraged, rather than selecting what he would love to buy, he began to touch every corn available on the tray, he would touch every of the corn and drop them down again.
I was very upset because I had no idea on how neat his hands may be and how many other customers must have done
root_title: My Experience from Buying a Road side Food.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Black is Beautiful.
body:
I walk through the street and I feel really displeased seeing a lot of people with what I like to call a "two coloured skin".
A two coloured skin is a skin that has two different colour in it, this is not in anyway a skin disease or skin problem, but it is a reaction that comes with using certain body lotions.

![IMG_1551545873441.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQme2defgThxaVWryvcmhNKFbxwrvqi2X3DjNsAqhXwaGWa/IMG_1551545873441.jpg)

### Possible Reasons for Having a Two Coloured Skin.

There are people who naturally do not have the same colour all through their body, one part of the body may be a little darker than the other probably as a result if exposing certain part of the body to the sun while the other part is covered from the sun.
However, there is a more common reason why some people have this two coloured skin, and the reason is because they want to change their skin colour.
Some people do not feel comfortable with their skin colour, so they usually want to do all they can to change it.
This is m
root_title: Black is Beautiful.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: An Healthy Breakfast.
body:
This morning, I had a special breakfast, though it is not something that people will just think of on a normal day, it is really simple yet enjoyable.
I had pap and vegetable soup ( a proper Nigerian meal).
Although things like this are usually taken in local areas in Nigeria, it is something I love very much, it's high nutritional value also makes it exciting to take.


https://lifestyle.thecable.ng/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/Pap1.png

Pap is made from corn, I think the upgraded version of our local pap is what we have as custard today. But, I would prefer pap to custard any day, and then vegetable soup, that is one of my favourite, especially when it is properly prepared with what I like to call "orishirishi" (I.e) meat, stock fish, crayfish, pomo and others.

https://www.informationng.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/waterleaf.jpg

Although, my own vegetable soup was just plain and simple this morning and that is because I did not have enough money to prepare it, I just simply prepared it like that and I en
root_title: An Healthy Breakfast.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Family and Support.
body:
A lot of people say there is nothing better than a family but i would like to include "a good family".
There are family members you would have and life would become really smooth and easy for you because they want to help you get through the stages of life successfully.

https://d3a1pl1cwnc6ag.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/hernon-family-large.jpg
[Credit](https://www.messyfamilyproject.org/mp-008-large-families/)

However, there are also some set of family members who will try to make life as miserable as possible.
As much as you try to climb up the ladder of success, they keep pulling you down, it seem as though they are not interested in your success because all they want is just what they are able to benefit from you.

You need to check the type of family you come from very carefully, you need to understand what they want for you and what they want from you.
Understanding this, will make it possible for you to know what to discuss with them as well as what to keep away from them, remember that
root_title: Family and Support.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A New Month, Another Reason to Live and Love.
body:
Alright people, it is another day and the beginning of a new month.
It is another opportunity to start again,
Another opportunity to begin again,
Another opportunity to dream again,
Another opportunity to love again,
Another opportunity to reschedule our plans.

https://steemitimages.com/DQmVHCaHCWCurF1NroJAWDYwse7RuchrtdNBdn2AYM6TkXt/IMG-20170701-WA0003.jpg
[Reference](
https://steemit.com/do/@jabzie/happy-new-month-beautiful-people)

The old month is gone and we should learn from the mistakes we made in the previous months,
We should decide to start again and work on our errors.

I am excited about this month because it is my birth month,
I have another reason to live and love,
I have another reason to try again.
The same thing applies to you my Darling's,
It is never too late to dream,
It is never too late to try again,
Wipe your tears and live your dreams,
Love and give again,
Smile and forget your sorrows.

See you at the top Dearie's.....I am @tobi.
root_title: A New Month, Another Reason to Live and Love.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Dare to be Different.
body:
A lot of people fail to realize that there is beauty in being different, sometimes we try so hard to fit into a particular system that we fail to realize how bad we hurt ourselves.


There is nothing bad in trying to stand out, there is nothing bad in trying to be different or unique, there is nothing bad in changing people's opinion about a particular situation, even when others feel they should just fit in.

https://cdn5.vectorstock.com/i/1000x1000/48/09/dare-to-be-different-vector-19114809.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.vectorstock.com/royalty-free-vector/dare-to-be-different-vector-19114809)

Dare to become different in speech,
Dare to become different in movement,
Dare to become different in actions,
Dare to become different in everything you do,
You do not have to fit into the wrong group.
Stand out and make everyone else realize how wrong they are with the right actions you portray.
root_title: Dare to be Different.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: High Level of Greed even in Places of Worship.
body:
I went to a place that should be for spiritual gathering today and everyone went to pray and thank God for the things he has given to them.
The church as well as some good samaritans in the church brought food, and gift items to distribute to members of the church.


https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/vllkyt5ntfe9ebv3b.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.legit.ng/1005180-x-photos-that-show-how-different-igbo-and-yoruba-parties-are.html)

I watched with amazement and I saw people struggling to get a portion of the item being shared, everyone tried to get a portion.
I felt pity for them because I felt it was hunger and poverty that made them struggle for food the way they did.
They struggled to the extent that they pushed each other down and tried to collect the food and gift item from the distributor.

It however became an annoying scene when I realized that, some of these people were becoming greedy, some of the people who already got one still fought to collect more, some of them collected two or more
root_title: High Level of Greed even in Places of Worship.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Struggle with Childhood -- Proper Parenting.
body:
Sometimes our kids go through a lot of things that we have no idea about, we beat and punish them so hard and think they do not want to change.
But the real truth is that, they are trying so hard to change, they are fighting so hard to change or get better but nothing seem to be working.
However, that part of trying hard enough is one side that we do not get to see as parents.

https://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2012/06/15/article-2159712-139F1564000005DC-752_468x502.jpg
[Image credit](https://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-2159712/Obese-children-struggle-maths-lessons-feel-lonely.html)


I once heard a story of a child who could not just stop bed wetting, the child wet the bed so frequently that he became a laughing stock amongst his peers and siblings alike.
His parents will also flog him and allow his peers make jest of him, with the hope that their action will make him stop bed wetting.

This young boy always tries to stop it, the embarrassment was becoming too much for him to bear, so he asked around f
root_title: Struggle with Childhood -- Proper Parenting.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Today's Marriages and It's Effect on the Singles.
body:
The example of marriages that one gets to see this days gets one really discouraged and creates fear in the minds of a lot of singles.
Some of us are scared and we often question our ability to even get a good and long lasting marriage and home.

https://www.chaseamie.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/Best-Real-Wedding-Photos-Jen-Elihu-Jose-Villa-1440x1956.jpg

[Image Source](https://www.chaseamie.com/wedding-planning/balance-wedding-planning-work/)

There is no doubt that there are still marriages that are beautiful and even last until old age but the question is, how many of such marriages do we still have today?

Marriage is a beautiful thing, marriage is a blessing and other sweet things is what we hear at the beginning of the relationship, but after some years we begin to hear different horrible statements like:
I wish I never married you.
I regret the day I meet you, and other horrible things.

https://cdn.psychologytoday.com/sites/default/files/styles/article-inline-half-caption/public/field_blog_entry_i
root_title: Today's Marriages and It's Effect on the Singles.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Take Time To Have A Good, Hard Laugh Darlings.
body:
Laughter is a good medicine to the soul is one obvious thing everyone should know by now.
When was the last time you had a good laugh, it looks as if your burdens gets lifted immediately.

![GBWA-20190520233004.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWY3MLEMHtDQLnZmuzXRuTjH2QS6gSa3ATzkLyLok4SgP/GBWA-20190520233004.jpg)

[Image Credit](Image taken with mobile device)


I have been worried for some time now, and that is because I have a lot of issues running through my mind, I had things I had to handle and nothing was forth coming, this led to a very big issue and before I knew it, I was loosing my smile and happiness gradually.

However, I decided to free my mind and I listened to some rib cracking comedies which made my day, it was a soul lifting one, and I felt really different.
I know the necessity of laughing hard and laughing sincerely, it reduces stress, makes you look young again and makes you look beautiful.

Thanks a lot for reading, I am @tobi.
root_title: Take Time To Have A Good, Hard Laugh Darlings.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: It's My Birthday, I Feel Strange and Different.
body:
My birthday has been something I usually get crazy about, once it is the beginning of June, everyone around me know that my birthday is approaching, I usually get excited and like almost every other young lady, I try to make my hair, get some new clothes and if possible, shoes and bags.

![IMG_20180214_222845_270.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTNCpd7bdagJjp41pYoKnQYv1DmM3n8EWNRsbZgoQoCTr/IMG_20180214_222845_270.JPG)
But this birthday seem to be a really different one, I have not made any noise since the beginning of the month about it, I still have my hair rough and unmade, I have no new cloth, shoe or bag.
I don't know if this should be called maturity or whatsoever.
It might be because I have some unsettled bills that makes it seem as though the birthday is coming at the wrong time.
But, through it all, I want to say that I remain grateful to the giver of life and every good gift.

I have no idea about what today (which is my birthday) would look like, but I want to say a big happy birthday to mysel
root_title: It's My Birthday, I Feel Strange and Different.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Celebrating Myself Today and Always. (Happy Birthday to Me).
body:
Today is a day that I am reminded of the fact that I was born some years back on this same date.
I am reminded of the fact that my birth brought joy to a family,
I am reminded of the fact that my birth opened someone's womb and ended her bareness,
I am reminded of the fact that my birth  brought peace to a family.

![GBWA-20190612043503.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUDKVpiRKoS5eawhb8Ttv3VFqgbktHbC78rvWs8xvyrHz/GBWA-20190612043503.jpg)

Today, I am grateful for the gift of life, 
I am grateful for the ability to exist,
I am grateful for the lives I have been able to impact,
I am grateful for growth and increase.

![IMG_20180921_152026_713.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUc2vHmgVqCzpyQhXmhZbwFYkXmvNvwxWeSyCwwc9gVpb/IMG_20180921_152026_713.JPG)

I celebrate the faithfulness of the most high over my life today and I say to him be all the glory.
I am grateful for lessons because life has not been rosy,
I am grateful for opportunities (used and misused),
I am grateful that I have humans around (good
root_title: Celebrating Myself Today and Always. (Happy Birthday to Me).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Happiness is a Personal Decision, Decide to Remain Happy.
body:
As I write this topic, I remember the number of times I have deprived myself and others around me of a beautiful smile, I remember that sometimes I feel life is indeed unfair to me and the only thing I can do to show my grief is to get worried and of course wear that smile of being worried on my face.

https://homigoblog.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/decision-making-for-personal-happiness.jpg?w=1425&h=768&crop=1
[Image Source](https://homigoblog.wordpress.com/2016/08/31/decision-making-for-personal-happiness/)

Sometime I see people who seem to be in a better situation and they also look sad like me, but there was nothing I could do, I was sad and of course a sad person cannot make another sad person happy.
I thought about the fact that having a lot of sad faces on earth would only make the world an unbearable place for everyone to live in.

I have learnt that everyone have issues they have to deal with, they have things bothering them.
Not everyone with a happy face is happy indeed, but it is a personal decis
root_title: Happiness is a Personal Decision, Decide to Remain Happy.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: An Issue of "May Be".
body:
Everyone seem to think we will be best for each other,
Everyone seem to think we will be cool together,
Everyone seem to think our combination will be a perfect one,
Everyone is saying you should become my lover.
But I don't know if I take your breath away,
I don't know if I would be perfect for you,
You have no idea about what my greatest fear is,
I know you like me too and maybe fate has said we cannot fight this.

https://markmanson.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/what-love-is-cover.jpg
[Image Source](https://markmanson.net/unconditional-love)

I know I kind of like you too a little bit,
I know you also maybe like me as well,
I think I could probably become your baby,
May be we could give this love thing a chance,
Maybe my speculations are even wrong,
Or maybe I am even too motivated.

I know I said I only want to be your friend,
I know I claimed not to want any other thing,
But let us forget about that and just try out this chemistry, it might work.
Even if we will make the worst couple,
Maybe we should g
root_title: An Issue of "May Be".

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Cheap Talk About Money.
body:
Work is essential for a good living. We all want money, some people pray so hard for money, they talk so much about money, they wish to a great extent that they have a large amount of money to spend.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/d8/cb/0a/d8cb0a549801686a81b0b359b800374b.jpg
[Credit](https://www.pinterest.com/pin/708965166313535391/)

But one question that remains unanswered by most of them is if they are ready to work for the money they wish to have.
A lot of people just wish to have money based on words of the lips, but when it comes to putting this wish into action, they become lazy at it.

I want to let you know that no matter how much you wish you have a particular thing, it will never come to you as long as you do not work for it.
What you desire to have can only be obtained when you work for it.
Life does not give you what you imagine neither does it give you the things you wish, it only provides you with the things you work and struggle for, that is one bitter truth learnt from life.

Thanks for re
root_title: The Cheap Talk About Money.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Friendship and Trust.
body:
Today, I saw a clear example of how humans you call friends will never support your dreams and I guess that is because they never want your success achievable.

https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/ca/Get-Over-a-Friend%27s-Betrayal-Step-3-Version-3.jpg/aid130443-v4-728px-Get-Over-a-Friend%27s-Betrayal-Step-3-Version-3.jpg

[Image Credit](https://m.wikihow.com/Get-Over-a-Friend%27s-Betrayal)

You should be careful about those you share your dreams with, because the human mind is filled with anger and jealousy. They are jealous of the fact that you might get better than them or maybe you are already getting started about greatness and that feeling of anger and jealousy may make them look for ways to want to ruin or destroy you.

As a business man or woman, you might even have friends who will never support your business, as a matter of fact, they will go pass your store where you offer a more convenient service, to a place where a poor services is rendered and the reason is because they do not want your grow
root_title: Friendship and Trust.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Do not be in a haste to draw conclusions about others.
body:
It is very funny how someone will claim to know the future of another human, some people feel that by mere observation, they have the right to know or tell what tomorrow holds for another man.

I was in a public transport today when i overhead the conversation of some people that was really funny to me, they were talking about a lady who is in love with her boyfriend, and one of those ladies said: this girl is just deceiving herself, he will never marry her.
I was shocked because these young gossip have no idea about what the future holds for themselves, talk more of what the future holds for another person.

https://www.readingrockets.org/sites/default/files/field/image/hp-inference.jpg
[Source](https://www.readingrockets.org/article/making-inferences-and-drawing-conclusions)

Sometimes, our suspicion might be very incorrect, we may think things will turn out in a certain direction, and it  will end up in another direction.
Most times our judgment about people usually turn out in the opposite direction, so
root_title: Do not be in a haste to draw conclusions about others.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Wickedness Exists amongst Humans.
body:
I smiled as I reflected on how wicked the human mind could be, the fact that you are nice or kind to them, does not mean they will show you love in anyway.
As a matter of fact, the fact that you are a good to a person, does not mean that the world will be good to you.


https://i0.wp.com/careynieuwhof.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/shutterstock_289765856.jpg?resize=1024%2C683&ssl=1

[Image Source](https://careynieuwhof.com/3-things-christians-do-that-non-christians-despise/)

I remember hearing stories of how friends try to hurt each other, I remember listening to stories of how humans kill over things they do not love.
Desperate souls are everywhere and only God can save us from them, they come in different forms, shapes and sizes and not even our act of being good can make them act fair towards us.

Keep being awesome friends, thanks for reading. I am @tobi
root_title: Wickedness Exists amongst Humans.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Should Hardworking People Give to Lazy People?
body:
There are things that really get me amazed about life, things I really cannot understand.
There is one in particular that has filled my mind for sometime now, and I really want clarifications about the issue.

https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/t/busy-lazy-motivated-unmotivated-67702803.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.dreamstime.com/illustration/lazy.html)


There are humans in life who work extra hard, everyone has reasons why they work hard, some work hard in order to eradicate poverty, some work hard in other to live a good life, some work hard in order to keep something for their children, some work hard in order to help others, some people also work hard in order to continue a certain successful chain.
People work hard for several reasons .

There is another set of individuals, these ones will not work, they decide to be lazy.
These individuals are the ones who will claim that they cannot stress themselves, they just want to live a relaxed life.
But, life has taught that in order to live a relaxed and good li
root_title: Should Hardworking People Give to Lazy People?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Where should be line be drawn when you have to work hard?
body:
I observed a retail seller in my area who works extremely hard, I have been seeing her for years but I had no idea that she works extremely hard like this.
As a retailer who has her shop filled with all sort of items you want, she is a popular name in the vicinity, most bike riders know the name of the junction as the name of the store.
The store does not have a name, so it is not as if it is branded but people know her by her son's name and that is the name she is called.

https://www.un.org/africarenewal/sites/www.un.org.africarenewal/files/styles/ar_main_story_main_photo/public/trader_west_africaIMG_222993.JPG?itok=39B7pvJV
[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=an+african+trader+who+works+extra+hard&client=firefox-b&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwj_z_jwxZbjAhWOQEEAHTERCisQ_AUIBigB&biw=360&bih=560#mhpiv=1&spf=1562081187752)

I know that on my way to work in the morning, this woman's shop is always opened and when I close at night, she is there as well.
I had no idea she works more than I tho
root_title: Where should be line be drawn when you have to work hard?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Supreme God of Wonders.
body:
https://biblearena.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/wonders-300x200.jpg

The God of awesome wonders who is supreme,
The creator of the entire universe,
The most beautiful creature,
The one who has made us in his own image and likeness,
He has made us as beautiful as he is,
The priceless king,
The one that never changes,
I call him my father, my saviour and friend,
I have tasted of his glory and goodness,
He is sure and everlasting,
He is yaweh and God forever.
Tell me what you call him and how much you love him.

See you around friends, keep being awesome. I am @tobi.
[Image Credit](https://biblearena.org/dare-trust-supreme-infallible-god/old-testament/)
root_title: The Supreme God of Wonders.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Learn to live, it is not just enough to exist.
body:
When I talk about living, I do not mean you should just exist.
There is a clear difference between existing and living and the earlier we realize that, the more life becomes beautiful for us.


https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.themuse.com%2Fuploaded%2Fattachments%2F18505.jpg%3Fv%3D8c86f5ce843d6adc32199037b121a4f2d8434e41d0a22e0179a06623c24fe716&h=367&prog=1

[Image Credit](https://www.themuse.com/advice/you-can-love-what-you-do-for-a-living-but-still-think-it-feels-like-work)

Everyone exist but it takes extra effort to live, living takes a deliberate action.
The only thing some people know how to do is to look for money and look for ways to get rich, so they work hard and hard and do not have the time for fun at all.

Do not just exist, learn to add meaning to space, let your value be felt by everyone around you.
Wherever you find yourself, let your presence be felt positively.
Learning to live implies that your actions and attitude should add value to those around you.

Learn t
root_title: Learn to live, it is not just enough to exist.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Get up and Get Going.
body:
I woke up this morning feeling pains all over my body, it was severe and I thought to myself that I just had to sleep for sometime and I will get better after sometime.
I opened my eyes again after sometime and I realized the pain was still there, so I said to myself that I might need to get more sleep, so I wrapped myself again and rolled to the other side of the bed.

https://www.limeade.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Move-study.jpg
[Source](https://www.limeade.com/2017/02/want-live-happier-life-get-move/)

It was until after I opened my eyes for the third time and I realized that the pain was still there, then I knew I had to get up and stop being lazy.
Sometimes, our body just wants us to sleep and stay lazy but you know that is not in anyway good for the pocket , because if you yield to your body and stay in bed all day, you need to be certain that hunger is going to get the better part of you.

I jumped out of bed immediately and went about my activity for the day, I got better afterwards and I realize
root_title: Get up and Get Going.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Not as Easy as it Seem.
body:
A lot of people want to get wealthy, a lot of people want fame, a lot of people want amazing growth and other things and we want it as fast as we can get it, but the truth is that, it is not always as easy as it seem.
In order to get all that we want in life, it takes more than we imagine.

https://kilgorehsmirror.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/photoshoppedfaith-900x600.jpg
[Credit](https://kilgorehsmirror.com/2763/opinions/why-life-as-a-teen-is-not-always-easy/)

We get out of high school and we think that everything will fall in place immediately, but sometimes it takes a little but more than what we think or imagine.

https://minimalism.life/media/pages/journal/simple-is-not-easy/670812281-1551280038/cover-q80.jpg
[Image Source](https://minimalism.life/journal/simple-is-not-easy)


Hard work and consistency is  necessary to make life beautiful, it might not be as easy as you think it would be dear friends.
So, irrespective of where you find yourself, irrespective of what you have in mind, always bear in m
root_title: Not as Easy as it Seem.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Hey, I got my groove back.
body:
I have been feeling down and weak for sometime now, I have got my mind clouded with a lot of issues like how I was going to survive, how I was going to scale through the present issues and problems.
I lost my ability to love completely, trust completely and smile completely.

![IMG_20180803_120850.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSQNNDaFst5TUM181D3k6xHGh1QhugsPZq9aL6z77nV6n/IMG_20180803_120850.jpg)

I had allowed people's bad habit and character to control my behaviour, I took up a new habit of showing the same level of love I received forgetting the fact that, I was different and I did not have to think or act like every other person.

![IMG_1551545873441.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQme2defgThxaVWryvcmhNKFbxwrvqi2X3DjNsAqhXwaGWa/IMG_1551545873441.jpg)

When I realized how much of a total stranger I had become to myself, how much of my vibe I had lost, I decided to walk on becoming the real me again.
Just this morning, I realized I did not need any dramatic thing to happen before I smiled, I did
root_title: Hey, I got my groove back.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: CHANGE IT NOW.
body:
I am writing this same post for the third time today because it keeps deleting itself after spending a lot of time to write it, it is annoying and I feel like crying write now but I am going to take the pain to write it again.

Some of us usually make the mistake of procrastinating issues we ought to handle immediately, there are cases that should be treated instantly especially when it has to do with issues of relationships.

https://pointsprizes-blog.s3-accelerate.amazonaws.com/2935.jpg
[Credit](https://www.pointsprizes.com/blog/550/the-3-main-stages-of-love-how-do-relationships-change-over-time)

There are ladies who feel that their man will naturally change some bad attitude after they get married, so they leave a lot of issues pending until that time(when it is almost impossible to change him).

There are guys who also feel that marriage will give them an edge over the relationship, therefore every correction should be postponed until that time.
However, these issues that we leave to pend until marriage
root_title: CHANGE IT NOW.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Parents only teach their children what they know, so what will you teach your children?
body:
As I laid quietly on my bed turning from one side of the bed to another, with the hope that I will fall asleep as soon as possible, I heard something from the other side and it caught my attention.
At the other side of the building, there are families who are either uneducated or barely educated. They get married at a very young age and produce children as much as they can, they see this as a means of blessing.
The  more children they produce, the more uneducated their clan becomes.

https://www.parentingforbrain.com/wp-content/uploads/positive-parenting-skills.jpeg
[Credit](https://www.parentingforbrain.com/how-to-be-a-good-parent-10-parenting-tips/)

I overheard the young man teaching his child English language and as expected, he was teaching the wrong thing, but that was actually what he knew.
The child however was excited to learn from the father because he felt his father was right.

This is however a call for being careful as parents and also building ourselves to learn more.
Children always believe i
root_title: Parents only teach their children what they know, so what will you teach your children?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Share your opinion with me on this controversial and interesting issue.
body:
Hello friends, I hope you are all doing great this lovely evening( It is evening over here in Nigeria), and it is almost the end of another weekend, a lot of people have to wake up very early tomorrow morning and continue the weekly routine of going to work very early and returning late at night.
Weekends are usually exciting for a lot of people because that is the only time they get to spend with family members and rest as well.

https://www.headcoveringmovement.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Head-Covering-Slider.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.headcoveringmovement.com/)

Anyways, that is not the story I have for you today, I want to discuss a very controversial topic with you, to an extent, it has something to do with religion.
This issue has to do with the covering of the head for ladies before prayers.
This issue has remained a matter of constant argument between religious bodies, at some point I thought it was only the Christians who argue this way, until I realized that even some Muslims will say there
root_title: Share your opinion with me on this controversial and interesting issue.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Pains of a Young Entrepreneur.
body:
I must confess that it is really not an easy task to start up a business, it might be interesting and amazing to have people call you CEO, call you boss and other amazing names, but a lot of people have no single idea on the internal battles you have to fight.
Starting your own business means that you will have to put everything you have into it, you will have to sacrifice everything if you want it to succeed.
To an extent, you might want to employ more hands to help you and those you employ might not share in your vision, as a matter of fact, they may try to ruin everything you have tried to build.

https://www.incimages.com/uploaded_files/image/970x450/getty_168720542_9707269704500159_80126.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+pains+of+a+young+entrepreneur&client=firefox-b&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjmh4ehwLnjAhVxmVwKHZs-D50Q_AUIBygC&biw=360&bih=560#mhpiv=16&spf=1563282276718)

As a young entrepreneur, sacrifice is one thing you might just have to get used to, you might have to
root_title: The Pains of a Young Entrepreneur.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Only if you Believe.
body:
I heard a great news, I saw something better, I saw something less stressful with lots of greats benefits attached to it.
I found peace and I found grace, I received satisfaction from life troubles and I found reasons to smile.

http://www.crcgeorge.co.za/wp3/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/crcgeorge_20190284.jpg
[Image credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=believe+in+the+supreme+god&client=firefox-b&biw=360&bih=560&tbm=isch&ei=v-kuXafcGoqChbIPhrOz-A4&start=60&sa=N#mhpiv=16&spf=1563355681181)

I increased on every side and I glowed, I spoke with confidence and I leaped for joy at every circumstance.
I was asked for the reason and I could not stop from giving a great smile, I smiled at the convenience at which great fortunes came.
All I had to do was to believe in his amazing grace and in the fact that he was capable to heal me.

http://etownfirstcog.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/cross-blue-sky-x.jpg
[Image credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=believe+in+the+supreme+god&client=firefox-b&biw=360&bih=560&tbm=i
root_title: Only if you Believe.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Parenting and Extravagance.
body:
The reasoning level of some humans happens to be very questioning, I was surprised this evening when I heard a woman who has been complaining about her inability to pay her children's fee say she bought a shoe of twenty seven thousand naira (27,000).

https://img.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://img.washingtonpost.com/rf/image_960w/2010-2019/WashingtonPost/2016/09/13/Interactivity/Images/iStock_66664193_LARGE1473796570.jpg&w=480
[Image credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=parenting+and+extravagance&client=firefox-b&biw=360&bih=560&tbm=isch&ei=b4wvXYr2IuOdjLsP7uyosAo&start=20&sa=N#mhpiv=16&spf=1563397296111)

I remember clearly about the way she has been blaming the proprietor of her child's school for sending her child home, should I call this improper parenting or lack of ability to place priorities.

https://cdn1.i-scmp.com/sites/default/files/styles/1200x800/public/2015/08/31/52568d16ef3f8d65447f1bfe84de0273.jpg?itok=cI9JOWlP
[Image Source](https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/families/article
root_title: Parenting and Extravagance.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Answering Questions the Right Way.
body:
A lot of people have problems because of their inability to answer questions the right way.
A lot of relationship has hit the rock because certain questions have been answered the wrong way.
How about learning to answer questions appropriately, this will save us from a lot of problems and issues.

https://www.premierresourcing.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/rawpixel-433728-unsplash-1080x675.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.premierresourcing.co.uk/answering-pr-interview-questions-the-right-way/)

Sometimes, the only thing the questioniare demands is a simple YES or NO, your inability to answer these questions as requested creates problems on most occasions.
Learning to answer questions rightly, has the ability to reduce the rate of fight and misunderstanding.
I hope you understand my point, learn to answer questions the right way and let's eliminate every possible issue.

Thanks for reading, I am @tobi.
root_title: Answering Questions the Right Way.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: No Excuse for Laziness and Idleness.
body:
Today, I saw a level of struggle that amazed me, then I realized that life is not fair and some of us do not have the right to sit idle or act in a lazy way.
I found a lady who was sitting on a wheel chair and she owns a salon, I was amazed because some people who have complete body parts, sometimes sit idle and do nothing, after some time they go out to beg for money, but here is this woman sitting on a wheel chair and working to make ends meet.

https://media.activechristianity.org/2018/09/1835-24-Bible-verses-to-deal-a-blow-against-laziness.jpg
[Credit](https://activechristianity.org/24-bible-verses-to-deal-a-blow-against-laziness)

As I sat in front of my store, I noticed an old woman passing by, people of her set would just sit and expect children and grand children to send money to them, but I was surprised to see her with some sticks on her head moving from one location to another, I felt she might want to sell them and have something for herself.

Just after I thought I had seen enough, I saw an elde
root_title: No Excuse for Laziness and Idleness.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Right Person at the Right Place.
body:
In a far away land some years ago, there was a man who desired to become king so terribly even when he knew he was not supposed to become the king.
He was fortunate to be a member of the king's family, his elder brother was the king at the moment, but he on the other hand, was just a member of the royal house and not an heir to the throne.

https://cdn7.dissolve.com/p/D34_78_052/D34_78_052_0004_600.jpg

[Image Source](https://dissolve.com/video/polar-bear-baby-cubs-struggle-ice-royalty-free-stock-video-footage/001-D34-78-051)

![D331_36_011_1200.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQEHsncUg8vrj98Kp4fYqjTwByCcqHXEf6DedefbmM76U/D331_36_011_1200.jpg)
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/search?q=struggle+for+royalty&client=firefox-b&biw=360&bih=560&tbm=isch&ei=KHk3XZTZNLWy8gK64YCQBA&start=20&sa=N#mhpiv=18&spf=1563916609682)

He also knew however, that in order for him to become the king, he will have to kill his brother (the king) as well his brother's kids.
His greed did not make him realize that he was supp
root_title: The Right Person at the Right Place.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Ever had an experience with someone who loves to seek attention?
body:
Have you ever gotten into a bus and you sight some people who are not just organized and they try everything possible to make everyone look towards their direction.

https://ih1.redbubble.net/image.44959299.3418/ra%2Cunisex_tshirt%2Cx925%2Cfafafa%3Aca443f4786%2Cfront-c%2C217%2C190%2C210%2C230-bg%2Cf8f8f8.lite-1u2.jpg

[Credit](https://www.redbubble.com/shop/attention+seekers)

I was in a bus sometime ago and there was a young man sitting in front of me, he might be carried away by the ladies beauty that he did not know when he started splitting out trash that has the ability to get him into trouble.
He was ranting so loud that almost everyone in the bus could hear him without stress.
He was talking about a huge some of money that was deposited in his account, he talked so much that he talked about his house address, I have no idea about what happened to him afterwards, but there is every tendency that he might get robbed as a result of his inability to control his tongue over the money he got.

I have also s
root_title: Ever had an experience with someone who loves to seek attention?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Reciprocated Kindness.
body:
Hello friends, it is a beautiful morning over here, so permit me to say good morning to you.
It's been a while I wrote something here and that is because I have been so so busy, but I am grateful for good health.


https://s3.amazonaws.com/s3.mp-cdn.net/6e/aa/fb4615c68583830c038d75dfb7d4-should-kindness-be-reciprocated.jpg
[Credit](https://www.debate.org/opinions/should-kindness-be-reciprocated)

What I want to share with you today is something that bothers me greatly and I wonder how people reason about life.
I strongly believe that an act of kindness should be reciprocated, but that is not always the case for a lot of people who find it as a big deal to show kindness of any sort.

https://timedotcom.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/acts-of-kindness-marriages-happier.jpg
[Credit](https://time.com/4674982/kindness-compassion-marriage/ss)

There is a young man in our neighbourhood who usually run his generator as a result of the absence of adequate light in the community, whenever he puts on his generator, his roo
root_title: Reciprocated Kindness.
