author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Precious Name of Jesus. [The Power to Restore]
body:
It was a bad dream I woke up really scared, I had dreamt that my sales girl was in the hospital and I was trying to pay the bills.
Then, this evening, I received a call from the store, stating that she just collapsed, I got up immediately and headed for the store.

https://www.guideposts.org/sites/guideposts.org/files/styles/hero_box_left_lg/public/blog_post/blog_healing_verses_1540.jpg?timestamp=1506291964
[Image Source](https://www.guideposts.org/faith-and-prayer/prayer-stories/power-of-prayer/6-bible-verses-for-healing-of-mind-body-and-spirit)

I got on the bike with my partner and we told the bike rider to move as fast as he could, we got to a spot and an heavy downpour began, it rained in an extremely heavy way and the bike man begged to stop, but we knew we had somewhere to rush to, so we pleaded with him to keep moving.
Surprisingly, we left that particular street and we realized that there was no sign of rain in the next street, maybe the rain was supposed to delay us.

https://naturallivingfamily.co
root_title: The Precious Name of Jesus. [The Power to Restore]

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Overcome Unavoidable Distractions and Move Forward.
body:
Things do not always go the way we want it to go, there are times difficulties show up, we might have a way we want to spend the money we have and unfortunately, something strange happens and destroys the entire thing.
There is no doubt that unfortunate situations happen almost all the time, I mean things that could make a person cry and conclude that life is unbearable.

However, that is not an avenue for one to loose focus or get distracted, we need keep holding on the fact that we have a future ahead of us.
Growth is a definite life necessity but distractions are also important for life continuity.
The moment you focus on the things distracting you, it keeps you at a point for longer than you can imagine.
But, your decision to move forward, gives you an edge over life problems and pushes you forward even more than you can imagine.

Stay awesome and wonderful, I am @tobi.
root_title: Overcome Unavoidable Distractions and Move Forward.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Investment or Proper Eating?
body:
What will be your choice if you are asked to choose between eating properly and investing properly.

https://www.moneycrashers.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/eat-healthy-budget-1068x713.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.moneycrashers.com/eat-healthy-on-a-budget/)

I realized something and it bothered my heart so much that I decided to share with my lovely friends on this platform.
I saw a woman who does not really look good and she always puts on the face of someone who is suffering, everyone always have it in mind that she is going through so much and she might even be helpless( that is the type of attitude she portrays).
She is a widow who has kids, but her mother and her other siblings decided to take up the responsibility of taking care of her kids, as a matter of fact, they do not live with her, so the only thing and only person she needs to take care of with the salary she earns is herself.
As pitiable as this woman looks, one thing she will never joke with is, is her stomach, she eats so much, every time
root_title: Investment or Proper Eating?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Wearing your problems on your face.
body:
There are people who are used to carrying their issues on their faces, they feel that will make them get someone to help them very fast.
Some people move around with a very long face, you never see them smile, they always look worried and dejected, they always have something wrong with them, and of course when you ask them, they always have something to say.

https://imgix.bustle.com/uploads/image/2018/3/26/bf0f190f-ca90-4515-87d2-2718da03c7f0-2t4a0439.jpg?w=970&h=546&fit=crop&crop=faces&auto=format&q=70

Personally, I don't think this idea is a cool one, because the fact that you wear your problems on your face does not mean you will get someone who will help you, another thing is that, everyone has their issues, the fact that they smile all day does not mean that everything is alright with them.

It is necessary to realize that your smile is essential, it adds a lot of benefit to you and even to others.
Your smile has the ability to save someone from destruction, so give it out willingly and stop wearing a
root_title: Wearing your problems on your face.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Power in Consistency.
body:
Consistency is a great and necessary life factor because things might not always be as easy or smooth as we want them to be.
For instance, an hard working person might feel that he should get promoted the following year and he might not get what he desires.
However, this is not a call for laziness or discouragement, it only means he should work more and stay focused with whatever he does.

https://miro.medium.com/max/1200/1*XeX1vEzAy2DNSwMrVeN3lg.jpeg
[Imagr Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+power+in+consistency&client=firefox-b&biw=360&bih=560&tbm=isch&ei=i-NLXdfuIZSigAaOz4mYBQ&start=20&sa=N#mhpiv=0&spf=1565254593885)

Becoming consistent means that, you will have to overlook available odds, overlook the fact that things are not going the way you have planned it to go, but stay focused on the future, let your gaze be fixed on what the future looks like for you and you will be surprised at how much you have been able to achieve over time.
Thanks for coming around, I am @tobi.
root_title: The Power in Consistency.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Daily Plans and Achievement.
body:
Lately, I realized that when it gets late at night, it  looks as if I have not achieved anything at all for the day, and on most occasions, I hardly even have any time to rest at all in the day time.
I will beat my self so hard and try to stay awake, until sleep finally knocks me away.

https://tenaciousjennyjimenez.files.wordpress.com/2018/10/all-calendars1.jpg?w=663
[Image Source](https://tenaciousjennyjimenez.com/2018/10/22/proper-planning-for-maximum-productivity/)

I thought about how I could achieve all that I needed to achieve in a day and still get proper rest.
Then, I realized it was important to get proper plan for the day. It does not make any sense to wake up and  just take things the way they come, I realized this was one of the things that affected my daily activities.

Proper planing makes you achieve more, it makes you strategize better and it gives you a positive result at the end of the day.
I have learnt to plan, I hope you do the same.
Thanks a lot for coming around, I am @tobi.
root_title: Daily Plans and Achievement.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Keep moving, Keep Growing and Keep Rising.
body:
I want to encourage someone who might be feeling depressed at the moment. I understand that the road may not always be smooth, I understand that the road might even be more rough than we can imagine, but all we need to do is to learn how to keep moving.
Sometimes, moving might not be easy, there are times you just feel that the best option is to sit and that is because of how frustrated you are at that moment.

https://www.latestmotivationalstories.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/obstacle_1538213248.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.latestmotivationalstories.com/uncategorized/success-mantra-there-will-be-obstacles-in-the-way-you-keep-on-moving-towards-your-destination-without-stopping/)

https://budbilanich.com/wp-content/uploads/man-climbing.jpg
[Image Source](
https://budbilanich.com/climbing-the-corporate-ladder-tips-for-building-a-successful-career/)

Sitting, is never a good option whenever you feel weak, resting is not a better option either, but movement is the best remedy.
 Either by crawling, jumping or
root_title: Keep moving, Keep Growing and Keep Rising.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Happiness is a Decision of the Mind.
body:
Everything can possibly not be totally rosy at all times, but it takes a serious and determined mind to keep smiling at every given time.
The necessity of being happy can never be over mentioned.

https://memoirsofasoulsista.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/happiness-1.jpg
[Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=happiness+is+a+decision+of+the+mind&client=firefox-b&biw=360&bih=560&tbm=isch&ei=mOdVXbKFJrXExgPatqO4Dw&start=20&sa=N#mhpiv=17&spf=1565910885226)

However, no matter how hard situations of life come to you, never forget how important it is for you to smile and live a happy life as much as you can.
Thank you so much for reading this short and insightful piece. I am @tobi.
root_title: Happiness is a Decision of the Mind.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Reason why People Work Hard but Remain Poor.
body:
Have you seen someone who seem to always work hard and there is no observable change in the person's life, it does not look as if the person is improving at all.
At some point, you might even feel so bad for the person and you wish you could help in some way, I was along disturbed and I decided to carry out a person research on the reason why someone will work very hard and gain little or nothing at the end of the day.

https://www.talkingmoney.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Hard-work-poverty.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.talkingmoney.org.uk/working-hard-but-still-in-poverty/)

I realized that, there are people who only know how to work hard but do not understand the mathematics behind savings, increase and returns.
After the days work, they will spend all they have acquired on food and drinks. Sometimes, they will spend it on clothes, shoes and bags, so their theory is that you have to work hard and spend hard then work extra hard to make more more money to spend more.
Bearing this in mind, I realized t
root_title: The Reason why People Work Hard but Remain Poor.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Opportunities taken for granted.
body:
Sometimes, I wonder why humans like to take opportunities for granted, just a little opportunity to make them feel free with you will make them misbehave.

https://www.blueoceanstrategy.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/817365106-2.jpg
[Credit](https://www.blueoceanstrategy.com/blog/the-mind-of-a-blue-ocean-strategist/)

Sometimes as a boss, you want your workers to get close to you, you want them to be able to relate with you comfortably, you want them to have access to holidays and other things that may be beneficial to them, but the surprising thing is that, they begin to look for such opportunities everyday.

It is not advisable to act strict towards your workers or make things difficult for them, but where do you draw the line when you try to give them a free hand and they tend to misbehave.
Share your opinion with me on this issue. I am @tobi.
root_title: Opportunities taken for granted.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Bigger Risks for Bigger Returns.
body:
Today, we envy a lot of people that have big names, that have big pockets and have big businesses to their names, but one thing we fail to focus on, is what they had to do to get to the level they are at the moment.

https://image.iol.co.za/image/1/process/620x349?source=https://inm-baobab-prod-eu-west-1.s3.amazonaws.com/public/inm/media/image/iol/2018/05/26/14727502/PF%20tightrope.jpg&operation=CROP&offset=0x27&resize=1181x663
[Credit](https://www.iol.co.za/personal-finance/which-poses-the-bigger-risk-your-investments-or-you-14727502

The world does not make things easy for people, as a matter of fact, the environment we live in does not make success convenient or easy for anyone to acquire, there are crazy decisions that people make in order to acquire success.

Rather than just admiring people with big names and big pockets, why not take a decision today to learn from them and make something good for yourself.

I also learnt there are people who even envy those who are successful and they always look for
root_title: Bigger Risks for Bigger Returns.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Questioning Parental Care.
body:
The reasoning level of some humans happens to be very questioning, I was surprised this evening when I heard a woman who has been complaining about her inability to pay her children's fee say she bought a shoe at a very expensive rate.

https://img1.thelist.com/img/uploads/2017/10/parenting-mistakes1.jpg
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/search?q=improper+parenting&client=firefox-b&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjntMjN1ZTkAhUTu3EKHd6XACwQ_AUIBigB&biw=360&bih=560&biw=360&bih=560#mhpiv=15&spf=1566414718103)

I remember clearly about the way she has been blaming the proprietor of her child's school for sending her child home, should I call this improper parenting or lack of ability to place priorities.

The woman in question, claims to be in high debt and inability to feed herself and her kid properly.
I noticed she spends well on her look, she wears clothes of expensive materials, she wears shoes of high class while she complains about her kids lacking in so many areas.
I have no issue whatsoever wit
root_title: Questioning Parental Care.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: When was the last time you said thank you?
body:
We have people whose hearts are filled with arrogance and they do not even know it, the simple attitude of saying thank you to someone who has offered them help had eluded them.
The act of saying thank you which should be an easy task to perform, has become so difficult for a lot of people to do.

https://ordermysupplies.files.wordpress.com/2011/10/doggie-hug.jpg
[Image Credit](https://ordermysupplies.wordpress.com/2011/10/31/whens-the-last-time-you-really-said-thank-you/)

I was chatting with a colleague one day and he confessed about how he has issues with saying thank you, he added that,  he had ended his relationship with about three girls just because of his inability to say sorry for the offence committed.
I was really angry about that and I wonder why someone will be so arrogant that saying thank you will be a big deal.

http://businesslendinginfocenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/Saying-thanks2-e1500483688465.jpg
[Image Credit](http://businesslendinginfocenter.com/when-was-the-last-time-you-said-t
root_title: When was the last time you said thank you?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Be Grateful For The Things You Have.
body:
Gratitude as an act is believed to make way for a man, but the issue is that, a lot of us have tuned our lives to regular complaints and we even fail to realize how lucky we are to have some of the things we have.

https://amp.businessinsider.com/images/54dbab44eab8eabc2cfac3f3-750-562.jpg
[Image Credit](https://www.businessinsider.com/gratitude-makes-you-rich-2015-2?IR=T)

I understand that life may be filled with thorns and make you even forget to know how to say thank you.
But, the truth is that, we have things we should really show gratitude about, for instance, the fact that we still have the ability to breath, is enough to be grateful about.
What about good health, a lot of people have money but major the spending on the treatment of one health issue or the other, we should be grateful for that.

Have you even thought about the ability you have to move around from one location to another the way you like, that is not something that is easy to have, some people need to be pushed or carried, they wish th
root_title: Be Grateful For The Things You Have.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Difference Between a Good and a Bad Debt.
body:
At a point in my life, I use to pray never to borrow money from anyone or even organizations no matter what the case may be.
I believed strongly in the fact that one could rise from a low level to a very high level without getting loans from anyone.

https://image.cnbcfm.com/api/v1/image/105965058-15603774806-22-goodbaddebt-1170x463.jpg?v=1561056944&w=1400&h=950
[Image Credit](https://grow.acorns.com/whats-the-difference-between-good-and-bad-debt/)

My opinion however changed when I was faced with certain issues especially business related and I had to seek for loans (not even from only individuals but also from organizations), although this is not a willing act but I had no other option than to do what I had to do.

https://mycollegecorner.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/student-loan-debt-1160848_1280-e1531242029179.png
[Image Credit](https://mycollegecorner.com/product/the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly-of-student-loans/)

This experience however made me realize that there are different types of debts: there are
root_title: The Difference Between a Good and a Bad Debt.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Health Is Surely Wealth, The Opposite Can Be Bad.
body:
No matter how bad you feel the things around you are, it is not as bad as having a poor health.
Everything may be pretty unfair at the moment, things may not be pleasant at all and you might not have as much money  as you want, but you need to know that there is nothing more important than a good health. Always remember that good health is good wealth and the opposite is bad.

<center>![xt21x1aa3w.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/xt21x1aa3w.jpg)
[Image credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=health+and+wealth&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=inv&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiblZ3DzqrkAhUjSRUIHU7ODsgQ_AUoAXoECA8QAQ&biw=360&bih=560#imgrc=PPk7BbbeGFmoeM)</center>

I was feeling so bad about not having things going as planned and I was really sad about it that I did not even remember to appreciate the gift of health that I had.
I only realized how much of an ingrate I had been when my health failed me, I had to spend the money I saved on my health and then I realized that the only way you can think of getting what
root_title: Health Is Surely Wealth, The Opposite Can Be Bad.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Responsibility Comes With Obstacles But Inner Strength Overcomes
body:
I am writing this because I want to help someone gain their strength back. I realize that over the  past 10 months I have made a lot of wrong decisions and taken a lot of wrong choices. These choices placed me in a lot of mess that I am still struggling to get out of.

You know there is a saying that you do not know what you are getting yourself into until you get yourself there. This is my case and I will not like to go into details what really happened in the last 10 months. The truth about life is there are ups and downs for everyone, nothing is actually how it looks, there is always something hidden that you never found out before getting yourself into doing them.

https://comps.canstockphoto.com/meditation-people-cartoon-character-image_csp49033873.jpg
[Image](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwiy1NHizK3kAhUSmRoKHXTLAfMQjRx6BAgBEAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.canstockphoto.com%2Fmeditation-people-cartoon-character-49033873.html&psig=AOvVaw2gfEHfH7nbKOga-hgB-Yj2&ust=156
root_title: Responsibility Comes With Obstacles But Inner Strength Overcomes

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Another Opportunity to Live Again.
body:
It is the beginning of a new month friends, we have the opportunity to breath and this means we have the opportunity to correct some wrongs and start over again on some of our plans.

https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fi2.wp.com%2Fwww.jollystatus.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2Fhappy-new-month-june-2019.jpg%3Fresize%3D607%252C491%26ssl%3D1&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jollystatus.com%2F17-powerful-happy-new-month-prayer-messages-quotes%2F&docid=epj3tSzA_bJdXM&tbnid=rYU2Q1_bbPOp7M%3A&vet=1&source=sh%2Fx%2Fim

[Image credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=happiness+for+a+new+month&client=firefox-b&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjRvYuwzK_kAhWOQUEAHbE1AS0Q_AUIBigB&biw=360&bih=560#&biw=360&bih=616)

### The Introduction to the months of Embers.

This month signifies the beginning of ember month and a lot of people believe ember to be a period of evil and a period when lots of people die.
I don't know the reason why people have such mentality but I guess that is just the regular beli
root_title: Another Opportunity to Live Again.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Lack of Patience Causes Anger Which Leads to Destruction.
body:
I have written about anger on several occasions and I will continue to write about it the more I get things to write.
Anger on most occasions is caused as a result of our inability to exercise patience. Patience is believed to be a virtue and it is indeed a virtue, on most occasions, the lack of patience produces anger which in turn damages things beyond our control.

https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Frealtimelove.files.wordpress.com%2F2018%2F07%2Fman-angrily-punching-laptop-993673535.jpg%3Fw%3D840&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Frealtimelove.wordpress.com%2F2018%2F07%2F02%2Fanger-a-course-of-destruction%2F&docid=XN4BzZHLDNnBAM&tbnid=4KQASRCgLM_dgM%3A&vet=1&source=sh%2Fx%2Fi

[Image Source](https://www.google.com/search?q=anger+peace+and+destruction&client=firefox-b&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwj1otuO_rXkAhXKa8AKHQZAA-IQ_AUIBigB&biw=360&bih=560#imgrc=4KQASRCgLM_dgM%3A)

I heard the story of a young man who only felt his girl friend might be cheating on him, he trusted her so much that this i
root_title: The Lack of Patience Causes Anger Which Leads to Destruction.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: You are not a failure because you failed once.
body:
There are different types of examinations we fail in life, there are different types of test we have to run, there are different types of assignments that must be accomplished.
There are different levels of tests ranging from school to even life experiences, as humans we fail and because no one is perfect, a lot of times we fail the test.


[Image credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=failure+and+rising&client=firefox-b&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwj3nOPOk7rkAhUVh1wKHZcnD8IQ_AUIBigB&biw=360&bih=560#imgrc=63FcBQ1Ow8d4_M%3A)

### Different Reactions People Have Towards Failure.

People react towards the result of failure in different ways, while we have some people who just sit and get deep in thought, we have others who will scream and jump, gathering the attention of everyone.
There are people who will collapse, who will break down, cut themselves or hurt themselves in several ways etc.

![e4nedfih5u.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/e4nedfih5u.jpg)

[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=failure+
root_title: You are not a failure because you failed once.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Interesting Marital Stories 1st Round.
body:
I am still single but my studies on marriage has revealed a lot of things, some of the things revealed turns out to be scary while others turn out to be amazing.
Marriage should be a beautiful union where the couple cannot get enough of each other, but what we have these days is not encouraging and to some of us who are still single, it is getting us scared to go into this thing called "marriage".

### Different Marital Drama.

I know a few stories about married people and I am going to share it with you my friends, I hope you enjoy them and leave me a feed back.

There is an handsome Mr Ade who is a good looking man and a man who loves to club and date several ladies, when he was ready to settle down, he decided to go for a good looking church girl, he did not want to get married to any of the girls he had something with in the past.
He found pretty sister Mary who was devoted to the things of God, they got along well and got married.

After marriage, Mr Ade realized that Sister Mary could not satisfy him o
root_title: Interesting Marital Stories 1st Round.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Interesting Marital Stories 2nd Round.
body:
I promised you yesterday that I was going to continue telling you stories about various marriages, I hope you enjoyed the previous episode and you are ready to contribute to today's episode as well.

Today, I am going to share the story of Mr Kunle and Mrs Bimbo.
Mr Kunle had finished his undergraduate studies and he had not gotten a job, Bimbo had been his long time lover before he finished school, he planned to settle down with her but job was not forth coming.
After about two years, Kunle had not been able to get himself a job, but one day his friend offered him a petty job and because he had no other option, he had to just take the job that way.

![cc65ahqgai.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/cc65ahqgai.jpg)
[Image Link](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRUV4fIJwCVFWBdxh6VSB4yCYnBzGYtNO5CpewoxqQjPQ8o9j5ftA)

He started the job and he was able to rent an apartment of his own and he decided to get married to his young time lover and friend.
He did not have enough money to do a glamorous weddin
root_title: Interesting Marital Stories 2nd Round.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Lies and Deceits, the Modern Form of Wickedness.
body:
The way some humans are comfortable with deceiving others is indeed alarming, a lot of people act as if their conscience is dead and they do  not care about what people feel in anyway.
These set of individuals look for ways to allow the same or opposite sex fall in love with them without having the intention of loving this people back in return.

![r61wr2ixfk.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/r61wr2ixfk.jpg)
[Source](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQvBt-MpsouTktis0pJMaRnQ5fRqMERSYd1Cr5yDWtmZIGRmL8w)

I believe love should be a scared word, but I think it has become the most used word in the world we live in today, it has become a word for everyone to use.
The funny thing about these individuals who take love for granted is in their ability to pretend as though they love the individual in question for real.

Some people even claim to lie about love, they cheat and still tell their partner about how innocent they are and how they will never cheat on them.
I think our generation should be taught
root_title: Lies and Deceits, the Modern Form of Wickedness.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: An Honour to Hold on to Right Standards of Living.
body:
Holding on to the things you love can be really demanding sometimes, but if you are holding on to the right thing, you just have to keep holding on.
We live in a generation where people break standards in order to fit into a certain group and get accepted by the crowd.

![xrm1y4xv9s.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/xrm1y4xv9s.jpg)
[Image Source](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTp4LVqPxe75jrqzfUME6d09DrRr80u5b_toYpGif9T7tmaOhJ7)

The truth is, you do not need to live by the standard that people give you, you do not need to live by the standard that is generally acceptable.

If you do not get a right standard for yourself, you will fall into every trap that is set easily, it will also be easy for you to get lured into everything else that people want you to believe.
There are different believes in the world today and almost everyone has his or her own fate, they are humans who will always want to lure others to believe what they believe in, so you really have to be determined to hold on to the
root_title: An Honour to Hold on to Right Standards of Living.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Family Members that are Second to None.
body:
There is nothing as good as having a good and happy family.
Family is everything, family builds up and family gives strength in various ways.
It is however not every family member that wishes their own people success, there are family members that are usually bent on destroying the other party, they have no special or good thing to  offer than just getting from the ones who have.

![afie52s6wb.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/afie52s6wb.jpg)

[Image Link](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR_2YvRNbEdZFRFyCt0oogWbJ07gbkaz8ML-Pkkd3l0uPsgzEtS)

I have a friend who got abandoned by his own mother at a very young age and ran after her lover, she left her Son for his father who toiled and struggled hard to make him become a man.
After some years, my friend grew into a young successful business man that a lot of people loved to reckon with, it was a surprise to find his mother and her family members who had no idea of his whereabouts for years, begin to call and it was at that point they remembered he
root_title: Family Members that are Second to None.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Interesting Marital Stories 4th Round. How do you handle an unfaithful partner?
body:
Cheating has become almost an every day thing these days, it has almost become a norm in most relationships and for some people it does not even look like a big deal to them anymore.
I have seen Ladies especially African ladies who already have it at the back of their minds that men are not supposed to be faithful and cheating should be a part of their lives.
Although, this is not for every African lady, there are still lots of African ladies who still believe that men should be faithful, so everyone is entitled to their own opinions.

![36rs028r2d.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/36rs028r2d.jpg)
[Credit](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQc5rAQIwPM2w0ELZgzRWh-muLMPPzQh_eolF-TVeeA4TIgn38-5Q)

If you are a person who believes that your partner should be a faithful person and you end up with one who is not faithful, how do you think you can handle a situation like that?
I once heard a story of a young beautiful woman who got married to a man of her dreams, she gave him her all only to discover th
root_title: Interesting Marital Stories 4th Round. How do you handle an unfaithful partner?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Be Grateful for Life.
body:
There are lives that get destroyed everyday, there are people that get ruined everyday, there are people who loose loved ones everyday, there are people who lost something special everyday, there are people who mourn everyday, if we find ourselves not to be in any of these categories, we have to be grateful for the things we have.
Gratitude is an act that has been ignored by a lot of people and so many people do not even have the luxury of time to say thank you for the things that they have.

![a9xaa00154.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/a9xaa00154.jpg)
[Image Credit](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ6K9i9tEXuoyvXx3smcEaxuaYVXSDyUeriLk-gkcBwXNW_0bLdCw)

The normal human mind is an expert when it comes to complaints, we complain so much about the things that we lack that we forget to smile about the things that we have.
When a person has the heart to say thank you at every opportunity they get, it helps such people develop a free mind towards anything and everything. One thing that a lot of pe
root_title: Be Grateful for Life.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Right and  Best Way To Love.
body:
I wrote about love sometimes ago and I will want to give a quick recap on what I feel love is about.
Love is a thing that rules and controls the world we live in right now, love is a word used by almost everyone you see or come across, but the question is how many people truly love you when they confess love to you?

![sdx5q3rf56.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/sdx5q3rf56.jpg)

[Image credit](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcT_jVnv9dXhnafPyij4ZbaMt_0P98GCpNtiq8HgvoJMJlb0UGLKig)

Some people take a decision to love truly while others make a decision to act deceitfully.
Talking about love, it does not only have to do with the romantic type of relationship, love does not only exist between those who are sexual partners but love exist amongst friends, family members and others.

There are people who claim to love their family and friends but will never sacrifice anything for them or even think about their well being for a second that is not love of you ask me.
When I was in high school, my princi
root_title: The Right and  Best Way To Love.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Sacrifices and Risks
body:
There are things that keep me amazed in life, most things I cannot properly lay my hands upon, some things look really weird and other things look confusing.
The thing is that you plan for one thing this minute and the next thing is that you find yourself doing another and that is as a result of unplanned circumstances.

![p6koh45cf9.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/p6koh45cf9.jpg)
[Image Source](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ6w76YCdlT0LKCmE15TEMKZFVK8y5ZxPrAuMSDyKVTdeZMb-9JXQ)

In life, you need to learn to take risks and risk when channelled to the right direction and at the right time will bring in great and positive result.
I remember when I was about to start selling in school, I just gained admission and my parents gave me almost everything they had, when I got to school, I knew I had to get a way to feed myself and grow at the same time.
I was not going to beg because that is not an option, but I was ready to do anything legal in order to survive and not beg in school.

![z3cxxz4w3x
root_title: Sacrifices and Risks

author: oluwatobiloba
title: We Live in a World Filled with Disappointments.
body:
Disappointments have turned into a usual thing these days and almost everyone has been disappointed in one way or the other.
Disappointments have an edge over circumstances and planned appointments.
![jvmlr03oek.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/jvmlr03oek.jpg)
[Image credit](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTYKUP42qm7Delo-LiIowpRXGefxxMyzLsd0k3EF2CNs62oSbq_)

A lot of times we get disappointed by those we trust so much, disappointments come from getting heart broken by those we put our heart into.
Just today, I was expecting a credit alert from the bank in order to sort out some things, as a matter of fact I had promised about two to three people to come get the money at a specific time, I waited for a long time but the credit alert did not come forth.
Those I had promised came around and I felt terrible to betray them, I knew they had trusted me with their funds as well and I had disappointed them.

![92ack9n8x4.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/92ack9n8x4.jpg)
[Image credit](https://encrypted-tbn0.
root_title: We Live in a World Filled with Disappointments.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Ways to Maintain your Natural Nails and make them look Beautiful.
body:
Have you seen someone whose nails are long and neat, they are admirable right? Some people also keep short nails in an adorable ways and it looks really beautiful as well.
Either long or short the major thing is that the nails should be neat. 

![www4c3bd45.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/www4c3bd45.jpg)

[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/search?client=firefox-b&biw=360&bih=560&tbm=isch&sxsrf=ACYBGNSFjEz0BkdskiUIErl86KFnXTdnuQ%3A1568979194120&sa=1&q=beautiful+and+healthy+nails&oq=beautiful+and+healthy+nails&aqs=mobile-gws-lite..#)

 There are some parts of the body that we don't really care about that catch people's attention.
I was chatting one day with a brother, and he said there are two things he looks at first when he sees a lady, which are: the appearance and nails( if they are neat)... No wonder they said, "little things matter" 

![jzd8dnrn5v.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/jzd8dnrn5v.jpg)

[Image Credit](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQNRrgolKZ_l22Pj2ZZ50W9z_0CDzfkxGoSxiUD_y-Fq2aAVD
root_title: Ways to Maintain your Natural Nails and make them look Beautiful.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Should Steemit be Enjoyed by Some or All?
body:
After such a long time, I decided to browse through steemit.com today and i was surprised to find out that I have not posted anything in the past sixteen days, that is such a long time I said to myself but on the other hand, I asked myself again if it was worth it to share credible contents in the first place.

![download (2).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWpxEdttCQkJsAbXaDdM7jMErbK9hp5HwP8zcsGvqbNh8/download%20(2).jpeg)
[Image Source](2ahUKEwi49sSiw4_lAhXNT8AKHcIGB_0Q_AUoAnoECA0QAg)


Steemit was once a place we all called home, we travelled to different places to spread the gospel of steemit even if we were not making so much in return for our zeal and activities, but we believed it was definitely going to pay off in a better way soonest, so we put in more effort, but at the end of the day, is it still going to pay off?

I see people who post what seem to me to be something not really meaningful getting to the trending page all the time and we hear people say there are not credible contents to vote
root_title: Should Steemit be Enjoyed by Some or All?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Frustration Into Marriage - The African Mentality.
body:
Hello friends, today I will be telling you a story about a lady who was successful but you know for most Africans, no matter how rich or successful you are, you need to put a ring on your finger in order to certify the level of success you have attained. For Ladies especially, you have to get married in order to show that are truly successful (that is for most African parents), as long as they are concerned, there is no amount of success or happiness you can claim to have achieved without marriage.

![scdgkq3ent.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/scdgkq3ent.jpg)
[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+african+mentality+and+fast+marriage&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=vin&sxsrf=ACYBGNSIGtN8kWTNpDhDL44AdNGokeItAA:1570718234181&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiqxo-z9ZHlAhWIT8AKHZNlBV8Q_AUoAnoECA4QAg#imgrc=GvEoVN7_RaGo-M)

So this young lady had her life going pretty well with a good job and nice friends and family members who never made her feel lonely.
However, the story changed on her 32nd birthday, whe
root_title: Frustration Into Marriage - The African Mentality.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How Do We Justify this Faith?
body:
My faith remains unshaken but I also feel there are certain questions that should be asked at some point in a person's life.
I was in a church program in one of the local branches of a popular church and a pastor came to request for funds in order to build more structures for the big parish, the members of the church that were asked to make contributions for the big parish still had to worship under an uncompleted building and as a matter of fact, funds made from the local churches are usually sent to the bigger churches who in turn pay salaries to the pastor.


[Image Credit](https://www.pinterest.com/pin/48202658494607354/)

Churches spring up everyday because some people claim to have heard from God to start a new church or they are no longer comfortable with the place they worship initially, so they just have to start their own church and make people believe what they believe also.

The reason why we have eight churches in a certain  location is one thing I cannot comprehend, the churches will increase t
root_title: How Do We Justify this Faith?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: I Weep for the Situation of my Dear Country.
body:
The situation of rice in our dear country is really alarming, I learnt that the border has been closed in order to facilitate the consumption of local products or should I say home made food products.
This made it difficult for people to carry out importation of goods, but this also creates an avenue for few connected people to make more money since they are the only ones allowed to import rice into the country, so the price of rice in our dear country has increased greatly and this has made lots of average people result to eating rice filled with stones which happens to be the cheapest rice available in my dear country.
The rice which happens to be the cheapest rice has lots of dirt and stone in it, that you will not take a spoon without consuming stones and dirty particles with it, no matter how hard you try to sieve out the dirt, you cannot escape the consumption of stone.

![d4aie4puib.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/d4aie4puib.jpg)
[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/searchbyimage/upload)

As a lover of ri
root_title: I Weep for the Situation of my Dear Country.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: How do you handle unforgiveness?
body:
The ability of a man to forgive is a great one because it sets the heart free from pain and bondage, it gives the body strength and agility.
As much as lots of people know about the relevance and importance of forgiveness, it is not an easy task at all.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/w2mc3nbk6u.jpg)
[Image Source](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR3kY-cODZgvIdqLjX77qx7tkQa6WW4PiMlDHV5LGRo5-fQPpuW&s)
 
Sometimes when people hurt us and they try to apologize, if it is within our power to forgive, we forgive as fast as we can for the sake of our sanity until unconsciously those memories play on our subconscious minds again.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/5ngl3l8o9b.jpg)
[Image Source](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTnM4ibae-12TzSmBbuiVupxCGypObE2b2l1Aa5jgLiaSk1SJUq&s)

I envy people who know how to live a really free life, those who understand the importmance of quick forgiveness and ability to smile often.
These set of humans act as though they have no life chall
root_title: How do you handle unforgiveness?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Love and wickedness, (A story about a heart that loves and the other heart that pretends).
body:
Mr John had a lady whom he loved very much, they were so close that they shared everything together, they shared both the good and bad moments together and it seem as if they loved each other.
The lady was willing to sacrifice everything for Mr John and she showed him love with everything that he had, she supported him with her money, showered him love and affection with her body and all she had.

![8thqwijb2t.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/8thqwijb2t.jpg)
[Image Source](https://hackspirit.com/15-undeniable-signs-he-loves-you/)

On countless occasions, she got into trouble at her work place and she almost lost her job because Mr John was sick and she had to stay back to take care of him, she got into trouble with her parents because they felt Mr John was not good enough for their daughter, she distanced herself from friends who did not like the fact that she was dating someone who was not rich enough to meet her needs and she abandoned other suitors.

Other suitors came around her but she already made her choice
root_title: Love and wickedness, (A story about a heart that loves and the other heart that pretends).

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Humans who become Money Minting Machines.
body:
A look at the way human reasons happens to be very funny most times, why will you see someone who is only been nice to you as a stupid person.
I have heard about several cases of people who are only trying to help been regarded as a stupid fellow.

![images (30).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXrQkUkFKonvYk2PPKmvJFtb8J8CX8V6rp89n79qHENRk/images%20(30).jpeg)
[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=humans+who+become+money+minting+machine&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=ivn&sxsrf=ACYBGNTLX0S1W7XYNugUozDmXCXNoT3e8w:1572025957465&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi3xZaG_bflAhXPesAKHcXsBooQ_AUoAXoECA8QAQ&biw=360&bih=560#imgrc=Biykx_YhRW0QpM)

There are humans who will go out of their way to make you happy, they will go out of their way to make sure they make those around them happy and satisfied and instead of people to appreciate that fact,they rather see those who help them as fools whom they can always extort money from.

I don't understand the reason why we have people who reason in this manner b
root_title: Humans who become Money Minting Machines.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Men of Forces in my County.
body:
It is unfortunate that our dear country has become a place where we have to run away from the men of forces instead of thieves.
The citizens in this vicinity are now scared of the men of forces that once they are sighted from a far distance, citizens will run for their dear lives.

![616de9izn6.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/616de9izn6.jpg)
[Image Source](https://www.google.com/search?q=police+collecting+bribe+in+nigeria&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=ivn&sxsrf=ACYBGNRrChOu45smxVvG6Rp6dpyx0eYEiQ:1572298643122&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwizl-rw9L_lAhVJe8AKHfd-D8oQ_AUoAXoECA4QAQ&biw=360&bih=560&dpr=2#imgrc=2wPi6UowJpNUSM)

Criminals are the ones who are supposed to be scared of men of forces, but good citizens who carry out legal jobs, are the ones who run away from men of forces.
It is so bad that matured men and young boys see men of forces and turn their cars and bikes around. 

The reason why people turn around whenever they see men of forces is not because they are criminals as I have earlier mentioned
root_title: The Men of Forces in my County.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Do you have difficulty staying happy?
body:
There are so many individuals who have issues with becoming happy or even staying happy for a long time, if that is your condition dear friends, then I have a solution for you.
Why don't you make some decisions today, these decisions will go a long way to keep you happy and get your mind off stress.

![b3l5cgz27i.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/b3l5cgz27i.jpg)

[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/searchbyimage/upload)

The first thing is to forget about the hurt and pain of the past.
It might be a difficult thing to do, but the truth remains that, in order to remain happy, you have to forget about the hurt that the past brings to you. Going back to the things of the past keeps you unhappy and definitely keeps you miserable.

Happiness is also a deliberate effort, you need to keep making deliberate efforts in order to stay happy.
Things will always come to your face that will make you unhappy, but as soon as you can, you have to let go of the hurt and pain and put a smile on your pretty face again.
Thanks for re
root_title: Do you have difficulty staying happy?

author: oluwatobiloba
title: It is Impossible for Everyone to Love you.
body:
As the faces of individuals differ, so also is the mind of every specific person.
Growth is also one constant thing that must happen to a living thing, growth however occurs in different phases and at different times, as we grow as humans, we stop doing certain things and we begin to do certain things as well, the reason for our action could be determined by either environment, friends and even family members.

![images (32).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeSmnXaiGbjyrt4j76cgQwXg29VjhK2RdbBzbF8oydYwq/images%20(32).jpeg)

[Image Credit](https://tinybuddha.com/blog/how-to-stop-taking-on-others-peoples-fears-and-live-freely/)

When I was much younger, I use to get really worried about what people had to say about me, I become really concerned when I get to know that someone has reported something contrary to my nature to another person, this will keep me down for days or even weeks, I wanted to do right by everyone around me and I did not want to  offend anyone.

![images (33).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitim
root_title: It is Impossible for Everyone to Love you.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: For the Sake of the Future.
body:
Have you ever been in a situation where you have what you wish for in front of you, but you cannot touch it.
This happened to me yesterday and I felt like crying, but I knew definitely that there was something precious I had to protect and with this in mind, I have to ignore my feeling for that period.

![4qiyiz0vtu.jpg](https://img.esteem.ws/4qiyiz0vtu.jpg)
[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=dufferenciating+wants+from+needs&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=ivn&sxsrf=ACYBGNRM80NqxntLKkOrLUZ3cSUiwTagCA:1573477628932&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjvs4n5nOLlAhXMNcAKHSDgAJ0Q_AUoAXoECAsQAQ#imgrc=zzE6VSeSBxXU4M)

There is a local food here in Nigeria that my stomach has been yearning for, it is called, amala and I wanted a good soup with lots of proteins to balance the meal.
My financial ability at the moment however kept me handicapped, I was not able to eat it because I could not afford it.

Then just yesterday, someone around my place of work brought two big wraps of amala and a good soup mixed w
root_title: For the Sake of the Future.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Impacts we Make in the Lives of Others.
body:
About a year ago, I was posted to a remote village where there was no light at all, there was no good water and the roads were terrible.
When I got to the village, I was shocked because I had never seen a thing like that before, majority of the villagers were farmers and everything about the village was extremely bushy and local.

![IMG_20190503_144501_790.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYf2PLnUKr2NRk1XHAp1gyVTgf7tQJu5gkCFfstq6Dvm5/IMG_20190503_144501_790.jpg)

I was taken to the school where I was supposed to teach and I saw that the building was nothing to write home about, they only had two teachers in the secondary department and two corps members who were supposed to leave that month.
I noticed the excitement on the faces of the children when they saw new corps members, they started jumping and screaming.
I was not sure I wanted to stay in a place like this, but I did not want to disappoint this kids who looked happy already, despite the fact that the village looked horrible, I knew I could add so
root_title: The Impacts we Make in the Lives of Others.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: A Birthday Shout out to Someone Special.
body:
How fast time flies, it was just like yesterday when we celebrated your last birthday and I can remember clearly everything that happened that day.
You are a man of goals, of dreams and visions, you have a good heart and you wish everyone around you success as much as you wish yourself, this peculiar attitude of yours is what so many people take for granted and use against you.

![images (12).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbrzKwMx5zDsTfcDCESjBEG1SXUHkRsboGqKqj5zaiwo9/images%20(12).jpeg)

You have gone through lots of things and you are still standing, I want you to know that God is not done with you and like the blacksmith, he is moulding you into a great and irresistible treasure.

### My Declarations for this Special Day.

As today mark the
root_title: A Birthday Shout out to Someone Special.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Saving to Spend or Build.
body:
I have read lots of things about the importance of saving a portion of your funds because no matter how much you earn now, it is impossible for us to predict what could be our portion in the future.
A lot of people have read about how important it is to save and I know of individuals who have learnt the benefits of saving and they have started the process, but it is one thing to save and another thing to spend the savings properly.

![images (15).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmebvsW5uCw9o2JYU89nsc6eE1aQS3yVeth4bwfphe9UKS/images%20(15).jpeg)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: My Heart Pour.
body:
Sometimes, when I get bothered about several issues and I cry like a baby (because I am very emotional), I remember how he has come through for me on several occasions.
I cry like a baby on several occasions because of the blows that life decides to throw at me, I will not claim to be a very strong person because on several occasions I break down.

![images (17).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmasjLCCwc5AUoAiDLMB5E3vesr1EVgAkx6StdLDMHQHE3/images%20(17).jpeg)

[Image Credit](https://www.zedge.net/wallpaper/883868ba-ce13-3f29-b3a8-f75794a8be68)

On other times, when I begin to think about the ugly situations that has occurred in my life, I correct myself as I remember how he has come through for me at the periods when I thought that all hope has been lost.
I am not ungrateful for the miracles that has happened in time past, faithful father and I know there is nothing impossible for you to do, as a child that I am and as a human, I have unlimited needs, I ask you to always come through for me every time I

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Your Ability to Get Proper Rest, Makes you a Stronger and Better Person.
body:
Sometimes we work too hard and we forget to put our health on check, on countless occasions we are not to be blamed for this, because bills keep up pilling up and we have no other option than to work hard and pay bills.
However, sometimes we do things that become detrimental to our health, we might not see it that way but as time goes on, our health begins to give us a different signal.

![images (20).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb5NavmCs5msDYaELjZqjBN9FXfKc5sT3Xw6V9isXeGCe/images%20(20).jpeg)

I started feeling pains all over my body and I knew that my bod

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Secret Struggle of an Entrepreneur.
body:
I was sitting at a corner of my store when I overheard two women mocking an entrepreneur, they were laughing at this young woman because they felt she was making so much money from her business and it was not reflecting in her dressing, eating and other things.

![images (22).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWgNvhcKGMbYR351Tg7Ugp3UZA758CfX2D7sadakaDVvW/images%20(22).jpeg)

[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+secret+struggle+of+a+nigerian+entrepreneur&client=ms-android-tecno&prmd=inv&sxsrf=ACYBGNTb7iF4lCXMKEBib1w37QQFEz8NjQ:1574772550567&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwji1Onz9IfmAhXODOwKHekeD1UQ_AUoAXoECAoQAQ#imgrc=0ybec2FzdCcZAMl)

The young woman whom they were gossiping about was working extra hard and not giving time to rest, but with her hard work, she could not eat well or even dress well.
The women who were talking about this entrepreneur were also owing her money as at the time of discussion.

![images (23).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeRvSGDwJhN9wBJ4KwYNDvbgcfDgsJw
root_title: The Secret Struggle of an Entrepreneur.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Conflict of the Mind.
body:
Hello dear friends, I hope you are all having a great day and it is super exciting to know that, we are going into another weekend which happens to be a time where lots of people get to relax, although that is not the case for upcoming entrepreneurs like me who have to work round the clock in order to get ourselves what we want.

![images (24).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdmHd7vszALjNbabaLon8uvH1ZXLTxUoHUjYWBkpoKNkE/images%20(24).jpeg)

Something happened yesterday, and I have been having some weird feeling about it, something tells me I was wrong and another makes me feel I probably did the right thing, I don't know which one to believe, so I am going to share with you my dear friends and I want to know what you feel about it as well,

body:

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Everyday Miracle's we take for Granted.
body:
I was seeing a movie lately and a guy asked for the reason why miracles like we watch in the movie, does not happen around us and this made me remember how much of a miracle we take for granted all the time. Some things happen to us and we just ignore not taking into consideration how much of a miracle it is that happens to us daily.

![IMG_20191125_103559_574.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTR31Qjcn7PaEfLWvrM3tuXDxdg3UeatBLFiAKYH5LZMm/IMG_20191125_103559_574.jpg)

Today, I have taken time to reflect over the daily miracle's I enjoy, such as the ability to wake up every morning, the ability to get something we want no matter how little, the ability to bounce up and be alive, to ability to ask and receive.

Today, I am grateful for sanity, I am grateful for grace, I am grateful for stability and I am grateful for family.
I have taken a moment today to look beyond my problems and say thank you to the giver of good gifts, and I feel everyone should be able to do the same.

Thanks for reading, I am @tobi.
root_title: The Everyday Miracle's we take for Granted.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Tough times with a tough face.
body:
Someone looked at me and said: she must have her life going on perfectly, she is always smiling.
I pondered over those words and I realized that literarily, I have almost nothing to smile about, but I also do not really think it is a good idea to go around town with a moody face.

![Snapchat-798095596.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdtooxTv9uw5G8TEGdhhDJKGDCKtTEKAMTEJbJzK9st11/Snapchat-798095596.jpg)

I was talking to a lady who dressed in a very disorganized manner and the look of confusion on her face was really obvious, I wanted to get to the root of the problem and the reply she gave me was really amazing, she told me that she looked that way because she wanted everyone who sees her to know that she is going through a tough time, I went further to ask her about how many people she had gotten to help her since she started looking this way and she said none.

![Snapchat-69423716.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZ1XvPTm6XScN4DHWiKxstAnUmE9A2RpLWSWuMqpYYskW/Snapchat-69423716.jpg)

I smiled and I t
root_title: Tough times with a tough face.

title: The 'Nice' Customers.
body:

author: oluwatobiloba

body:

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Extra Nice Entrepreneur. (Is It Healthy or Destructive for a Business).
body:
My friends usually tell me that I have an extra nice nature, a nature where I sometimes set my own interest aside to satisfy the needs of those around me.
This attitude sometimes gets me into trouble and I usually have to find my way out of it but I realize that after sometime, the same thing happens either with the same person or with another person entirely.


![images (6).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYXDjVK2NLDF2Rc5BmBHHirz8WjJpLW9Yo31zGQ4yAYtg/images%20(6).jpeg)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: Avoid Frustration Dear Entrepreneurs.
body:
Starting up a business is not a convenient thing, it may be easy for people to ask their friends to become an entrepreneur just because they have a certain entrepreneurial skill or the other but the truth is, at some point those who encouraged the entrepreneurs to start the business, do not usually encourage them through the journey and even others who want to encourage them usually do not have the capacity to do so.


![images (10).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcXeH4sqz1fmTrYPa4t85af5Yn8TiMfYmwYBqhj4ysL9D/images%20(10).jpeg)

author: oluwatobiloba
title: In your strive to satisfy customers, never go overboard.
body:
I am sure you know that the process of growth is usually difficult, but do you know what happens when you try to jump any one of them? 


![images (11).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQRQeedXFRT1CragG6LGEVWKJC38bnvMrzW3wPWuQ37MK/images%20(11).jpeg)

I apologize to my readers if I bore you too much with entrepreneurial issues but I just feel it's great that I stick to what I know how to do.
As a business owner, I don't know if you have experienced anyone coming to tell you about how you need to get something's done at your business place.
A lot of people do not have an idea as to what entrepreneurs are going through but all customers want is that they should be satisfied at all cost.

author: oluwatobiloba
title: The Science behind Food Spoilage.
body:
The process of food spoilage is a metabolic process that makes food undesirable and unacceptable for the consumption of humans.
The process of food spoilage is not an immediate thing as it requires a gradual process. There are several factors that affects the process of food spoilage but there are two basic ones and they are:

![download (5).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNyZp9bAS2Yw25co2yERUbM2KR1BcfdKrMA13HBeu1kL3/download%20(5).jpeg)

[Image Source](https://www.toppr.com/guides/evs/mangoes-round-the-year/food-spoilage/)

*The growth of microbes: There are several types of micro organisms but the specific one that causes the process of food spoilage is pathogenic microorganisms.

It is possible for pathogenic microorganisms to stay active in food without any noticeable changes with the food involved.

There is a microorganism called spoilage microorganism, this microorganism is made up of bacteria, yeast and mould as well.


![images (13).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcycDqpVoF1s4XDmstSJM5
root_title: The Science behind Food Spoilage.
